blocks.name: df-fun
blocks.content: Define predicate that determines if some class ` A ` is a function. Definition 10.1 of [Quine] p. 65. For example, the expression ` Fun cos ` is true once we define cosine ( ~ df-cos ). This is not the same as defining a specific function's mapping, which is typically done using the format of ~ cmpt with the maps-to notation (see ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo ). Contrast this predicate with the predicates to determine if some class is a function with a given domain ( ~ df-fn ), a function with a given domain and codomain ( ~ df-f ), a one-to-one function ( ~ df-f1 ), an onto function ( ~ df-fo ), or a one-to-one onto function ( ~ df-f1o ). For alternate definitions, see ~ dffun2 , ~ dffun3 , ~ dffun4 , ~ dffun5 , ~ dffun6 , ~ dffun7 , ~ dffun8 , and ~ dffun9 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fn
blocks.content: Define a function with domain. Definition 6.15(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. For alternate definitions, see ~ dffn2 , ~ dffn3 , ~ dffn4 , and ~ dffn5 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f
blocks.content: Define a function (mapping) with domain and codomain. Definition 6.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. ` F : A --> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a function from ` A ` to ` B ` ". For alternate definitions, see ~ dff2 , ~ dff3 , and ~ dff4 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f1
blocks.content: Define a one-to-one function. For equivalent definitions see ~ dff12 and ~ dff13 . Compare Definition 6.15(5) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("1-1" above the arrow). A one-to-one function is also called an "injection" or an "injective function", ` F : A -1-1-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is an injection from ` A ` into ` B ` ". Injections are precisely the monomorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setcmon . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fo
blocks.content: Define an onto function. Definition 6.15(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("onto" under the arrow). For alternate definitions, see ~ dffo2 , ~ dffo3 , ~ dffo4 , and ~ dffo5 . An onto function is also called a "surjection" or a "surjective function", ` F : A -onto-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a surjection from ` A ` onto ` B ` ". Surjections are precisely the epimorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setcepi . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-f1o
blocks.content: Define a one-to-one onto function. For equivalent definitions see ~ dff1o2 , ~ dff1o3 , ~ dff1o4 , and ~ dff1o5 . Compare Definition 6.15(6) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("1-1" above the arrow and "onto" below the arrow). A one-to-one onto function is also called a "bijection" or a "bijective function", ` F : A -1-1-onto-> B ` can be read as " ` F ` is a bijection between ` A ` and ` B ` ". Bijections are precisely the isomorphisms in the category ` SetCat ` of sets and set functions, see ~ setciso . Therefore, two sets are called "isomorphic" if there is a bijection between them. According to ~ isof1oidb , two sets are isomorphic iff there is an isomorphism ` Isom ` regarding the identity relation. In this case, the two sets are also "equinumerous", see ~ bren . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-fv
blocks.content: Define the value of a function, ` ( F `` A ) ` , also known as function application. For example, ` ( cos `` 0 ) = 1 ` (we prove this in ~ cos0 after we define cosine in ~ df-cos ). Typically, function ` F ` is defined using maps-to notation (see ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo ), but this is not required. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> ( F `` 3 ) = 9 ` ( ~ ex-fv ). Note that ~ df-ov will define two-argument functions using ordered pairs as ` ( A F B ) = ( F `` <. A , B >. ) ` . This particular definition is quite convenient: it can be applied to any class and evaluates to the empty set when it is not meaningful (as shown by ~ ndmfv and ~ fvprc ). The left apostrophe notation originated with Peano and was adopted in Definition *30.01 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 235, Definition 10.11 of [Quine] p. 68, and Definition 6.11 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 26. It means the same thing as the more familiar ` F ( A ) ` notation for a function's value at ` A ` , i.e., " ` F ` of ` A ` ", but without context-dependent notational ambiguity. Alternate definitions are ~ dffv2 , ~ dffv3 , ~ fv2 , and ~ fv3 (the latter two previously required ` A ` to be a set.) Restricted equivalents that require ` F ` to be a function are shown in ~ funfv and ~ funfv2 . For the familiar definition of function value in terms of ordered pair membership, see ~ funopfvb . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.) Revised to use ` iota ` . Original version is now theorem ~ dffv4 . (Revised by Scott Fenton, 6-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: df-isom
blocks.content: Define the isomorphism predicate. We read this as " ` H ` is an ` R ` , ` S ` isomorphism of ` A ` onto ` B ` ". Normally, ` R ` and ` S ` are ordering relations on ` A ` and ` B ` respectively. Definition 6.28 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 32, whose notation is the same as ours except that ` R ` and ` S ` are subscripts. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-isom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wiso(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4), wa(wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-isom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≅ c1, c2(c3, c4))↔((c0 : c3 ↔ c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c1]s1 ↔(c0 ` s0)[c2](c0 ` s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
}

thm dffun2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)))

  3bitri(wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  3bitri(wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), copab(s1, s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wss(copab(s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), copab(s1, s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

  sseq1i(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), copab(s1, s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), copab(s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))
  df-co(s1, s2, s0, c0, ccnv(c0))
  ssopab2b(s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  albii(s1, wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  bitri(wal(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  albii(s2, wi(wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

  alcom(s1, s0, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

blocks.name: dffun3

  albii(s0, wal(s2, wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))

  mo4(s2, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))

blocks.name: dffun4
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a function. Definition 6.4(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffun4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  dffun2(s0, s1, s2, c0)
  anbi2i(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  albii(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  imbi1i(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0)))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))
}

blocks.origin:
thm dffun5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  dffun3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
  anbi2i(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  albii(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  exbii(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  albii(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  imbi1i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))
}

} = {
  bitr4i(wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wex(hs2, wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))

  albii(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))))
  cbvmo(hs1, s1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))
  nfbr(s1, cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(s1), cv(hs0), c0)
  albii(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  df-mo(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  cbvalv1(hs0, s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))

  breq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  ⊢ (Fun(c0)↔(Rel(c0)∧ ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  bitr4i(Fun(c0), (Rel(c0)∧ ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))), (Rel(c0)∧ ∀(hs0, ∃(hs2, ∀(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 → hs1 = hs2))))))
  dffun3(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0)
  anbi2i(Rel(c0), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ∀(hs0, ∃(hs2, ∀(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 → hs1 = hs2)))))
  3bitr3ri(∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ∀(hs0, ∃(hs2, ∀(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 → hs1 = hs2)))), ∀(hs0, ∃*(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s1, hs0[c0]s1)))
  albii(hs0, ∃*(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1), ∃*(s1, hs0[c0]s1))
  cbvmo(hs1, s1, hs0[c0]hs1, hs0[c0]s1)
  nfbr(s1, hs0, c0, hs1)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, hs1)
  nfv(hs1, hs0[c0]s1)
  breq2(hs1, s1, hs0, c0)
  albii(hs0, ∃*(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1), ∃(hs2, ∀(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 → hs1 = hs2))))
  df-mo(hs1, hs2, hs0[c0]hs1)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s0, ∃*(s1, hs0[c0]s1), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  nfmo(s0, s1, hs0[c0]s1)
  nfbr(s0, hs0, c0, s1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfv(hs0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  mobidv(s1, hs0 = s0, hs0[c0]s1, s0[c0]s1)
  breq1(hs0, s0, c0, s1)

  diff.hs0.w(∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.name: funmo
blocks.content: A function has at most one value for each argument. (Contributed by NM, 24-May-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm funmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylc(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wi(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))))
  alrimiv(s0, wfun(c0), wi(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))))
  ancrd(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl(wfun(c0), wi(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, universe)), wrel(c0))
  simplbi(wfun(c0), wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  ex(wrel(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex1(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  sylibr(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(c1, universe), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))))
  com12(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, universe), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, wi(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))), wi(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  mobidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cv(s0))
  19.21bi(hs0, wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  simprbi(wfun(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), wrel(c0))
  dffun6(hs0, s0, c0)
  moanimv(s0, wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  moim(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wfun(c0), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→ ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylc(Fun(c0), ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0), ∀(s0,(c1[c0]s0 →(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1[c0]s0))), ∃*(s0,(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1[c0]s0)))
  alrimiv(s0, Fun(c0), (c1[c0]s0 →(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1[c0]s0)))
  ancrd(Fun(c0), c1[c0]s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(Fun(c0), (c1[c0]s0 → c1 ∈ 𝕌), Rel(c0))
  simplbi(Fun(c0), Rel(c0), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s0, hs0[c0]s0)))
  ex(Rel(c0), c1[c0]s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1(c0, c1, s0)
  sylibr(Fun(c0), ∃*(s0,(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1[c0]s0)), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 → ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0)))
  com12(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, (Fun(c0)→ ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0)), (Fun(c0)→ ∃*(s0, hs0[c0]s0)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, Fun(c0), ∃*(s0, hs0[c0]s0), ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  mobidv(s0, hs0 = c1, hs0[c0]s0, c1[c0]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c1, c0, s0)
  19.21bi(hs0, Fun(c0), ∃*(s0, hs0[c0]s0))
  simprbi(Fun(c0), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s0, hs0[c0]s0)), Rel(c0))
  dffun6(hs0, s0, c0)
  moanimv(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c1[c0]s0)
  moim(s0, c1[c0]s0, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1[c0]s0))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)→ ∃*(s0, c1[c0]s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm funss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wfun(c1), wfun(c0)))
} = {
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wfun(c1), wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c1), wss(ccom(c1, ccnv(c1)), cid)), wa(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)))
  anim12d(wss(c0, c1), wrel(c1), wss(ccom(c1, ccnv(c1)), cid), wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid))
  relss(c0, c1)
  syl(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(ccom(c1, ccnv(c1)), cid), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), ccom(c1, ccnv(c1))))
  sstrd(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), ccom(c1, ccnv(c1)), ccom(c1, ccnv(c0)), wss(c0, c1))
  coss1(c0, c1, ccnv(c0))
  syl(wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c1, ccnv(c0)), ccom(c1, ccnv(c1))), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
  cnvss(c0, c1)
  coss2(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1), c1)
  sstr2(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), ccom(c1, ccnv(c1)), cid)
  df-fun(c1)
  df-fun(c0)
}

thm nffun(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wnf(s0, wfun(c0))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)))
  df-fun(c0)
  nfan(s0, wrel(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid))
  nfrel(s0, c0)
  nfss(s0, ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)
  nfco(s0, c0, ccnv(c0))
  nfcnv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ F/(s0, Fun(c0))

} = {
  nfxfr(s0, Fun(c0), (Rel(c0)∧(c0 ∘ `' c0)⊆ =))

thm sbcfung(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2))))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wrel(c2), wal(hs0, wex(hs2, wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))), wa(wrel(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wal(hs0, wex(hs2, wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))

  adantr(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wmo(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: dffun7
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a function. One possibility for the definition of a function in [Enderton] p. 42. (Enderton's definition is ambiguous because "there is only one" could mean either "there is at most one" or "there is exactly one." However, ~ dffun8 shows that it doesn't matter which meaning we pick.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2002.)

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {

  bitr4i(∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1), ∃*(s1 ∈ ran(c0), s0[c0]s1), ∃*(s1,(s1 ∈ ran(c0)∧ s0[c0]s1)))
  mobii(s1, s0[c0]s1, (s1 ∈ ran(c0)∧ s0[c0]s1))
  pm4.71ri(s0[c0]s1, s1 ∈ ran(c0))

blocks.name: funfn
blocks.content: An equivalence for the function predicate. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: funfnd
blocks.content: A function is a function over its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: funi
blocks.content: The identity relation is a function. Part of Theorem 10.4 of [Quine] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: nfunv
blocks.content: The universe is not a function. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 27-Jan-2004.)

blocks.name: funopg
blocks.content: A Kuratowski ordered pair is a function only if its components are equal. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: funopab

blocks.name: fununmo
blocks.content: If the union of classes is a function, there is at most one element in relation to an arbitrary element regarding one of these classes. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fununmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0))))
  funmo(s0, cun(c0, c1), cv(s1))
  moimi(s0, wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cun(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  orc(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))
  brun(cv(s1), c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm fununmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun((c0 ⋃ c1))→ ∃*(s0, s1[c0]s0))

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

blocks.name: fununfun

  sylib(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wrel(cun(c0, c1)))

  relun(c0, c1)
  jca(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wfun(c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wa(wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  anim12i(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wrel(c0), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  simpl(wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  alrimiv(hs0, wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  fununmo(hs1, hs0, c0, c1)
  dffun6(hs0, hs1, c0)
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1))), wfun(c1), wa(wrel(c1), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  anim12i(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wrel(c1), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  simpr(wrel(c0), wrel(c1))

  sylbi(wfun(cun(c0, c1)), wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wfun(cun(c1, c0)))
  funeqi(cun(c0, c1), cun(c1, c0))

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm funcnvsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wrel(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)))))
  relcnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  ax-gen(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1))))
  ax-mp(wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1))), wmo(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), c0)))
  moeq(hs1, c0)
  moimi(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wbr(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs0)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs1))
  df-br(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c1)))
  elsni(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c1))
  opth1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)

} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2)), wfun(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c6))), wfun(cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c6)))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2)), wfun(cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c6)))), wa(wfun(csn(cop(c0, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c6)))), wceq(cin(cdm(csn(cop(c0, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c6)))), emptycls))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2), wa(wfun(csn(cop(c0, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c6)))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7), wa(wfun(csn(cop(c0, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c6)))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c6, c7)), wfun(csn(cop(c0, c4))), wfun(csn(cop(c2, c6))))

  sylan9eq(cin(cdm(csn(cop(c0, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c6)))), emptycls, cin(csn(c0), csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2))
  ineqan12d(cdm(csn(cop(c0, c4))), cdm(csn(cop(c2, c6))), csn(c0), csn(c2), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))

  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5), wceq(cin(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5))))), cin(csn(c4), csn(c5))))
  ineqan12d(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), csn(c4), csn(c5), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))

  df-rn(csn(cop(c2, c5)))
  rnsnopg(c2, c3, c5)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c5), wceq(cin(csn(c4), csn(c5)), emptycls))
  disjsn2(c4, c5)

  eqtri(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c5))), cun(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c4))), ccnv(csn(cop(c2, c5)))), ccnv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c5)))))

  syl21anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c6, c7), wne(c6, c8), wne(c7, c8))), wfun(cun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7))), ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8))))), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8)))), wceq(cin(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8))))), emptycls))
  syl2an3an(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c6, c7), wne(c6, c8), wne(c7, c8)), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c6, c7))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  simp1(wne(c6, c7), wne(c6, c8), wne(c7, c8))
  funcnvpr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c7)
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c6, c7), wne(c6, c8), wne(c7, c8))), wfun(ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8)))))
  funcnvsn(c4, c8)

  ineq12d(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8)))), cpr(c6, c7), csn(c8), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), cpr(c6, c7)))
  syl5eqr(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))), cpr(c6, c7), crn(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  df-rn(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)))
  rnpropg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c7)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cdm(ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8)))), csn(c8)))

  eqtri(ccnv(ctp(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7), cop(c4, c8))), cun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7))), ccnv(csn(cop(c4, c8)))), ccnv(cun(cpr(cop(c0, c6), cop(c2, c7)), csn(cop(c4, c8)))))

}

blocks.content: The converse quadruple of ordered pairs is a function if the second members are pairwise different. Note that the second members need not be sets. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2021.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 14-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  3adantr2(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), w3a(wne(c8, c9), wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11)), wa(wne(c9, c10), wne(c9, c11)), wne(c10, c11), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9)))))

  3ad2antr1(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(c8, c9), wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9)))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c8, c9), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9)))))
  funcnvpr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c8, c9)
  3adantr2(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), w3a(wne(c8, c9), wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11)), wa(wne(c9, c10), wne(c9, c11)), wne(c10, c11), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c4, c10), cop(c6, c11)))))
  ad2ant2l(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), w3a(wne(c8, c9), wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11)), wne(c10, c11), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(c4, c10), cop(c6, c11)))))

  ineqan12d(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9)))), cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c4, c10), cop(c6, c11)))), cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c10, c11), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))
  syl5eqr(cdm(ccnv(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9)))), cpr(c8, c9), crn(cpr(cop(c0, c8), cop(c2, c9))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

  rnpropg(c4, c5, c6, c7, c10, c11)
  3adant3(w3a(wne(c8, c9), wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11)), wa(wne(c9, c10), wne(c9, c11)), wne(c10, c11), wceq(cin(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c10, c11)), emptycls))

  an4s(wne(c8, c10), wne(c8, c11), wne(c9, c10), wne(c9, c11), wceq(cin(cpr(c8, c9), cpr(c10, c11)), emptycls))

blocks.name: fun0
blocks.content: The empty set is a function. Theorem 10.3 of [Quine] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: funcnv0
blocks.content: The converse of the empty set is a function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: funcnvcnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a function is a function. (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: funcnv2
blocks.content: A simpler equivalence for single-rooted (see ~ funcnv ). (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  mpbiran(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  dffun6(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funcnv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun(`' c0)↔ ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(Fun(`' c0), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1)))
  mpbiran(Fun(`' c0), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1)), Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  dffun6(s0, s1, `' c0)
  albii(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1), ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  mobii(s1, s0[`' c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  brcnv(s0, c0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: funcnv
blocks.content: The converse of a class is a function iff the class is single-rooted, which means that for any ` y ` in the range of ` A ` there is at most one ` x ` such that ` x A y ` . Definition of single-rooted in [Enderton] p. 43. See ~ funcnv2 for a simpler version. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  pm4.71ri(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  brelrn(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  funcnv2(s0, s1, c0)
  df-ral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), crn(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun(`' c0)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(Fun(`' c0), ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ ran(c0)→ ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0))))
  albii(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0), (s0 ∈ ran(c0)→ ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)))
  bitri(∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0), (s0 ∈ ran(c0)→ ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ∃*(s1,(s0 ∈ ran(c0)∧ s1[c0]s0)))
  mobii(s1, s1[c0]s0, (s0 ∈ ran(c0)∧ s1[c0]s0))
  pm4.71ri(s1[c0]s0, s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  brelrn(s1, c0, s0)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  moanimv(s1, s0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[c0]s0)
  funcnv2(s0, s1, c0)
  df-ral(s0, ran(c0), ∃*(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, ran(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: funcnv3
blocks.content: A condition showing a class is single-rooted. (See ~ funcnv ). (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wreu(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wreu(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralbiia(s0, crn(c0), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  biantrurd(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  abeq2i(s0, crn(c0), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  dfrn2(s0, s1, c0)
  funcnv(s0, s1, c0)
  ralbii(s0, crn(c0), wreu(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  3bitr2i(wreu(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  df-reu(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  eubii(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  pm4.71ri(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)))
  breldm(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  df-eu(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: fun2cnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a class is a function iff the class is single-valued. Each side is equivalent to Definition 6.4(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23, who use the notation "Un(A)" for single-valued. Note that ` A ` is not necessarily a function. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fun2cnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {

thm fun2cnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun(`' `' c0)↔ ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(Fun(`' `' c0), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), ∀(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[`' c0]s0)))
  funcnv2(s0, s1, `' c0)
  albii(s0, ∃*(s1, s1[`' c0]s0), ∃*(s1, s0[c0]s1))
  mobii(s1, s1[`' c0]s0, s0[c0]s1)
  brcnv(s1, c0, s0)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: svrelfun
blocks.content: A single-valued relation is a function. (See ~ fun2cnv for "single-valued.") Definition 6.4(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: fununi
blocks.content: The union of a chain (with respect to inclusion) of functions is a function. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: funin
blocks.content: The intersection with a function is a function. Exercise 14(a) of [Enderton] p. 53. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: funres11
blocks.content: The restriction of a one-to-one function is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: funcnvres

blocks.name: funcnvres2

thm funimaexg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
} = {
  impcom(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, c2, wi(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe)), wi(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
  eleq1d(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, cima(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  simplbiim(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wrel(c0), wal(hs1, wex(hs3, wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))))
  dffun5(hs1, hs3, hs2, c0)
  sylibr(wal(hs1, wex(hs3, wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))), wcel(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wex(hs3, wal(hs2, wb(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0)))))))
  axrep4(hs1, hs3, hs2, hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))
  nfv(hs3, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))
  bitri(wcel(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wex(hs3, wal(hs2, wb(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0)))))), wex(hs3, wceq(cv(hs3), cima(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  isset(hs3, cima(c0, cv(hs0)))
  exbii(hs3, wceq(cv(hs3), cima(c0, cv(hs0))), wal(hs2, wb(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))))))
  bitri(wceq(cv(hs3), cima(c0, cv(hs0))), wal(hs2, wb(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))))), wceq(cv(hs3), cab(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))))))
  eqeq2i(cv(hs3), cima(c0, cv(hs0)), cab(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0)))))
  dfima3(hs2, hs1, c0, cv(hs0))
  abeq2(hs2, cv(hs3), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm funimaexg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0 " c1)∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  impcom(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ c2, (c0 " c1)∈ 𝕌)
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, c2, (Fun(c0)→(c0 " c1)∈ 𝕌), (Fun(c0)→(c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, Fun(c0), (c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌, (c0 " c1)∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1d((c0 " hs0), universe, (c0 " c1), hs0 = c1)
  imaeq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  simplbiim(Fun(c0), (c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌, Rel(c0), ∀(hs1, ∃(hs3, ∀(hs2,(< hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs2 = hs3)))))
  dffun5(hs1, hs3, hs2, c0)
  sylibr(∀(hs1, ∃(hs3, ∀(hs2,(< hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0 → hs2 = hs3)))), (c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs3, ∀(hs2,(hs2 ∈ hs3 ↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0))))))
  axrep4(hs1, hs3, hs2, hs0, < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)
  nfv(hs3, < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)
  bitri((c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs3, ∀(hs2,(hs2 ∈ hs3 ↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0))))), ∃(hs3, hs3 =(c0 " hs0)))
  isset(hs3, (c0 " hs0))
  exbii(hs3, hs3 =(c0 " hs0), ∀(hs2,(hs2 ∈ hs3 ↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)))))
  bitri(hs3 =(c0 " hs0), ∀(hs2,(hs2 ∈ hs3 ↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)))), hs3 = { hs2 | ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0))})
  eqeq2i(hs3, (c0 " hs0), { hs2 | ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0))})
  dfima3(hs2, hs1, c0, hs0)
  abeq2(hs2, hs3, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)→(c0 " c1)∈ 𝕌))
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.w(< hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)
  diff.hs3.c((c0 " hs0))
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs3)
}

blocks.name: funimaex
blocks.content: The image of a set under any function is also a set. Equivalent of Axiom of Replacement ~ ax-rep . Axiom 39(vi) of [Quine] p. 284. Compare Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2002.)

blocks.name: isarep1
blocks.content: Part of a study of the Axiom of Replacement used by the Isabelle prover. The object PrimReplace is apparently the image of the function encoded by ` ph ( x , y ) ` i.e. the class ` ( { <. x , y >. | ph } " A ) ` . If so, we can prove Isabelle's "Axiom of Replacement" conclusion without using the Axiom of Replacement, for which I (N. Megill) currently have no explanation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm isarep1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))), diffss(s0, s2))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0))))
  elima(hs0, cv(s0), copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), copab(s1, s2, w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cv(s0))
  opelopabsb(s1, s2, cv(hs0), cv(s0), w0)
  bitr2i(wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0)))
  sbbii(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0))
  sbsbc(s0, s2, w0)
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, wsbc(s2, cv(s0), w0))
  cbvrex(hs0, s1, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  nfv(hs0, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, wsb(s0, s2, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s1, s2, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsb(s0, s2, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isarep1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c0,[s0 / s2]w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((s0 ∈({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c0,[s0 / s2]w0)), d(s0, s2))
  3bitri(s0 ∈({ < s1, s2 > | w0 } " c0), ∃(s1 ∈ c0,[s0 / s2]w0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0))
  elima(hs0, s0, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, c0)
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(hs0, c0, hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  3bitri(hs0[{ < s1, s2 > | w0 }]s0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, < hs0, s0 > ∈ { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  df-br(hs0, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, s0)
  opelopabsb(s1, s2, hs0, s0, w0)
  bitr2i([hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0)
  sbbii(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  sbsbc(s0, s2, w0)
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0)
  cbvrex(hs0, s1, c0, [hs0 / s1][s0 / s2]w0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  nfv(hs0, [s0 / s2]w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, [s0 / s2]w0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s1, s2 > | w0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([s0 / s2]w0)
}

blocks.name: isarep2
blocks.content: Part of a study of the Axiom of Replacement used by the Isabelle prover. In Isabelle, the sethood of PrimReplace is apparently postulated implicitly by its type signature " ` [ ` i, ` [ ` i, i ` ] ` => o ` ] ` => i", which automatically asserts that it is a set without using any axioms. To prove that it is a set in Metamath, we need the hypotheses of Isabelle's "Axiom of Replacement" as well as the Axiom of Replacement in the form ~ funimaex . (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm isarep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wral(s1, c0, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  isseti(s0, cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0))
  eqeltri(cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), universe, cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0))
  eqtr3i(cima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0), cima(cres(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), c0))
  resima(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  imaeq1i(cres(copab(s1, s2, w0), c0), c0, copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  resopab(s1, s2, c0, w0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cima(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0), universe), wfun(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  mpgbir(s1, wfun(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))), wmo(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  funopab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wmo(s2, w0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wmo(s2, w0), wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  rspec(s1, c0, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(w0, wsb(s3, s2, w0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  mo3(s2, s3, w0)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  moanimv(s2, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  funimaex(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), c0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, copab(s1, s2, w0), c0)
  diff.copab.s(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: fneu
blocks.content: There is exactly one value of a function. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  mpbid(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  funmo(s0, c0, c2)
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wb(wmo(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))), weu(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  ibi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  eldmg(s0, c2, cdm(c0), c0)
  exmoeub(s0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ ∃!(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, ∃!(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  mpbid((Fun(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0)), ∃!(s0, c2[c0]s0), ∃*(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  adantr(Fun(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), ∃*(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  funmo(s0, c0, c2)
  syl((Fun(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0)), (∃*(s0, c2[c0]s0)↔ ∃!(s0, c2[c0]s0)), ∃(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  adantl(Fun(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  ibi(c2 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(s0, c2[c0]s0))
  eldmg(s0, c2, dom(c0), c0)
  exmoeub(s0, c2[c0]s0)
}

blocks.name: fnun
blocks.content: The union of two functions with disjoint domains. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
} = {
  imp(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl2anb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  an4s(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))))
  impcom(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wi(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))))
  expd(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl6ibr(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3)), wa(wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3))))
  jctird(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3)))
  syl6bir(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wfun(cun(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls)))
  anbi2d(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c2)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  eqeq1d(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls, cin(c1, c3), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  ineq12(cdm(c0), c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  funun(c0, c2)
  syl5eq(cdm(cun(c0, c2)), cun(c1, c3), cun(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  dmun(c0, c2)
  uneq12(cdm(c0), c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  df-fn(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)∧(c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅)→(c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3))
} = {
  imp((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), (c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅, (c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3))
  syl2anb(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ →(c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3)), (Fun(c0)∧ dom(c0)= c1), (Fun(c2)∧ dom(c2)= c3))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  an4s(Fun(c0), dom(c0)= c1, Fun(c2), dom(c2)= c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ →(c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3)))
  impcom((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2)), (dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ →(c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3)))
  expd((dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), (Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2)), (c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅, (c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3))
  syl6ibr((dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2))∧(c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅), (c0 ⋃ c2)[Fn](c1 ⋃ c3), (Fun((c0 ⋃ c2))∧ dom((c0 ⋃ c2))=(c1 ⋃ c3)))
  jctird((dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2))∧(c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅), Fun((c0 ⋃ c2)), dom((c0 ⋃ c2))=(c1 ⋃ c3))
  syl6bir((dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), ((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2))∧(c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅), Fun((c0 ⋃ c2)), ((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2))∧(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅))
  anbi2d((dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3), (Fun(c0)∧ Fun(c2)), (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅, (c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅)
  eqeq1d((dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2)), emptycls, (c1 ⋂ c3), (dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3))
  ineq12(dom(c0), c1, dom(c2), c3)
  funun(c0, c2)
  syl5eq(dom((c0 ⋃ c2)), (c1 ⋃ c3), (dom(c0)⋃ dom(c2)), (dom(c0)= c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c3))
  dmun(c0, c2)
  uneq12(dom(c0), c1, dom(c2), c3)
  df-fn((c0 ⋃ c2), (c1 ⋃ c3))
}

blocks.name: fnunsn
blocks.content: Extension of a function with a new ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnunsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))

blocks.name: fnimadisj

blocks.name: dmmptd
blocks.content: The domain of the mapping operation, deduction form. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  elexd(c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rabid2(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)= c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(dom(c0), c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elexd(c2, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  rabid2(s0, c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: mptun
blocks.content: Union of mappings which are mutually compatible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, cun(c0, c1), c2)
  eqtr4i(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cun(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  uneq12i(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cun(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), copab(s0, hs0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elun(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  andir(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unopab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: sbcfng
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through the function predicate with a domain. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcfng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wfn(c2, c3), wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))))
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3))), wa(wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfun(c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wfun(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  sbcfung(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3)), wceq(cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cdm(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  sbceqg(s0, c0, c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  eqeq1i(csb(s0, c0, cdm(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c3), cdm(csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  csbdm(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, wfun(c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c3))
  df-fn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcfng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3 ↔[c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0](Fun(c2)∧ dom(c2)= c3))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, c0 ∈ c1, c2[Fn]c3, (Fun(c2)∧ dom(c2)= c3))
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, (c2[Fn]c3 ↔(Fun(c2)∧ dom(c2)= c3)))
  df-fn(c2, c3)
  3bitr4g(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0](Fun(c2)∧ dom(c2)= c3), [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, ([c0 / s0]Fun(c2)∧[c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3), (Fun([c0 / s0]c2)∧ dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3))
  anbi12d(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]Fun(c2), [c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3, Fun([c0 / s0]c2), dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3)
  sbcfung(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]dom(c2)= c3, dom([c0 / s0]c2)=[c0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]dom(c2)=[c0 / s0]c3)
  sbceqg(s0, c0, c1, dom(c2), c3)
  eqeq1i([c0 / s0]dom(c2), [c0 / s0]c3, dom([c0 / s0]c2))
  csbdm(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, Fun(c2), dom(c2)= c3)
  df-fn([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: sbcfg
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through the function predicate with domain and codomain. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wf(c2, c3, c4)), wf(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wf(c2, c3, c4)), wf(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, c4), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wf(c2, c3, c4), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))))
  df-f(c2, c3, c4)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))), wf(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4))), wa(wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4)), wfn(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  sbcfng(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(crn(c2), c4)), wss(crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wss(csb(s0, c0, crn(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, crn(c2), c4)
  sseq1i(csb(s0, c0, crn(c2)), csb(s0, c0, c4), crn(csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  csbrn(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, wfn(c2, c3), wss(crn(c2), c4))
  df-f(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, c0, c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0](c2 : c3 → c4)↔([c0 / s0]c2 :[c0 / s0]c3 →[c0 / s0]c4)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0](c2 : c3 → c4), ([c0 / s0]c2 :[c0 / s0]c3 →[c0 / s0]c4), [c0 / s0](c2[Fn]c3 ∧ ran(c2)⊆ c4))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c3 → c4), (c2[Fn]c3 ∧ ran(c2)⊆ c4))
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ((c2 : c3 → c4)↔(c2[Fn]c3 ∧ ran(c2)⊆ c4)))
  df-f(c2, c3, c4)
  3bitr4g(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0](c2[Fn]c3 ∧ ran(c2)⊆ c4), ([c0 / s0]c2 :[c0 / s0]c3 →[c0 / s0]c4), ([c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3 ∧[c0 / s0]ran(c2)⊆ c4), ([c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3 ∧ ran([c0 / s0]c2)⊆[c0 / s0]c4))
  anbi12d(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn]c3, [c0 / s0]ran(c2)⊆ c4, [c0 / s0]c2[Fn][c0 / s0]c3, ran([c0 / s0]c2)⊆[c0 / s0]c4)
  sbcfng(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]ran(c2)⊆ c4, ran([c0 / s0]c2)⊆[c0 / s0]c4, [c0 / s0]ran(c2)⊆[c0 / s0]c4)
  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, ran(c2), c4)
  sseq1i([c0 / s0]ran(c2), [c0 / s0]c4, ran([c0 / s0]c2))
  csbrn(s0, c0, c2)
  sbcan(s0, c0, c2[Fn]c3, ran(c2)⊆ c4)
  df-f([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fco
blocks.content: Composition of two mappings. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1999.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wf(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wf(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)))
  syl2anb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)))
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
  df-f(c3, c4, c1)
  imp(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)), wa(wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2)))
  jctird(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)), wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)), wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2), wi(wa(wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1)), wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4)))
  3expib(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c3, c4), wss(crn(c3), c1), wfn(ccom(c0, c3), c4))
  fnco(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2))
  mpan(wss(crn(c0), c2), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), c2), wss(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), crn(c0)))
  rncoss(c0, c3)
  sstr(crn(ccom(c0, c3)), crn(c0), c2)
  df-f(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1))→((c0 ∘ c3): c4 → c2))
} = {
  sylibr(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)), ((c0 ∘ c3): c4 → c2), ((c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4 ∧ ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2))
  syl2anb((c0 : c1 → c2), (c3 : c4 → c1), ((c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4 ∧ ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2), (c3[Fn]c4 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ c1))
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
  df-f(c3, c4, c1)
  imp((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2), (c3[Fn]c4 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ c1), ((c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4 ∧ ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2))
  jctird((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2), (c3[Fn]c4 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ c1), (c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4, ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2)
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)⊆ c2, ((c3[Fn]c4 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ c1)→(c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4))
  3expib(c0[Fn]c1, c3[Fn]c4, ran(c3)⊆ c1, (c0 ∘ c3)[Fn]c4)
  fnco(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  adantl(c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)⊆ c2, ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2)
  mpan(ran(c0)⊆ c2, ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ c2, ran((c0 ∘ c3))⊆ ran(c0))

  sstr(ran((c0 ∘ c3)), ran(c0), c2)
  df-f((c0 ∘ c3), c4, c2)
}

  syl6bbr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(cres(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))

  simpld(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(cres(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c0, c1)))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cres(c0, c1))
  opelresi(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl6bbr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(ccnv(c0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  ex(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simprd(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  opelf(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(ccnv(c0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0))))
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), c2)
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(cres(ccnv(c0), c2))

  diff.hs1.c(cres(ccnv(c0), c2))

thm fcnvres(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)→ `'(c0 |` c1)=(`' c0 |` c2))
} = {

  pm4.71rd((c0 : c1 → c2), < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  ex((c0 : c1 → c2), < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  simprd(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c1)
  opelf(c0, c1, c2, hs1, hs0)

  opelresi(hs0, hs1, `' c0, c2)

thm fint(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf(c0, c1, cint(c2)), wral(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wne(c2, emptycls)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wf(c0, c1, cint(c2)), wral(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cv(s0)))))
  bitr4i(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cv(s0)))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(crn(c0), cv(s0)))))
  anbi2i(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cint(c2)), wral(s0, c2, wss(crn(c0), cv(s0))))
  ssint(s0, crn(c0), c2)
  ax-mp(wb(wral(s0, c2, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cv(s0)))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(crn(c0), cv(s0))))), wne(c2, emptycls))
  r19.28zv(s0, c2, wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cv(s0)))
  df-f(c0, c1, cint(c2))
  ralbii(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), cv(s0))))
  df-f(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm fint(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → ⋂ c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 : c1 → s0)))
  ⊣ c2 ≠ ∅
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i((c0 : c1 → ⋂ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 : c1 → s0)), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ ⋂ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ s0)))

  anbi2i(c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)⊆ ⋂ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ran(c0)⊆ s0))
  ssint(s0, ran(c0), c2)
  ax-mp((∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ s0))↔(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ran(c0)⊆ s0))), c2 ≠ ∅)
  r19.28zv(s0, c2, c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)⊆ s0)
  df-f(c0, c1, ⋂ c2)
  ralbii(s0, c2, (c0 : c1 → s0), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ s0))
  df-f(c0, c1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)

thm f0rn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)))→ c1 = ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp((c0 : c1 → c2), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)), c1 = ∅)
  mpcom((c0 : c1 → c2), (¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))→ c1 = ∅), dom(c0)= c1)
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  exp32(dom(c0)= c1, (c0 : c1 → c2), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)), c1 = ∅)
  mpbird((dom(c0)= c1 ∧((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)))), c1 = ∅, dom(c0)= ∅)
  sylibr((dom(c0)= c1 ∧((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)))), dom(c0)= ∅, ran(c0)= ∅)
  adantl(dom(c0)= c1, ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))), ran(c0)= ∅)
  imp((c0 : c1 → c2), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)), ran(c0)= ∅)
  syl((c0 : c1 → c2), (¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))→ ran(c0)= ∅), ran(c0)⊆ c2)
  frn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5bir(ran(c0)⊆ c2, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0)), ran(c0)= ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ¬ s0 ∈ ran(c0)))
  ralnex(s0, c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  syl5bir(ran(c0)⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ¬ s0 ∈ ran(c0)), ran(c0)= ∅, (c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ∅)
  disj(s0, c2, ran(c0))
  sylbi(ran(c0)⊆ c2, ((c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ∅ → ran(c0)= ∅), (ran(c0)⋂ c2)= ran(c0))
  df-ss(ran(c0), c2)
  sylbi((ran(c0)⋂ c2)= ran(c0), ((c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ∅ → ran(c0)= ∅), (c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ran(c0))
  eqeq1i((ran(c0)⋂ c2), ran(c0), (c2 ⋂ ran(c0)))
  incom(ran(c0), c2)
  ex((c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ran(c0), (c2 ⋂ ran(c0))= ∅, ran(c0)= ∅)
  eqtr2((c2 ⋂ ran(c0)), ran(c0), emptycls)
  dm0rn0(c0)
  adantr(dom(c0)= c1, ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))), (c1 = ∅ ↔ dom(c0)= ∅))
  eqcoms(dom(c0), c1, (c1 = ∅ ↔ dom(c0)= ∅))
  eqeq1(c1, dom(c0), emptycls)

blocks.name: f1cnvcnv
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a set ` A ` (not necessarily a function) is one-to-one. Each side is equivalent to Definition 6.4(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24, who use the notation "Un_2 (A)" for one-to-one. We do not introduce a separate notation since we rarely use it. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)

thm f1cnvcnv(class c0) {
  |- wb(wf1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wa(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))))
} = {
  bitri(wf1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wa(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), wa(wf(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))))
  df-f1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe)
  anbi12ci(wf(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  bitr3i(wf(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0), universe), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)))
  dffn2(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0))
  mpbiran2(wfn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)), wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wceq(cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), cdm(c0)))
  dmcnvcnv(c0)
  df-fn(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0))
  funeqi(ccnv(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), ccnv(c0))
  mpbi(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), ccnv(c0)), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  dfrel2(ccnv(c0))
}

thm fimadmfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)→(c0 : c1 ↠(c0 " c1)))
} = {
  mpdan((c0 : c1 → c2), (c0 : c1 ↠(c0 " c1)), dom(c0)= c1)
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbird(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ dom(c0)= c1), (c0 : c1 ↠(c0 " c1)), (c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0)))
  sylib(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ dom(c0)= c1), (c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0)), c0[Fn]c1)
  adantr((c0 : c1 → c2), dom(c0)= c1, c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn4(c0, c1)
  syl(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ dom(c0)= c1), ((c0 : c1 ↠(c0 " c1))↔(c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0))), (c0 " c1)= ran(c0))
  adantl((c0 : c1 → c2), dom(c0)= c1, (c0 " c1)= ran(c0))
  eqcoms(dom(c0), c1, (c0 " c1)= ran(c0))
  syl6eq((c0 " c1), ran(c0), (c0 " dom(c0)), c1 = dom(c0))
  imaeq2(c1, dom(c0), c0)

  df-fn(cres(c0, c1), c1)
  mpbiran2(wfo(cres(c0, c1), c1, cima(c0, c1)), wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1), wceq(crn(cres(c0, c1)), cima(c0, c1)))

thm fores(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0))→((c0 |` c1): c1 ↠(c0 " c1)))
} = {
  sylibr((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), ((c0 |` c1): c1 ↠(c0 " c1)), (Fun((c0 |` c1))∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)))
  anim1i(Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0), Fun((c0 |` c1)))
  funres(c0, c1)
  3bitr4i(((c0 |` c1): c1 ↠(c0 " c1)), (Fun((c0 |` c1))∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), (c0 |` c1)[Fn]c1, (Fun((c0 |` c1))∧ dom((c0 |` c1))= c1))
  df-fn((c0 |` c1), c1)
  mpbiran2(((c0 |` c1): c1 ↠(c0 " c1)), (c0 |` c1)[Fn]c1, ran((c0 |` c1))=(c0 " c1))
  eqcomi(ran((c0 |` c1)), (c0 " c1))

blocks.name: resin
blocks.content: The restriction of a one-to-one onto function to an intersection maps onto the intersection of the images. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Apr-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm resin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfo(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2), wfo(cres(c0, c3), c3, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cin(c2, c4)))
} = {
  sylib(w3a(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfo(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2), wfo(cres(c0, c3), c3, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cin(c2, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))))
  syld3an3(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfo(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2), wfo(cres(c0, c3), c3, c4), wf1o(cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))), wfo(cres(c0, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, c3), cdif(c2, c4)))
  syl(w3a(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfo(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2), wfo(cres(c0, c3), c3, c4)), wfo(cres(c0, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, c3), cdif(c2, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, c3), cdif(c2, c4)))
  resdif(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  f1ofo(cres(c0, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, c3), cdif(c2, c4))
  resdif(c0, c1, c2, cdif(c1, c3), cdif(c2, c4))
  3bitrri(wf1o(cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cin(c2, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cin(c2, c4)), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)))), wceq(cin(c2, c4), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))))
  dfin4(c2, c4)
  f1oeq3(cin(c2, c4), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)), cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))), wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)))), wceq(cin(c1, c3), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))))
  f1oeq2(cin(c1, c3), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4))), wf1o(cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)))), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)))))
  reseq2i(c0, cin(c1, c3), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)))
  dfin4(c1, c3)
  f1oeq1(cres(c0, cin(c1, c3)), cres(c0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3))), cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c3)), cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c4)))
}

blocks.name: f1cnv
blocks.content: The converse of an injective function is bijective. (Contributed by FL, 11-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: funcocnv2
blocks.content: Composition with the converse. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcocnv2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, crn(c0))))
} = {
  sylib(wfun(c0), wceq(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, crn(c0))), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid))
  simprbi(wfun(c0), wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wrel(c0))
  df-fun(c0)
  bitri(wss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wceq(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, crn(c0))), wceq(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0))))))
  iss(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)))
  eqeq2i(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)), cres(cid, cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0)))), cres(cid, crn(c0)))
  reseq2i(cid, cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0))), crn(c0))
  eqtr4i(cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0))), crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(c0))), cdm(ccnv(c0))), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(ccnv(c0))))
  dfdm4(c0)
  dmcoeq(c0, ccnv(c0))
  df-rn(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funcocnv2(class c0) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(c0 ∘ `' c0)=(= |` ran(c0)))
} = {
  sylib(Fun(c0), (c0 ∘ `' c0)=(= |` ran(c0)), (c0 ∘ `' c0)⊆ =)
  simprbi(Fun(c0), (c0 ∘ `' c0)⊆ =, Rel(c0))
  df-fun(c0)
  bitri((c0 ∘ `' c0)⊆ =, (c0 ∘ `' c0)=(= |` ran(c0)), (c0 ∘ `' c0)=(= |` dom((c0 ∘ `' c0))))
  iss((c0 ∘ `' c0))
  eqeq2i((c0 ∘ `' c0), (= |` dom((c0 ∘ `' c0))), (= |` ran(c0)))
  reseq2i(cid, dom((c0 ∘ `' c0)), ran(c0))
  eqtr4i(dom((c0 ∘ `' c0)), ran(c0), dom(`' c0))
  ax-mp(dom((c0 ∘ `' c0))= dom(`' c0), dom(c0)= ran(`' c0))
  dfdm4(c0)
  dmcoeq(c0, `' c0)
  df-rn(c0)

blocks.name: fococnv2

blocks.name: f1ococnv2
blocks.content: The composition of a one-to-one onto function and its converse equals the identity relation restricted to the function's range. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: f1cocnv2
blocks.content: Composition of an injective function with its converse. (Contributed by FL, 11-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: f1ococnv1

blocks.name: funcoeqres

blocks.name: f1ssf1
blocks.content: A subset of an injective function is injective. (Contributed by AV, 20-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1ssf1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfun(c0), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wss(c1, c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1)))
} = {
  3imp(wfun(c0), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wss(c1, c0), wfun(ccnv(c1)))
  com23(wfun(c0), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wss(c1, c0), wfun(ccnv(c1)))
  ex(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0), wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))))
  syl(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1))
  funssres(c0, c1)
  eqcoms(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), c1, wi(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1))))
  syl5ibr(wceq(c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wfun(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c1)))))
  funres11(c0, cdm(c1))
  funeqd(ccnv(c1), ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c1))), wceq(c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1))))
  cnveq(c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f1ssf1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ Fun(`' c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→ Fun(`' c1))
} = {
  3imp(Fun(c0), Fun(`' c0), c1 ⊆ c0, Fun(`' c1))
  com23(Fun(c0), Fun(`' c0), c1 ⊆ c0, Fun(`' c1))
  ex(Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, (Fun(`' c0)→ Fun(`' c1)))
  syl((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (Fun(`' c0)→ Fun(`' c1)), (c0 |` dom(c1))= c1)
  funssres(c0, c1)
  eqcoms((c0 |` dom(c1)), c1, (Fun(`' c0)→ Fun(`' c1)))
  syl5ibr(c1 =(c0 |` dom(c1)), Fun(`' c0), Fun(`' c1), Fun(`'(c0 |` dom(c1))))
  funres11(c0, dom(c1))
  funeqd(`' c1, `'(c0 |` dom(c1)), c1 =(c0 |` dom(c1)))
  cnveq(c1, (c0 |` dom(c1)))
}

blocks.name: f10
blocks.content: The empty set maps one-to-one into any class. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: f10d
blocks.content: The empty set maps one-to-one into any class, deduction version. (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm f10d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1(c0, cdm(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls))
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, wf1(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wf1(emptycls, cdm(emptycls), c1))
  mpbir(wf1(emptycls, cdm(emptycls), c1), wf1(emptycls, emptycls, c1))
  f10(c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wf1(emptycls, cdm(emptycls), c1), wf1(emptycls, emptycls, c1)), wceq(cdm(emptycls), emptycls))
  dm0()
  f1eq2(cdm(emptycls), emptycls, emptycls, c1)
  f1eq123d(c0, cdm(c0), c1, emptycls, cdm(emptycls), c1, w0)
  dmeqd(c0, emptycls, w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f10d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : dom(c0)↣ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = ∅)
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, (c0 : dom(c0)↣ c1), (∅ : dom(∅)↣ c1))
  mpbir((∅ : dom(∅)↣ c1), (∅ : ∅ ↣ c1))
  f10(c1)
  ax-mp(((∅ : dom(∅)↣ c1)↔(∅ : ∅ ↣ c1)), dom(∅)= ∅)
  dm0()
  f1eq2(dom(∅), emptycls, emptycls, c1)
  f1eq123d(c0, dom(c0), c1, emptycls, dom(∅), c1, w0)
  dmeqd(c0, emptycls, w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: f1o00
blocks.content: One-to-one onto mapping of the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1o00(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  bitri(wf1o(c0, emptycls, c1), wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1)))
  dff1o4(c0, emptycls, c1)
  impbii(wa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1)), wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  jca(wa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  adantr(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  biimpi(wfn(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl5reqr(c1, emptycls, cdm(emptycls), wa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1)))
  dm0()
  syl(wa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1)), wceq(cdm(emptycls), c1), wfn(emptycls, c1))
  biimpa(wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1), wfn(emptycls, c1))
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c1, emptycls, wfn(c0, emptycls))
  sylbi(wfn(c0, emptycls), wceq(ccnv(c0), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  fndm(emptycls, c1)
  jca(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wfn(c0, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1))
  adantr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wfn(c0, emptycls))
  biimpri(wceq(c0, emptycls), wfn(c0, emptycls))
  fn0(c0)
  mpbiri(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1), wfn(emptycls, emptycls))
  mpbir(wfn(emptycls, emptycls), wceq(emptycls, emptycls))
  eqid(emptycls)
  fn0(emptycls)
  sylan9bb(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1), wfn(emptycls, emptycls), wfn(emptycls, c1))
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c1, emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(ccnv(c0), emptycls, ccnv(emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  cnveq(c0, emptycls)
  cnv0()
  fneq2(c1, emptycls, emptycls)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f1o00(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ∅ ↔ c1)↔(c0 = ∅ ∧ c1 = ∅))
} = {
  bitri((c0 : ∅ ↔ c1), (c0 = ∅ ∧ c1 = ∅), (c0[Fn]∅ ∧ `' c0[Fn]c1))
  dff1o4(c0, emptycls, c1)

  adantr(c0[Fn]∅, `' c0[Fn]c1, c0 = ∅)
  biimpi(c0[Fn]∅, c0 = ∅)

}
blocks.pretty:
thm fo00(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ∅ ↠ c1)↔(c0 = ∅ ∧ c1 = ∅))
} = {
  bitri((c0 : ∅ ↠ c1), (c0 = ∅ ∧ c1 = ∅), (c0 : ∅ ↔ c1))
  impbii((c0 : ∅ ↠ c1), (c0 : ∅ ↔ c1))

  mpbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wi(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wex(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wi(wcel(emptycls, c1), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))

  dtru(hs0, s0)
  xchbinx(wex(hs0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  exnal(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  albii(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  equcom(s0, hs0)
  19.42v(hs0, wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wex(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(emptycls, c1), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  exbidv(hs0, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(emptycls, c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi1d(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  syl6bb(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(emptycls, c1), wa(wcel(emptycls, c1), wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  anbi12d(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(emptycls, c1), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  opprc1(c0, cv(s0))

  opprc1(c0, cv(hs0))
  anidm(wcel(emptycls, c1))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi1i(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  anbi12i(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))
  df-br(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  df-br(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  3bitr4ri(wn(wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wex(hs0, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wex(s0, wn(wal(hs0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wn(wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  exnal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  exbii(s0, wex(hs0, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wn(wal(hs0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  exanali(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  mo4(s0, hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
