  bitr4i(wn(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))), wi(wex(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wn(wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))), wn(wa(wex(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))))
  notbii(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wa(wex(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))))
  df-eu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))
  imnan(wex(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wmo(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: fvprc
blocks.content: A function's value at a proper class is the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-1998.)

blocks.name: rnfvprc
blocks.content: The range of a function value at a proper class is empty. (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: fv2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of function value. Definition 10.11 of [Quine] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), cio(s1, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s1))))
  df-fv(s1, c0, c1)
  dfiota2(s1, s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: dffv3
blocks.content: A definition of function value in terms of iota. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffv3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6reqr(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cio(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  iotabidv(s0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  elvd(s0, wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(s0), universe)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  elimasng(c1, universe, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  df-br(c1, c0, cv(s0))
  df-fv(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), emptycls, cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  iotabidv(s0, wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cima(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl6eq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls, cima(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  imaeq2d(c0, csn(c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(csn(c1), emptycls))
  snprc(c1)
  ima0(c0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cio(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), emptycls), wn(weu(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))))
  mto(weu(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  nex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  noel(cv(s0))
  euex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  iotanul(s0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffv3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)= iota(s0, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)= iota(s0, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6reqr((c0 ` c1), iota(s0, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), iota(s0, c1[c0]s0), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  iotabidv(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 }), c1[c0]s0)
  elvd(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })↔ c1[c0]s0))
  syl6bbr((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s0 ∈ 𝕌), s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 }), c1[c0]s0, < c1, s0 > ∈ c0)
  elimasng(c1, universe, s0, universe, c0)
  df-br(c1, c0, s0)
  df-fv(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), iota(s0, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(iota(s0, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), emptycls, iota(s0, s0 ∈ ∅), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  iotabidv(s0, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, s0 ∈(c0 " { c1 }), s0 ∈ ∅)
  eleq2d(s0, (c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eq((c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, (c0 " ∅), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  imaeq2d(c0, { c1 }, emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  biimpi(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, { c1 } = ∅)
  snprc(c1)
  ima0(c0)
  ax-mp(iota(s0, s0 ∈ ∅)= ∅, ¬ ∃!(s0, s0 ∈ ∅))
  mto(∃!(s0, s0 ∈ ∅), ∃(s0, s0 ∈ ∅))
  nex(s0, s0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(s0)
  euex(s0, s0 ∈ ∅)
  iotanul(s0, s0 ∈ ∅)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dffv4
blocks.content: The previous definition of function value, from before the ` iota ` operator was introduced. Although based on the idea embodied by Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65 (see ~ args ), this definition apparently does not appear in the literature. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffv4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0))))))
  dffv3(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iota(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  unieqi(cab(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0)))), cab(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0)))))
  abbii(s0, wceq(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cima(c0, csn(c1)), csn(cv(s0))))
  eqeq1i(cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  abid2(hs0, cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, csn(c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffv4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)= ⋃ { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } }
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 ` c1), ⋃ { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } }, iota(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })), ⋃ { s0 | { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 } })
  dffv3(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-iota(hs0, s0, hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 }))
  unieqi({ s0 | { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 } }, { s0 |(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 } })
  abbii(s0, { hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })} = { s0 }, (c0 " { c1 })= { s0 })
  eqeq1i({ hs0 | hs0 ∈(c0 " { c1 })}, { s0 }, (c0 " { c1 }))
  abid2(hs0, (c0 " { c1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c0 " { c1 }))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 " { c1 }))
}

blocks.name: elfv
blocks.content: Membership in a function value. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), cuni(cab(s0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  fv2(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  eluniab(s0, c0, wal(s1, wb(wbr(c2, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
}

thm nffv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cfv(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cfv(c0, c1), cio(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  df-fv(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfiota(s0, hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))

blocks.content: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nffv . (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nffvd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  mpbii(w0, wnfc(s0, cfv(c0, c1)), wnfc(s0, cfv(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  nffv(s0, cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, cfv(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))), wnfc(s0, cfv(c0, c1))), wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
  nfceqdf(s0, cfv(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), cfv(c0, c1), wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  nfan(s0, wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  nfnfc1(s0, c1)
  fveq12d(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c0, c1, wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  adantr(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), c0))

  adantr(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)} = c0)

thm fvres(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cres(c2, c1), c0), cfv(c2, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cres(c2, c1), c0), cfv(c2, c0), cio(hs0, wbr(c0, cres(c2, c1), cv(hs0))), cio(hs0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  iotabidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cres(c2, c1), cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs0)))
  baib(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cres(c2, c1), cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs0)))
  brresi(c0, c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  df-fv(hs0, cres(c2, c1), c0)
  df-fv(hs0, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  neeq1(cfv(c1, c2), cv(hs0), emptycls)
  biimpcd(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  syl(wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), weu(hs0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))))

thm tz6.12i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ ∅ →((c1 ` c2)= c0 → c2[c1]c0))
} = {
  com12(c0 ≠ ∅, (c1 ` c2)= c0, c2[c1]c0)

  fvex(c1, c2)
  3imtr3d(hs0 =(c1 ` c2), (c1 ` c2)≠ ∅, c2[c1](c1 ` c2), hs0 ≠ ∅, c2[c1]hs0)
  eqcoms(hs0, (c1 ` c2), (hs0 ≠ ∅ → c2[c1]hs0))

  neeq1((c1 ` c2), hs0, emptycls)

  syl((c1 ` c2)≠ ∅, ((c1 ` c2)= hs0 ↔ c2[c1]hs0), ∃!(hs0, c2[c1]hs0))
  necon1ai((c1 ` c2), emptycls, ∃!(hs0, c2[c1]hs0))

}

blocks.name: fvbr0
blocks.content: Two possibilities for the behavior of a function value. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: fvrn0
blocks.content: A function value is a member of the range plus null. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)

} = {

  sselii(emptycls, cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)), csn(emptycls))

  snid(emptycls)

  sseldi(cfv(c0, c1), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)), crn(c0), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  ssun1(crn(c0), csn(emptycls))
  syl3anc(wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe), wbr(c1, c0, cfv(c0, c1)))
  con1i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, universe))

  ori(wbr(c1, c0, cfv(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  fvbr0(c1, c0)
  brelrng(c1, universe, cfv(c0, c1), universe, c0)
}

blocks.name: fvssunirn
blocks.content: The result of a function value is always a subset of the union of the range, even if it is invalid and thus empty. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

  elssuni(cfv(c0, c1), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)))
  3eqtri(cuni(cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls))), cuni(crn(c0)), cun(cuni(crn(c0)), cuni(csn(emptycls))), cun(cuni(crn(c0)), emptycls))
  uniun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls))
  uneq2i(cuni(crn(c0)), cuni(csn(emptycls)), emptycls)
  unisn(emptycls)
  0ex()
  un0(cuni(crn(c0)))
}

blocks.name: ndmfv
blocks.content: The value of a class outside its domain is the empty set. (An artifact of our function value definition.) (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)

  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, universe), weu(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ndmfvrcl

blocks.name: elfvdm
blocks.content: If a function value has a member, then the argument belongs to the domain. (An artifact of our function value definition.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 22-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: elfvex

blocks.name: elfvexd
blocks.content: If a function value has a member, then its argument is a set. Deduction form of ~ elfvex . (An artifact of our function value definition.) (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: eliman0

blocks.name: nfvres
blocks.content: The value of a non-member of a restriction is the empty set. (An artifact of our function value definition.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: nfunsn

  jctil(wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)), wrel(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wal(hs0, wmo(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: fvfundmfvn0
blocks.content: If the "value of a class" at an argument is not the empty set, then the argument is in the domain of the class and the class restricted to the singleton formed on that argument is a function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 13-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: 0fv
blocks.content: Function value of the empty set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: fv2prc
blocks.content: A function value of a function value at a proper class is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: elfv2ex
blocks.content: If a function value of a function value has a member, then the first argument is a set. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: fveqres
blocks.content: Equal values imply equal values in a restriction. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: csbfv12
blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of a function value. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.) (Revised by NM, 20-Aug-2018.)

  csbiota(s0, hs0, c0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  iotabidv(hs0, wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wbr(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, cv(hs0))))
  sbcbr123(s0, c0, c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  breq2d(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wcel(c0, universe))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, cv(hs0))

  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2))
  syl6req(emptycls, cfv(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), cfv(emptycls, csb(s0, c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq1d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c1)
  0fv(csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c1))
}

thm csbfv12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0](c1 ` c2)=([c0 / s0]c1 `[c0 / s0]c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i([c0 / s0](c1 ` c2)=([c0 / s0]c1 `[c0 / s0]c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  3eqtr4g([c0 / s0](c1 ` c2), ([c0 / s0]c1 `[c0 / s0]c2), [c0 / s0]iota(hs0, c2[c1]hs0), iota(hs0,[c0 / s0]c2[[c0 / s0]c1]hs0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]iota(hs0, c2[c1]hs0), iota(hs0,[c0 / s0]c2[[c0 / s0]c1]hs0), iota(hs0,[c0 / s0]c2[c1]hs0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbiota(s0, hs0, c0, c2[c1]hs0)
  iotabidv(hs0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]c2[c1]hs0, [c0 / s0]c2[[c0 / s0]c1]hs0)
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]c2[c1]hs0, [c0 / s0]c2[[c0 / s0]c1]hs0, [c0 / s0]c2[[c0 / s0]c1][c0 / s0]hs0)
  sbcbr123(s0, c0, c2, c1, hs0)
  breq2d([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]hs0, hs0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, hs0)
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, (c1 ` c2), iota(hs0, c2[c1]hs0))
  df-fv(hs0, c1, c2)
  df-fv(hs0, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2)
  eqtrd([c0 / s0](c1 ` c2), ([c0 / s0]c1 `[c0 / s0]c2), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, (c1 ` c2))
  syl6req(emptycls, ([c0 / s0]c1 `[c0 / s0]c2), (∅ `[c0 / s0]c2), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fveq1d([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c1)
  0fv([c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ 𝕌)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c1)
}

thm funbrfv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wi(wbr(c1, c0, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
} = {
  ex(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  mpcom(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylan(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wrel(c0))
  funrel(c0)
  brrelex2(c0, c1, c2)
  vtoclg(hs0, c2, universe, wi(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), wi(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, c0, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1, c0)
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0, c1))
  anabss7(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  sylan2(wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  funeu(hs0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  tz6.12-1(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wfun(c0), wbr(c1, c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, (Fun(c0)∧ c1[c0]hs0), (c0 ` c1)= hs0, (Fun(c0)∧ c1[c0]c2), (c0 ` c1)= c2)

thm fnbrfvb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2)))
  mpbii(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(c0, c2))
  vtocl(hs0, cfv(c0, c2), wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2)))), wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  fvex(c0, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2), c2, c0)
  syl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), weu(hs0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))))
  fneu(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  tz6.12c(hs0, c2, c0)
  breq2(cfv(c0, c2), c3, c2, c0)
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wi(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c3)))
  syl(wfn(c0, c1), wi(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c3)), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  funbrfv(c0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cfv(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm fnbrfvb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→((c0 ` c2)= c3 ↔ c2[c0]c3))
} = {
  impbid((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), (c0 ` c2)= c3, c2[c0]c3)
  syl5ibcom((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), (c0 ` c2)= c3, c2[c0]c3, c2[c0](c0 ` c2))
  mpbii((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), c2[c0](c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c2))
  eqid((c0 ` c2))
  vtocl(hs0, (c0 ` c2), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→((c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c2)↔ c2[c0](c0 ` c2))), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→((c0 ` c2)= hs0 ↔ c2[c0]hs0)))
  fvex(c0, c2)
  imbi2d(hs0 =(c0 ` c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), ((c0 ` c2)= hs0 ↔ c2[c0]hs0), ((c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c2)↔ c2[c0](c0 ` c2)))
  bibi12d(hs0 =(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c2)= hs0, c2[c0]hs0, (c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c2), c2[c0](c0 ` c2))
  eqeq2(hs0, (c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c2))
  breq2(hs0, (c0 ` c2), c2, c0)
  syl((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), ((c0 ` c2)= hs0 ↔ c2[c0]hs0), ∃!(hs0, c2[c0]hs0))
  fneu(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  tz6.12c(hs0, c2, c0)
  breq2((c0 ` c2), c3, c2, c0)
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈ c1, (c2[c0]c3 →(c0 ` c2)= c3))
  syl(c0[Fn]c1, (c2[c0]c3 →(c0 ` c2)= c3), Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  funbrfv(c0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w(((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→((c0 ` c2)=(c0 ` c2)↔ c2[c0](c0 ` c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm dffn5(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl6eqr(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  eqtrd(c0, copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), copab(s0, hs0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), wfn(c0, c1))
  sylib(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c0, copab(s0, hs0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))), wrel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  dfrel4v(s0, hs0, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, hs0, wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  bitr4d(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  pm4.71rd(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  pm5.32da(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))
  syl5bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c1))
  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  fneq1(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wfn(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
}

thm dffn5(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]c1 ↔ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(c0[Fn]c1, c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  syl6eqr(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 =(c0 ` s0))}, c0[Fn]c1)
  eqtrd(c0, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 =(c0 ` s0))}, { < s0, hs0 > | s0[c0]hs0 }, c0[Fn]c1)
  sylib(c0[Fn]c1, c0 = { < s0, hs0 > | s0[c0]hs0 }, Rel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  dfrel4v(s0, hs0, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, hs0, c0[Fn]c1, s0[c0]hs0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 =(c0 ` s0)))
  bitr4d(c0[Fn]c1, s0[c0]hs0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 =(c0 ` s0)), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[c0]hs0))
  pm4.71rd(c0[Fn]c1, s0[c0]hs0, s0 ∈ c1)
  ex(c0[Fn]c1, s0[c0]hs0, s0 ∈ c1)
  fnbr(c0, c1, s0, hs0)
  pm5.32da(c0[Fn]c1, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0), s0[c0]hs0)
  syl5bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), hs0 =(c0 ` s0), s0[c0]hs0, (c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  eqcom(hs0, (c0 ` s0))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, s0, hs0)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, (c0 ` s0))
  mpbiri(c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)), c0[Fn]c1, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0))[Fn]c1)
  fnmpti(s0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)), c1, (c0 ` s0))
  fvex(c0, s0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  fneq1(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)), c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Fn]c1)

blocks.name: fnrnfv
blocks.content: The range of a function expressed as a collection of the function's values. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnrnfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), crn(cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  sylbi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), crn(cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  dffn5(s1, c0, c1)
  rneq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  rnmpt(s0, s1, cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnrnfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]c1 → ran(c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq(ran(c0), { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, ran((s1 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s1))), c0[Fn]c1)

thm feqresmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl6eq(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  feqmptd(s0, cres(c0, c1), c1, c3, w0)
  fssresd(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvres(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm fvelimab(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  vtoclg(hs0, c3, universe, wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c3, cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))), wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(c3, cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))

thm fvelimab(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(c3 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= c3)))

  pm5.21nd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c3 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= c3), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  anim2i((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), c3 ∈(c0 " c2), c3 ∈ 𝕌)

  vtoclg(hs0, c3, universe, ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(c3 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= c3))), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c3, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), (hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)), (c3 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= c3)))
  bibi12d(hs0 = c3, hs0 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= hs0), c3 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= c3))

  abeq2d(hs0, (c0 " c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  syl2an2r(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, (c0 " c2)= { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)}, Fun(c0), c2 ⊆ dom(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  biimpar(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ dom(c0))
  sseq2d(c2, dom(c0), c1, c0[Fn]c1)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  dfimafn(hs0, s0, c0, c2)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: fniinfv
blocks.content: The indexed intersection of a function's values is the intersection of its range. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm fniinfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cint(crn(c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cint(crn(c0)), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  inteqd(crn(c0), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  dfiin2(s0, hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fniinfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]c1 → ⋂(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0))= ⋂ ran(c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(⋂(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)), ⋂ ran(c0), ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))}, c0[Fn]c1)
  inteqd(ran(c0), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))}, c0[Fn]c1)
  fnrnfv(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  dfiin2(s0, hs0, c1, (c0 ` s0))
  fvex(c0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` s0))
}

blocks.name: fnsnfv

thm fnsnfv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cima(c0, csn(c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cima(c0, csn(c2)), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2))), cab(hs0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  abbidv(hs0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)))
  syl5bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)))))
  df-sn(hs0, cfv(c0, c2))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cab(hs0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cab(hs0, wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)))), wrel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  relimasn(hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnsnfv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ {(c0 ` c2)} =(c0 " { c2 }))
} = {
  3eqtr4d({(c0 ` c2)}, (c0 " { c2 }), { hs0 | hs0 =(c0 ` c2)}, { hs0 | c2[c0]hs0 }, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  abbidv(hs0, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), hs0 =(c0 ` c2), c2[c0]hs0)
  syl5bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), hs0 =(c0 ` c2), c2[c0]hs0, (c0 ` c2)= hs0)
  eqcom(hs0, (c0 ` c2))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  a1i((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), {(c0 ` c2)} = { hs0 | hs0 =(c0 ` c2)})
  df-sn(hs0, (c0 ` c2))
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈ c1, (c0 " { c2 })= { hs0 | c2[c0]hs0 })
  syl(c0[Fn]c1, (c0 " { c2 })= { hs0 | c2[c0]hs0 }, Rel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  relimasn(hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: opabiotafun
blocks.content: Define a function whose value is "the unique ` y ` such that ` ph ( x , y ) ` ". (Contributed by NM, 19-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabiotafun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wfun(c0)
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wfun(c0), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wfun(c0), diffsc(s1, c0))
  mpbir(wfun(c0), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  mpgbir(s0, wfun(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))))), wmo(s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  funopab(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))))
  mpbir(wmo(s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1)))), wmo(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  mpg(hs0, wmo(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cab(s1, w0)))))
  mo2icl(hs0, cuni(cab(s1, w0)), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  syl6req(cv(hs0), cuni(cab(s1, w0)), cuni(csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  unieq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  unisn(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  cbvmo(s1, hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))))
  nfeq1(s1, cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfab1(s1, w0)
  eqeq2d(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1)), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  funeqi(c0, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cab(s1, w0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s1))))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabiotafun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ Fun(c0)
  ⊣ c0 = { < s0, s1 > | { s1 | w0 } = { s1 } }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(Fun(c0), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(Fun(c0), d(s1, c0))
  mpbir(Fun(c0), Fun({ < s0, s1 > | { s1 | w0 } = { s1 } }))
  mpgbir(s0, Fun({ < s0, s1 > | { s1 | w0 } = { s1 } }), ∃*(s1, { s1 | w0 } = { s1 }))
  funopab(s0, s1, { s1 | w0 } = { s1 })
  mpbir(∃*(s1, { s1 | w0 } = { s1 }), ∃*(hs0, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 }))
  mpg(hs0, ∃*(hs0, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 }), ({ s1 | w0 } = { hs0 } → hs0 = ⋃ { s1 | w0 }))
  mo2icl(hs0, ⋃ { s1 | w0 }, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  syl6req(hs0, ⋃ { s1 | w0 }, ⋃ { hs0 }, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  unieq({ s1 | w0 }, { hs0 })
  unisn(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  cbvmo(s1, hs0, { s1 | w0 } = { s1 }, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  nfv(hs0, { s1 | w0 } = { s1 })
  nfeq1(s1, { s1 | w0 }, { hs0 })
  nfab1(s1, w0)
  eqeq2d({ s1 | w0 }, { s1 }, { hs0 }, s1 = hs0)
  sneq(s1, hs0)
  funeqi(c0, { < s0, s1 > | { s1 | w0 } = { s1 } })
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ { s1 | w0 })
  diff.hs0.w({ s1 | w0 } = { s1 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: opabiota
blocks.content: Define a function whose value is "the unique ` y ` such that ` ph ( x , y ) ` ". (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabiota(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, w0)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s1, s0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  vtoclga(s1, c0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, w0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1), cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s1), c0, c1)
  iotabidv(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0), w1, w0)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1)), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  eldm(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  exlimi(s0, wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1)))
  nfeq2(s0, cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1))
  nfiota1(s0, w1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cio(s0, w1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))
  ax-mp(wi(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wfun(c1))
  opabiotafun(s1, s0, c1, w1)
  funbrfv(c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  mpbid(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(s0)), w1)
  sylbi(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), w1, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), copab(s1, s0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))))))
  df-br(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))
  eleq2i(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1, copab(s1, s0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  opabid(s1, s0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))))
  sylib(wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))), w1, wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w1)))
  syl5eleqr(cv(s0), cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))))
  vsnid(s0)
  id(wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(s0))))
  abid(s0, w1)
  syl(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wb(w1, wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(s0))), weu(s0, w1))
  sylib(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), weu(s0, w1), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c1)))
  breldm(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  abeq2i(s1, cdm(c1), weu(s0, w1))
  opabiotadm(s1, s0, c1, w1)
  iota1(s0, w1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, w0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
  diff.cio.s(s1, s0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabiota(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(c1)→(c1 ` c0)= iota(s0, w0))
  ⊣ c1 = { < s1, s0 > | { s0 | w1 } = { s0 } }
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  vtoclga(s1, c0, dom(c1), (c1 ` c0)= iota(s0, w0), (c1 ` s1)= iota(s0, w1))
  eqeq12d((c1 ` s1), iota(s0, w1), (c1 ` c0), iota(s0, w0), s1 = c0)
  fveq2(s1, c0, c1)
  iotabidv(s0, s1 = c0, w1, w0)
  sylbi(s1 ∈ dom(c1), (c1 ` s1)= iota(s0, w1), ∃(s0, s1[c1]s0))
  eldm(s0, s1, c1)
  exlimi(s0, s1[c1]s0, (c1 ` s1)= iota(s0, w1))
  nfeq2(s0, (c1 ` s1), iota(s0, w1))
  nfiota1(s0, w1)
  eqtr4d((c1 ` s1), iota(s0, w1), s0, s1[c1]s0)
  ax-mp((s1[c1]s0 →(c1 ` s1)= s0), Fun(c1))
  opabiotafun(s1, s0, c1, w1)
  funbrfv(c1, s1, s0)
  mpbid(s1[c1]s0, iota(s0, w1)= s0, w1)
  sylbi(s1[c1]s0, w1, { s0 | w1 } = { s0 })
  3bitri(s1[c1]s0, { s0 | w1 } = { s0 }, < s1, s0 > ∈ c1, < s1, s0 > ∈ { < s1, s0 > | { s0 | w1 } = { s0 } })
  df-br(s1, c1, s0)
  eleq2i(< s1, s0 >, c1, { < s1, s0 > | { s0 | w1 } = { s0 } })
  opabid(s1, s0, { s0 | w1 } = { s0 })
  sylib({ s0 | w1 } = { s0 }, w1, s0 ∈ { s0 | w1 })
  syl5eleqr(s0, { s0 | w1 }, { s0 }, { s0 | w1 } = { s0 })
  vsnid(s0)
  id({ s0 | w1 } = { s0 })
  abid(s0, w1)
  syl(s1[c1]s0, (w1 ↔ iota(s0, w1)= s0), ∃!(s0, w1))
  sylib(s1[c1]s0, ∃!(s0, w1), s1 ∈ dom(c1))
  breldm(s1, c1, s0)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  abeq2i(s1, dom(c1), ∃!(s0, w1))
  opabiotadm(s1, s0, c1, w1)
  iota1(s0, w1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c1 ` c0), iota(s0, w0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
  diff.cio.s(s1, s0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fnimapr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cima(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cpr(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cima(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cpr(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c0, csn(c3))), cun(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), csn(cfv(c0, c3))), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  eqcomd(cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c0, csn(c3))), cun(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), csn(cfv(c0, c3))), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  uneq12d(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), csn(cfv(c0, c3)), cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c0, csn(c3)), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  3adant3(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cima(c0, csn(c2))))
  fnsnfv(c0, c1, c2)
  3adant2(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c3)), cima(c0, csn(c3))))
  fnsnfv(c0, c1, c3)
  eqtri(cima(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c0, csn(c3))), cima(c0, cun(csn(c2), csn(c3))))
  imaeq2i(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cun(csn(c2), csn(c3)))
  df-pr(c2, c3)
  imaundi(c0, csn(c2), csn(c3))
  df-pr(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c3))
}

blocks.name: ssimaex
blocks.content: The existence of a subimage. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2007.)

  ex(Fun(c0), hs1 ∈(c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }), ∃(hs2 ∈ { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 },(c0 ` hs2)= hs1))
  fvelima(hs2, c0, hs1, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 })
  rexlimiv(hs2, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, (c0 ` hs2)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  sylbi(hs2 ∈ { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, ((c0 ` hs2)= hs1 → hs1 ∈ c1), (hs2 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))∧(c0 ` hs2)∈ c1))
  elrab(hs0, hs2, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)∈ c1, (c0 ` hs2)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((c0 ` hs0), c1, (c0 ` hs2), hs0 = hs2)
  fveq2(hs0, hs2, c0)
  adantl(hs2 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs2)∈ c1, ((c0 ` hs2)= hs1 → hs1 ∈ c1))
  biimpcd((c0 ` hs2)∈ c1, (c0 ` hs2)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  eleq1((c0 ` hs2), hs1, c1)
  spcev(s0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, ({ hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 } ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))∧ c1 =(c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 })), (s0 ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))∧ c1 =(c0 " s0)))
  rabex(hs0, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)∈ c1)
  inex1(c2, dom(c0))
  anbi12d(s0 = { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, s0 ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), c1 =(c0 " s0), { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 } ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), c1 =(c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }))
  sseq1(s0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  eqeq2d(c1, (c0 " s0), (c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }), s0 = { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 })
  imaeq2(s0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, c0)
  eximi(s0, (s0 ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))∧ c1 =(c0 " s0)), (s0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 =(c0 " s0)))
  anim1i(s0 ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), c1 =(c0 " s0), s0 ⊆ c2)
  mpan2(s0 ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), s0 ⊆ c2, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0))⊆ c2)
  inss1(c2, dom(c0))
  sstr(s0, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }))
  diff.hs1.w((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆(c0 "(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c((c2 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` hs2)∈ c1)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 })
  diff.wa.s(s0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 } ⊆(c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), c1 =(c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }))
  diff.wss.s(s0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, (c0 " { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 }))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, { hs0 ∈(c2 ⋂ dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1 })
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, (c2 ⋂ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)∈ c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c2, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ssimaexg
blocks.content: The existence of a subimage. (Contributed by FL, 15-Apr-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssimaexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))), wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0))), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0)))
  sseq2d(c3, cima(c2, cv(hs0)), cima(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0))), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  ssimaex(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wfun(c2), wss(c3, cima(c2, c0))), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, cima(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssimaexg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " c0))→ ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ c1, Fun(c2), c3 ⊆(c2 " c0), ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, ((Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " c0))→ ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0)))), ((Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " hs0))→ ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0)))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " hs0)), ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0))), (Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " c0)), ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0))))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, Fun(c2), c3 ⊆(c2 " hs0), c3 ⊆(c2 " c0))
  sseq2d(c3, (c2 " hs0), (c2 " c0), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq2(hs0, c0, c2)
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (s0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0)), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, s0 ⊆ hs0, c3 =(c2 " s0), s0 ⊆ c0)
  sseq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  ssimaex(s0, c2, c3, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(((Fun(c2)∧ c3 ⊆(c2 " c0))→ ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 =(c2 " s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: funfv
blocks.content: A simplified expression for the value of a function when we know it is a function. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wfun(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
  syl5eqr(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), cuni(csn(cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  unisn(cfv(c0, c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  unieqd(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylanbr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  mpbiran2(wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  df-fn(c0, cdm(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c1))), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  unieqd(cima(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmima(c1, c0)
  uni0()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funfv(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(c0 ` c1)= ⋃(c0 " { c1 }))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(Fun(c0), (c0 ` c1)= ⋃(c0 " { c1 }), c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  ex(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ dom(c0), (c0 ` c1)= ⋃(c0 " { c1 }))
  syl5eqr((c0 ` c1), ⋃(c0 " { c1 }), ⋃ {(c0 ` c1)}, (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
  unisn((c0 ` c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  unieqd({(c0 ` c1)}, (c0 " { c1 }), (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
  sylanbr(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ dom(c0), {(c0 ` c1)} =(c0 " { c1 }), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  mpbiran2(c0[Fn]dom(c0), Fun(c0), dom(c0)= dom(c0))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  df-fn(c0, dom(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, dom(c0), c1)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), ⋃(c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6eq(⋃(c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ⋃ ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  unieqd((c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  ndmima(c1, c0)
  uni0()
}

blocks.name: funfv2
blocks.content: The value of a function. Definition of function value in [Enderton] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1998.)

blocks.name: funfv2f
blocks.content: The value of a function. Version of ~ funfv2 using a bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfv2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cab(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))), cuni(cab(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))), wfun(c0))
  funfv2(hs0, c0, c1)
  unieqi(cab(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), cab(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  cbvab(hs0, s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  nfbr(s0, c1, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funfv2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(c0 ` c1)= ⋃ { s0 | c1[c0]s0 })
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq((c0 ` c1), ⋃ { s0 | c1[c0]s0 }, ⋃ { hs0 | c1[c0]hs0 }, Fun(c0))
  funfv2(hs0, c0, c1)
  unieqi({ hs0 | c1[c0]hs0 }, { s0 | c1[c0]s0 })
  cbvab(hs0, s0, c1[c0]hs0, c1[c0]s0)
  nfbr(s0, c1, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, c1[c0]s0)
  breq2(hs0, s0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[c0]s0)
}

blocks.name: fvun
blocks.content: Value of the union of two functions when the domains are separate. (Contributed by FL, 7-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), cuni(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2))), cuni(cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  syl(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, c1), c2), cuni(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)))), wfun(cun(c0, c1)))
  funun(c0, c1)
  funfv(cun(c0, c1), c2)
  unieqd(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cun(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
  imaundir(c0, c1, csn(c2))
  syl5eq(cuni(cun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), cun(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2)))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)))
  uniun(cima(c0, csn(c2)), cima(c1, csn(c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls)), wceq(cun(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2)))), cun(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))), wa(wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))))
  adantr(wa(wfun(c0), wfun(c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)), emptycls), wa(wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))))
  anim12i(wfun(c0), wfun(c1), wceq(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2)))
  eqcomd(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2), wfun(c0))
  funfv(c0, c2)
  eqcomd(cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2), wfun(c1))
  funfv(c1, c2)
  uneq12(cuni(cima(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c2), cuni(cima(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2))
}

blocks.name: fvun1
blocks.content: The value of a union when the argument is in the first domain. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvun1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, c2), c4), cfv(c0, c4)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cun(c0, c2), c4), cfv(c0, c4), cun(cfv(c0, c4), cfv(c2, c4)), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl21anc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, c2), c4), cun(cfv(c0, c4), cfv(c2, c4))), wfun(c0), wfun(c2), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1)), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant2(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1)), wfun(c2))
  fnfun(c2, c3)
  3impia(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
  adantrd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wcel(c4, c1), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
  biimprd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
  eqeq1d(cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), emptycls, cin(c1, c3), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)))
  ineqan12d(cdm(c0), cdm(c2), c1, c3, wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3))

thm fvun1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1))→((c0 ⋃ c2)` c4)=(c0 ` c4))
} = {
  eqtrd(((c0 ⋃ c2)` c4), (c0 ` c4), ((c0 ` c4)⋃(c2 ` c4)), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)))
  syl21anc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)), ((c0 ⋃ c2)` c4)=((c0 ` c4)⋃(c2 ` c4)), Fun(c0), Fun(c2), (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅)
  3ad2ant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1), Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant2(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1), Fun(c2))
  fnfun(c2, c3)

  adantrd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), (c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅, c4 ∈ c1, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅)
  biimprd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), (c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅)
  eqeq1d((dom(c0)⋂ dom(c2)), emptycls, (c1 ⋂ c3), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3))
  ineqan12d(dom(c0), dom(c2), c1, c3, c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  fvun(c0, c2, c4)
  syl6eq(((c0 ` c4)⋃(c2 ` c4)), (c0 ` c4), ((c0 ` c4)⋃ ∅), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)))
  uneq2d((c0 ` c4), (c2 ` c4), emptycls, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)))
  syl((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)), (c2 ` c4)= ∅, ¬ c4 ∈ dom(c2))
  3adant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1), ¬ c4 ∈ dom(c2))
  mtbird((c2[Fn]c3 ∧((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1)), c4 ∈ dom(c2), c4 ∈ c3)
  adantl(c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1), ¬ c4 ∈ c3)
  disjel(c1, c3, c4)
  adantr(c2[Fn]c3, ((c1 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧ c4 ∈ c1), (c4 ∈ dom(c2)↔ c4 ∈ c3))
  eleq2d(c4, dom(c2), c3, c2[Fn]c3)

}

  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(<(c0 ` c1), hs1 > ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
}

blocks.name: fvco2
blocks.content: Value of a function composition. Similar to second part of Theorem 3H of [Enderton] p. 47. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), c2), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(ccom(c3, c0), c2), cfv(c3, cfv(c0, c2)), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)))), cio(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  iotabidv(hs0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2)))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl6reqr(cima(ccom(c3, c0), csn(c2)), cima(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), cima(c3, cima(c0, csn(c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  imaeq2d(c3, csn(cfv(c0, c2)), cima(c0, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fnsnfv(c0, c1, c2)
  imaco(c3, c0, csn(c2))
  dffv3(hs0, ccom(c3, c0), c2)
  dffv3(hs0, c3, cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c3, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→((c3 ∘ c0)` c2)=(c3 `(c0 ` c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(((c3 ∘ c0)` c2), (c3 `(c0 ` c2)), iota(hs0, hs0 ∈((c3 ∘ c0)" { c2 })), iota(hs0, hs0 ∈(c3 " {(c0 ` c2)})), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  iotabidv(hs0, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈((c3 ∘ c0)" { c2 }), hs0 ∈(c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}))
  eleq2d(hs0, ((c3 ∘ c0)" { c2 }), (c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  syl6reqr(((c3 ∘ c0)" { c2 }), (c3 " {(c0 ` c2)}), (c3 "(c0 " { c2 })), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  imaeq2d(c3, {(c0 ` c2)}, (c0 " { c2 }), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  fnsnfv(c0, c1, c2)
  imaco(c3, c0, { c2 })
  dffv3(hs0, (c3 ∘ c0), c2)
  dffv3(hs0, c3, (c0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ∘ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c2))
}

blocks.name: fvco4i
blocks.content: Conditions for a composition to be expandable without conditions on the argument. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvco4i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(emptycls, cfv(c0, emptycls))
  -| wfun(c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wfn(c1, cdm(c1)))
  mpbi(wfn(c1, cdm(c1)), wfun(c1))
  funfn(c1)
  fvco2(c1, cdm(c1), c2, c0)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), emptycls, cfv(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
  syl(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1)))))
  con3i(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1))))
  sseli(c2, cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1))
  dmcoss(c0, c1)
  ndmfv(c2, ccom(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvco4i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∘ c1)` c2)=(c0 `(c1 ` c2))
  ⊣ ∅ =(c0 ` ∅)
  ⊣ Fun(c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(((c0 ∘ c1)` c2)=(c0 `(c1 ` c2)), c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  mpan(c2 ∈ dom(c1), ((c0 ∘ c1)` c2)=(c0 `(c1 ` c2)), c1[Fn]dom(c1))
  mpbi(c1[Fn]dom(c1), Fun(c1))
  funfn(c1)
  fvco2(c1, dom(c1), c2, c0)
  3eqtr4a(((c0 ∘ c1)` c2), (c0 `(c1 ` c2)), emptycls, (c0 ` ∅), ¬ c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  syl(¬ c2 ∈ dom(c1), ((c0 ∘ c1)` c2)= ∅, ¬ c2 ∈ dom((c0 ∘ c1)))
  con3i(c2 ∈ dom(c1), c2 ∈ dom((c0 ∘ c1)))
  sseli(c2, dom((c0 ∘ c1)), dom(c1))
  dmcoss(c0, c1)
  ndmfv(c2, (c0 ∘ c1))
  fveq2d(c0, (c1 ` c2), emptycls, ¬ c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: fvopab3g
blocks.content: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvopab3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), weu(s1, w1))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(c0, c1), w2)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, c1), w2, w0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wfn(c4, c1))
  fnopab(s0, s1, c4, c1, w1)
  fnopfvb(c4, c1, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0)))
  ibar(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvopab3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((c4 ` c0)= c2 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 →(w2 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 → ∃!(s1, w1))
  ⊣ c4 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c4 ` c0)= c2, w0, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w2))
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, s0 ∈ c1, w1, c0 ∈ c1, w2)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  anbi2d(s1 = c2, c0 ∈ c1, w2, w0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ((c4 ` c0)= c2 ↔ < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)}))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ c1, (c4 ` c0)= c2, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)}, < c0, c2 > ∈ c4)
  mpan(c0 ∈ c1, ((c4 ` c0)= c2 ↔ < c0, c2 > ∈ c4), c4[Fn]c1)
  fnopab(s0, s1, c4, c1, w1)
  fnopfvb(c4, c1, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(< c0, c2 >, c4, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)})
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (w0 ↔(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)))
  ibar(c0 ∈ c1, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fvopab3ig
blocks.content: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvopab3ig(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wmo(s1, w1))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))))
  pm2.43a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))))
  exp43(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1), w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(c0, c1), w2)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, c1), w2, w0)
  syl5eq(cfv(c4, c0), c2, cfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), c0), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  fveq1i(c4, c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wceq(cfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), c0), c2)), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  mpgbir(s0, wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  funopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  mpbir(wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wmo(s1, w1)))
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)
  funopfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: brfvopabrbr
blocks.content: The binary relation of a function value which is an ordered-pair class abstraction of a restricted binary relation is the restricted binary relation. The first hypothesis can often be obtained by using ~ fvmptopab . (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm brfvopabrbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0))
  -| wceq(cfv(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1)))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c3)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wrel(cfv(c4, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  3jca(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  brne0(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  necon1ai(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))
  fvprc(c2, c1)
  brrelex1i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)
  relopabi(s0, s1, cfv(c1, c2), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), w0, w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  3jca(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wbr(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(c4, c2), emptycls))
  brne0(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  necon1ai(cfv(c4, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))
  fvprc(c2, c4)
  brrelex1i(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, cfv(c4, c2), c3)
  rbropap(s0, s1, c0, universe, c3, universe, cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c4, c2), wcel(c2, universe), w0, w1)
  a1i(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c2), cv(s1)), w1))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brfvopabrbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0[(c1 ` c2)]c3 ↔(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3 ∧ w0))
  ⊣ (c1 ` c2)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c4 ` c2)]s1 ∧ w1)}
  ⊣ ((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c3)→(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ Rel((c4 ` c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0[(c1 ` c2)]c3, (c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3 ∧ w0), (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  3jca(c0[(c1 ` c2)]c3, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(c0[(c1 ` c2)]c3, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 ` c2)≠ ∅)
  brne0(c0, (c1 ` c2), c3)
  necon1ai((c1 ` c2), emptycls, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c2, c1)
  brrelex1i(c0, (c1 ` c2), c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, (c1 ` c2), c3)
  relopabi(s0, s1, (c1 ` c2), (s0[(c4 ` c2)]s1 ∧ w1))
  adantr(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3, w0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  3jca(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(c0[(c4 ` c2)]c3, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c4 ` c2)≠ ∅)
  brne0(c0, (c4 ` c2), c3)
  necon1ai((c4 ` c2), emptycls, c2 ∈ 𝕌)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c4, c2)
}

thm fvmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

thm fvmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 ` c0)= c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c5 = c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {

  eqid(c2)
  fvopab3ig(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c2 = c2, hs0 = c5, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c5, c2, s0 = c0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, c2)
  a1i(s0 ∈ c1, ∃*(hs0, hs0 = c5))
  moeq(hs0, c5)
  eqtri(c4, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 = c5)}, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c5))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c2)

}

thm fvmpti(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3), c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, universe, c2, c4)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cfv(cid, c3), c3))
  fvi(c3, universe)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cid, c3), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe))))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls))
  syl6bir(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c2))))
  notbid(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c3, universe))
  baib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elrab2(s0, c0, cdm(c2), c1, wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  eleq1d(c4, universe, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  dmmpt(s0, c2, c1, c4)
  ndmfv(c0, c2)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(cid, c3), emptycls))
  fvprc(c3, cid)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpti(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` c0)=(= ` c3))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c4 = c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ` c0)=(= ` c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqtr4d((c2 ` c0), (= ` c3), c3, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  fvmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3, universe, c2, c4)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ 𝕌, (= ` c3)= c3)
  fvi(c3, universe)
  eqtr4d((c2 ` c0), (= ` c3), emptycls, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌, (c2 ` c0)= ∅)
  syl6bir(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌, (c2 ` c0)= ∅, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(c2))
  notbid(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ dom(c2), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  baib(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ dom(c2), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  elrab2(s0, c0, dom(c2), c1, c3 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1d(c4, universe, c3, s0 = c0)
  dmmpt(s0, c2, c1, c4)
  ndmfv(c0, c2)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌, (= ` c3)= ∅)
  fvprc(c3, cid)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm fvmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), c1), csb(s0, c1, c4), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), c1), csb(s0, c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(csb(s0, c1, c4), c5))
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, c1, c4), c5, c2, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, c1, c3, c4, c5, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  csbied(s0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c1)→ c4 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` c1), [c1 / s0]c4, w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` c1)=[c1 / s0]c4, c1 ∈ c3, [c1 / s0]c4 ∈ c5)
  eqeltrd([c1 / s0]c4, c5, c2, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, c1, c3, c4, c5, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  csbied(s0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}
