blocks.name: fvmptss
blocks.content: If all the values of the mapping are subsets of a class ` C ` , then so is any evaluation of the mapping, even if ` D ` is not in the base set ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  sylan2(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2), wcel(c4, c0))
  sseli(c4, cdm(c3), c0)
  dmmptss(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  impcom(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c0), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  vtoclga(hs0, c4, c0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2))
  sseq1d(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(c3, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c3)
  vtoclgaf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2)))
  nfim(s0, wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfra1(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
  nfss(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nffv(s0, c3, cv(hs0))
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseq1d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c3)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2))
  syl5ss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))))
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)))
  rabeq2i(s0, cdm(c3), c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, universe, c3)
  eqimss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)
  syl6eqss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c3))))
  ndmfv(cv(s0), c3)
  0ss(c1)
  impcom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(c1, c2))
  rsp(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
  syl6eqss(cfv(c3, c4), c2, emptycls, wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))))
  adantl(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), emptycls))
  ndmfv(c4, c3)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c4), c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c4)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` c4)⊆ c2, c4 ∈ dom(c3))
  sylan2(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), c4 ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` c4)⊆ c2, c4 ∈ c0)
  sseli(c4, dom(c3), c0)
  dmmptss(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  impcom(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), c4 ∈ c0, (c3 ` c4)⊆ c2)
  vtoclga(hs0, c4, c0, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c4)⊆ c2), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` hs0)⊆ c2))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c4, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` hs0)⊆ c2, (c3 ` c4)⊆ c2)
  sseq1d((c3 ` hs0), c2, (c3 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, c3)
  vtoclgaf(s0, hs0, c0, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` hs0)⊆ c2), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` s0)⊆ c2))
  nfim(s0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` hs0)⊆ c2)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  nfss(s0, (c3 ` hs0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c3, hs0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` s0)⊆ c2, (c3 ` hs0)⊆ c2)
  sseq1d((c3 ` s0), c2, (c3 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c3)
  ex(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` s0)⊆ c2)
  syl5ss((c3 ` s0), c2, c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)))
  pm2.61i((c3 ` s0)⊆ c1, s0 ∈ dom(c3))
  sylbi(s0 ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` s0)⊆ c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  rabeq2i(s0, dom(c3), c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmmpt(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  syl((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (c3 ` s0)⊆ c1, (c3 ` s0)= c1)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, universe, c3)
  eqimss((c3 ` s0), c1)
  syl6eqss((c3 ` s0), c1, emptycls, ¬ s0 ∈ dom(c3))
  ndmfv(s0, c3)
  0ss(c1)
  impcom(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), c1 ⊆ c2)
  rsp(s0, c0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  syl6eqss((c3 ` c4), c2, emptycls, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ¬ c4 ∈ dom(c3)))
  adantl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), ¬ c4 ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` c4)= ∅)
  ndmfv(c4, c3)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c4)⊆ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmpt2d
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmpt2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0))))
  fveq1d(c1, cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  syl2an2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c3))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmpt2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c1 ` s0)= c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1 ` s0), c2, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (c1 ` s0)=((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` s0))
  fveq1d(c1, s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), w0)
  syl2an2(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` s0)= c2, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c3)
  id(s0 ∈ c0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c2, c3, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
}

blocks.name: fvmptex
blocks.content: Express a function ` F ` whose value ` B ` may not always be a set in terms of another function ` G ` for which sethood is guaranteed. (Note that ` ( _I `` B ) ` is just shorthand for ` if ( B e. _V , B , (/) ) ` , and it is always a set by ~ fvex .) Note also that these functions are not the same; wherever ` B ( C ) ` is not a set, ` C ` is not in the domain of ` F ` (so it evaluates to the empty set), but ` C ` is in the domain of ` G ` , and ` G ( C ) ` is defined to be the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cid, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c3))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c3))
  fvmpti(hs0, c1, c3, c0, csb(s0, c1, c4), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)), cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c3, c2, cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)), cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)))
  fveq2d(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4), csb(s0, c1, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c4)
  eqtri(c2, cmpt(hs0, c3, cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))), cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cid, c4)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, cfv(cid, c4), cfv(cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4)))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(cid, c4))
  nffv(s0, cid, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4))
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  fveq2d(cid, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  fvex(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, c3)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  con3i(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sseli(c1, cdm(c0), c3)
  dmmptss(s0, c0, c3, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  sylnbir(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)))
  eleq2i(c1, cdm(c2), c3)
  dmmpti(s0, c2, c3, cfv(cid, c4))
  fvex(cid, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c1, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cid, csb(s0, c1, c4)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cid, c4))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)=(c2 ` c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦(= ` c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)=(c2 ` c1), c1 ∈ c3)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), (c2 ` c1), (= `[c1 / s0]c4), c1 ∈ c3)
  fvmpti(hs0, c1, c3, c0, [c1 / s0]c4, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ↦[hs0 / s0]c4), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, c4, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c3, c2, (= `[c1 / s0]c4), (= `[hs0 / s0]c4))
  fveq2d(cid, [hs0 / s0]c4, [c1 / s0]c4, hs0 = c1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c1, c4)
  eqtri(c2, (hs0 ∈ c3 ↦(= `[hs0 / s0]c4)), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦(= ` c4)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c3, (= ` c4), (= `[hs0 / s0]c4))
  nfcv(hs0, (= ` c4))
  nffv(s0, cid, [hs0 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c4)
  fveq2d(cid, c4, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c4)
  fvex(cid, [c1 / s0]c4)
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), (c2 ` c1), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ c3)
  syl(¬ c1 ∈ c3, (c0 ` c1)= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  con3i(c1 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  sseli(c1, dom(c0), c3)
  dmmptss(s0, c0, c3, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  sylnbir(c1 ∈ c3, (c2 ` c1)= ∅, c1 ∈ dom(c2))
  eleq2i(c1, dom(c2), c3)
  dmmpti(s0, c2, c3, (= ` c4))
  fvex(cid, c4)
  ndmfv(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c([c1 / s0]c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((= `[c1 / s0]c4))
  diff.hs0.c((= ` c4))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd3f
blocks.content: Alternate deduction version of ~ fvmpt with three non-freeness hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by AV, 19-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptd3f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c2), w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  exlimdd(s0, w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  nfim(s0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1)
  nfeq(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  sylib(w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elexd(c3, c1, w0)
  isset(s0, c3)
  syl5(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w1, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)))
  fveq1(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)
  sylbid(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), w1, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c2))
  eqeq2d(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), c2, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  fveq2d(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0), c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, c4))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c1, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c3, c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c2, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptd3f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)→ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c3)→ c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c3)→((c0 ` c3)= c2 → w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  exlimdd(s0, w0, (c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)→ w1), s0 = c3)
  nfim(s0, c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w1)
  nfeq(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0, s0 = c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  elexd(c3, c1, w0)
  isset(s0, c3)
  syl5((w0 ∧ s0 = c3), c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w1, (c0 ` c3)=((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` c3))
  fveq1(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c3)
  sylbid((w0 ∧ s0 = c3), (c0 ` c3)=((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` c3), w1, (c0 ` c3)= c2)
  eqeq2d((c0 ` c3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` c3), c2, (w0 ∧ s0 = c3))
  eqtr3d(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` c3), c2, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 = c3))
  fveq2d((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), s0, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 = c3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` s0)= c2, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c4)
  eqeltrd(s0, c1, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c3))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c3, c3 ∈ c1)
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c2, c4, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
}

thm fvmptt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, c0), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))))
  fveq1d(c3, c0, cmpt(s0, c4, c1), w3a(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))))
  simp2(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5)))
  3adant2(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  imp32(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  syl5bi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, c4), wi(wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  risset(s0, c0, c4)
  syl7(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c5)
  rexlimd(s0, c4, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))
  nfa1(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c2, universe))
  nfeq1(s0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)
  nffvmpt1(s0, c4, c1, c0)
  sps(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))))
  com23(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2)))
  a2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))))
  exp43(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), c0), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c1, universe))
  simprl(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c2, universe))

blocks.name: fvmptf
blocks.content: Value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction. This version of ~ fvmptg uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impel(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  vtoclgaf(s0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2)), wi(wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  nfel1(s0, c2, universe)
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c4, c0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c4, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c5)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  eleq1d(c5, universe, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c4, c0), c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, c4)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c5, universe), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5))
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c5, universe, c4)
  elex(c2, c3)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 ` c0)= c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c5 = c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impel(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c4 ` c0)= c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  vtoclgaf(s0, c0, c1, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 →(c4 ` c0)= c2), (c5 ∈ 𝕌 →(c4 ` s0)= c5))
  nfim(s0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c4 ` c0)= c2)
  nfel1(s0, c2, universe)
  nfeq(s0, (c4 ` c0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c4, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c5))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c5)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, c5 ∈ 𝕌, (c4 ` s0)= c5, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c4 ` c0)= c2)
  eleq1d(c5, universe, c2, s0 = c0)
  eqeq12d((c4 ` s0), c5, (c4 ` c0), c2, s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c4)
  ex(s0 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ 𝕌, (c4 ` s0)= c5)
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c5, universe, c4)
  elex(c2, c3)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptnf
blocks.content: The value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction is the empty set when the class it would otherwise map to is a proper class. This version of ~ fvmptn uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  syl5(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, c4))
  sseli(c2, cdm(c1), c4)
  dmmptss(s0, c1, c4, c3)
  expcom(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, c4), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, cfv(cid, c0), wcel(c2, c4), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(cid, c0), cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c2), wcel(c2, c4))
  fvmptex(s0, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c4, c3)
  mpan2(wcel(c2, c4), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), c2), cfv(cid, c0)), wcel(cfv(cid, c0), universe))
  fvex(cid, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, c2, c4, cfv(cid, c0), universe, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)), cfv(cid, c3))
  nffv(s0, cid, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  fveq2d(cid, c3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cid, c3)))
  fvprc(c0, cid)
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 →(c1 ` c2)= ∅)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 → c3 = c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61d1(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 ` c2)= ∅, c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  syl5(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ dom(c1), (c1 ` c2)= ∅, c2 ∈ c4)
  sseli(c2, dom(c1), c4)
  dmmptss(s0, c1, c4, c3)
  expcom(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c4, (c1 ` c2)= ∅)
  sylan9eq((c1 ` c2), emptycls, (= ` c0), c2 ∈ c4, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq((c1 ` c2), (= ` c0), ((s0 ∈ c4 ↦(= ` c3))` c2), c2 ∈ c4)
  fvmptex(s0, c1, c2, (s0 ∈ c4 ↦(= ` c3)), c4, c3)
  mpan2(c2 ∈ c4, ((s0 ∈ c4 ↦(= ` c3))` c2)=(= ` c0), (= ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(cid, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, c2, c4, (= ` c0), universe, (s0 ∈ c4 ↦(= ` c3)), (= ` c3))
  nffv(s0, cid, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cid)
  fveq2d(cid, c3, c0, s0 = c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c4 ↦(= ` c3)))
  fvprc(c0, cid)
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptd3
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: fvmptn
blocks.content: This somewhat non-intuitive theorem tells us the value of its function is the empty set when the class ` C ` it would otherwise map to is a proper class. This is a technical lemma that can help eliminate redundant sethood antecedents otherwise required by ~ fvmptg . (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: fvmptss2
blocks.content: A mapping always evaluates to a subset of the substituted expression in the mapping, even if this is a proper class, or we are out of the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elrab2(s0, c1, cdm(c0), c4, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  eleq1d(c3, universe, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c4, c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, universe)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  fvmptg(s0, c1, c4, c2, universe, c0, c3)
  eqimss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  syl6eqss(cfv(c0, c1), c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)⊆ c2
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c3 = c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)⊆ c2, c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  sylbi(c1 ∈ dom(c0), (c0 ` c1)⊆ c2, (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  elrab2(s0, c1, dom(c0), c4, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1d(c3, universe, c2, s0 = c1)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c4, c3)
  syl((c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ` c1)⊆ c2, (c0 ` c1)= c2)
  fvmptg(s0, c1, c4, c2, universe, c0, c3)
  eqimss((c0 ` c1), c2)
  syl6eqss((c0 ` c1), c2, emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elfvmptrab1
blocks.content: Implications for the value of a function defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result having an element. Here, the base set of the class abstraction depends on the argument of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfvmptrab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s2, csb(s0, cv(s1), c4), w0)))
  -| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c4), universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  pm2.43i(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4)))), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  ne0i(c0, cfv(c1, c2))
  necon1ai(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  sylbid(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))), wcel(c0, crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), universe), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(csb(s0, c2, c4), universe))
  rabexg(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), universe, wsbc(s1, c2, w0))
  fvmptf(s1, c2, c3, crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), universe, c1, crab(s2, csb(s0, cv(s1), c4), w0))
  nfrab(s1, s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, w0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, c2, c4)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c4)
  rabeqbidv(s2, csb(s0, cv(s1), c4), csb(s0, c2, c4), wceq(cv(s1), c2), w0, wsbc(s1, c2, w0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(s1), c2, c4)
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, w0)
  ex(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4))))
  anim12i(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, crab(s2, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c2, c4)))
  sseli(c2, cdm(c1), c3)
  dmmptss(s1, c1, c3, crab(s2, csb(s0, cv(s1), c4), w0))
  elrabi(s2, c0, csb(s0, c2, c4), wsbc(s1, c2, w0))
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, c2, c4)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, cv(s1), c4)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elfvmptrab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1 ` c2)→(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4))
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ c3 ↦ { s2 ∈[s1 / s0]c4 | w0 })
  ⊣ (c2 ∈ c3 →[c2 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  pm2.43i(c0 ∈(c1 ` c2), (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4))
  3syl(c0 ∈(c1 ` c2), (c0 ∈(c1 ` c2)→(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4)), (c1 ` c2)≠ ∅, c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  ne0i(c0, (c1 ` c2))
  necon1ai((c1 ` c2), emptycls, c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  ndmfv(c2, c1)
  sylbid(c2 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈(c1 ` c2), (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4), c0 ∈ { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 })
  eleq2d(c0, (c1 ` c2), { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 }, c2 ∈ dom(c1))
  syl2anc(c2 ∈ dom(c1), (c1 ` c2)= { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 }, c2 ∈ c3, { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  3syl(c2 ∈ dom(c1), { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 } ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c3, [c2 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  rabexg(s2, [c2 / s0]c4, universe, [c2 / s1]w0)
  fvmptf(s1, c2, c3, { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 }, universe, c1, { s2 ∈[s1 / s0]c4 | w0 })
  nfrab(s1, s2, [c2 / s0]c4, [c2 / s1]w0)
  nfsbc1v(s1, c2, w0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, c2, c4)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c4)
  rabeqbidv(s2, [s1 / s0]c4, [c2 / s0]c4, s1 = c2, w0, [c2 / s1]w0)
  csbeq1(s0, s1, c2, c4)
  sbceq1a(s1, c2, w0)
  ex(c2 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 }, (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4))
  anim12i(c2 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ { s2 ∈[c2 / s0]c4 |[c2 / s1]w0 }, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈[c2 / s0]c4)
  sseli(c2, dom(c1), c3)
  dmmptss(s1, c1, c3, { s2 ∈[s1 / s0]c4 | w0 })
  elrabi(s2, c0, [c2 / s0]c4, [c2 / s1]w0)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, c2, c4)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, s1, c4)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: elfvmptrab
blocks.content: Implications for the value of a function defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result having an element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfvmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, c4, w0)))
  -| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(hs0, c2, c4))))
  elfvmptrab1(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4), w0)), cmpt(s0, c3, crab(s1, c4, w0)))
  mpteq2ia(s0, c3, crab(s1, c4, w0), crab(s1, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4), w0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(crab(s1, c4, w0), crab(s1, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4), w0)), wceq(c4, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4)))
  eqcomd(c4, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  csbconstg(hs0, cv(s0), c3, c4)
  rabeq(s1, c4, csb(hs0, cv(s0), c4), w0)
  eqeltrd(csb(hs0, c2, c4), universe, c4, wcel(c2, c3))
  imdistani(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(hs0, c2, c4)), wcel(c0, c4))
  biimpd(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, csb(hs0, c2, c4)), wcel(c0, c4))
  eleq2d(c0, csb(hs0, c2, c4), c4, wcel(c2, c3))
  csbconstg(hs0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.csb.s(s1, hs0, cv(s0), c4)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elfvmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1 ` c2)→(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈ c4))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ { s1 ∈ c4 | w0 })
  ⊣ (c2 ∈ c3 → c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(c1 ` c2), (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈ c4), (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈[c2 / hs0]c4))
  elfvmptrab1(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqtri(c1, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ { s1 ∈[s0 / hs0]c4 | w0 }), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ { s1 ∈ c4 | w0 }))
  mpteq2ia(s0, c3, { s1 ∈ c4 | w0 }, { s1 ∈[s0 / hs0]c4 | w0 })
  syl(s0 ∈ c3, { s1 ∈ c4 | w0 } = { s1 ∈[s0 / hs0]c4 | w0 }, c4 =[s0 / hs0]c4)
  eqcomd(c4, [s0 / hs0]c4, s0 ∈ c3)
  csbconstg(hs0, s0, c3, c4)
  rabeq(s1, c4, [s0 / hs0]c4, w0)
  eqeltrd([c2 / hs0]c4, universe, c4, c2 ∈ c3)
  imdistani(c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈[c2 / hs0]c4, c0 ∈ c4)
  biimpd(c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈[c2 / hs0]c4, c0 ∈ c4)
  eleq2d(c0, [c2 / hs0]c4, c4, c2 ∈ c3)
  csbconstg(hs0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.csb.s(s1, hs0, s0, c4)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fvopab4ndm
blocks.content: Value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction, outside of its domain. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvopab4ndm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c2))))
  con3i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
  sseli(c0, cdm(c2), c1)
  eqsstri(cdm(c2), c1, cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  dmeqi(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  dmopabss(s0, s1, c1, w0)
  ndmfv(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fvmptrabfv
blocks.content: Value of a function mapping a set to a class abstraction restricting the value of another function. (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptrabfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, universe, crab(s0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)), w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(s1, c1, universe, c0, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0), crab(s0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)), w1))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w1, w0)
  fveq2(cv(s1), c1, c2)
  rabex(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0)
  fvex(c2, c1)
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  syl6req(emptycls, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0), crab(s0, emptycls, w0), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  rabeqdv(s0, cfv(c2, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)), w0)
  fvprc(c1, c2)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cfv(c2, c1), w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptrabfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` c1)= { s0 ∈(c2 ` c1)| w0 }
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s0 ∈(c2 ` s1)| w1 })
  ⊣ (s1 = c1 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)= { s0 ∈(c2 ` c1)| w0 }, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(s1, c1, universe, c0, { s0 ∈(c2 ` c1)| w0 }, { s0 ∈(c2 ` s1)| w1 })
  rabeqbidv(s0, (c2 ` s1), (c2 ` c1), s1 = c1, w1, w0)
  fveq2(s1, c1, c2)
  rabex(s0, (c2 ` c1), w0)
  fvex(c2, c1)
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), { s0 ∈(c2 ` c1)| w0 }, emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  syl6req(emptycls, { s0 ∈(c2 ` c1)| w0 }, { s0 ∈ ∅ | w0 }, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  rabeqdv(s0, (c2 ` c1), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  fvprc(c1, c2)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, (c2 ` c1), w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvopab5
blocks.content: The value of a function that is expressed as an ordered pair abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvopab5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cio(s0, w0)))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s1, s0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cio(s0, w0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(cfv(c2, c0), cio(s0, w0), cio(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqtri(cfv(c2, c0), cio(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))), cio(hs0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs0))))
  df-fv(hs0, c2, c0)
  cbviota(hs0, s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, c2)
  nfbr(s0, c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c2, copab(s1, s0, w1))
  nfopab2(s0, s1, w1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  iotabidv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), w0)
  vtoclg1f(s1, c0, universe, wb(wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), w0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), w1))
  nfbi(s1, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), w0)
  nfbr(s1, c0, c2, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcxfr(s1, c2, copab(s1, s0, w1))
  nfopab1(s1, s0, w1)
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), w1, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), w0)
  breq1(cv(s1), c0, c2, cv(s0))
  3bitri(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), w1, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), copab(s1, s0, w1)))
  df-br(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))
  eleq2i(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2, copab(s1, s0, w1))
  opabid(s1, s0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvopab5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` c0)= iota(s0, w0))
  ⊣ c2 = { < s1, s0 > | w1 }
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ` c0)= iota(s0, w0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq((c2 ` c0), iota(s0, w0), iota(s0, c0[c2]s0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqtri((c2 ` c0), iota(s0, c0[c2]s0), iota(hs0, c0[c2]hs0))
  df-fv(hs0, c2, c0)
  cbviota(hs0, s0, c0[c2]hs0, c0[c2]s0)
  breq2(hs0, s0, c0, c2)
  nfbr(s0, c0, c2, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c2, { < s1, s0 > | w1 })
  nfopab2(s0, s1, w1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, c0[c2]s0)
  iotabidv(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0[c2]s0, w0)
  vtoclg1f(s1, c0, universe, (c0[c2]s0 ↔ w0), (s1[c2]s0 ↔ w1))
  nfbi(s1, c0[c2]s0, w0)
  nfbr(s1, c0, c2, s0)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcxfr(s1, c2, { < s1, s0 > | w1 })
  nfopab1(s1, s0, w1)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  bibi12d(s1 = c0, s1[c2]s0, w1, c0[c2]s0, w0)
  breq1(s1, c0, c2, s0)
  3bitri(s1[c2]s0, w1, < s1, s0 > ∈ c2, < s1, s0 > ∈ { < s1, s0 > | w1 })
  df-br(s1, c2, s0)
  eleq2i(< s1, s0 >, c2, { < s1, s0 > | w1 })
  opabid(s1, s0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[c2]s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fvopab6
blocks.content: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvopab6(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), w0), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2))
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvopab3ig(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, c3, c4, w0, wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5), w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c5, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w0)
  iba(wceq(cv(s1), c2), w0)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wmo(s1, wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  moani(s1, w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5))
  moeq(s1, c5)
  eqtri(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5)))), copab(s0, s1, wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  biantrur(wa(w1, wceq(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvopab6(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ w0)→(c4 ` c0)= c2)
  ⊣ c4 = { < s0, s1 > |(w1 ∧ s1 = c5)}
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c5 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, w0, (c4 ` c0)= c2)
  sylan(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (w0 →(c4 ` c0)= c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvopab3ig(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, c3, c4, w0, (w1 ∧ s1 = c5), (w0 ∧ s1 = c2))
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, w1, s1 = c5, w0, s1 = c2)
  eqeq2d(s1, c5, c2, s0 = c0)
  bicomd(s1 = c2, (w0 ∧ s1 = c2), w0)
  iba(s1 = c2, w0)
  a1i(s0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃*(s1,(w1 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  moani(s1, w1, s1 = c5)
  moeq(s1, c5)
  eqtri(c4, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧(w1 ∧ s1 = c5))}, { < s0, s1 > |(w1 ∧ s1 = c5)})
  opabbii(s0, s1, (w1 ∧ s1 = c5), (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧(w1 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  biantrur((w1 ∧ s1 = c5), s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eqfnfv
blocks.content: Equality of functions is determined by their values. Special case of Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28 (with domain equality omitted). (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wceq(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  dffn5(s0, c0, c1)
  dffn5(s0, c2, c1)
  eqeq12(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c2, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), universe)))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), universe))
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  mpteqb(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), universe, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: eqfnfv2
blocks.content: Equality of functions is determined by their values. Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wa(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c0, c2)))
  pm4.71rd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  syl5ib(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)))
  dmeq(c0, c2)
  eqeqan12d(cdm(c0), cdm(c2), c1, c3, wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  fndm(c2, c3)
  pm5.32da(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  anassrs(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3), wceq(c1, c3), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  sylan2(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wceq(c1, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wfn(c2, c1))
  biimparc(wfn(c2, c3), wceq(c1, c3), wfn(c2, c1))
  fneq2(c1, c3, c2)
  eqfnfv(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqfnfv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)→(c0 = c2 ↔(c1 = c3 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), c0 = c2, (c1 = c3 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))), (c1 = c3 ∧ c0 = c2))
  pm4.71rd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), c0 = c2, c1 = c3)
  syl5ib((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), c0 = c2, c1 = c3, dom(c0)= dom(c2))
  dmeq(c0, c2)
  eqeqan12d(dom(c0), dom(c2), c1, c3, c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  fndm(c2, c3)
  pm5.32da((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), c1 = c3, c0 = c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0)))
  anassrs(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, c1 = c3, (c0 = c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))))
  sylan2(c0[Fn]c1, (c2[Fn]c3 ∧ c1 = c3), (c0 = c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))), c2[Fn]c1)
  biimparc(c2[Fn]c3, c1 = c3, c2[Fn]c1)
  fneq2(c1, c3, c2)
  eqfnfv(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: eqfnfv3
blocks.content: Derive equality of functions from equality of their values. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfv3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wss(c3, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wa(wss(c3, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), wa(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  eqfnfv2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3bitri(wa(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wss(c3, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), wa(wa(wss(c3, c1), wss(c1, c3)), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wss(c3, c1), wa(wss(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  anbi1i(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(c3, c1), wss(c1, c3)))
  biancomi(wceq(c1, c3), wss(c3, c1), wss(c1, c3))
  eqss(c1, c3)
  anass(wss(c3, c1), wss(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2i(wss(c3, c1), wa(wss(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  bitr4i(wa(wss(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  anbi1i(wss(c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  dfss3(s0, c1, c3)
  r19.26(s0, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
}

blocks.name: eqfnfvd
blocks.content: Deduction for equality of functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfvd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c2), wfn(c1, c2))
  eqfnfv(s0, c0, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqfnfvd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Fn]c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))), c0[Fn]c2, c1[Fn]c2)
  eqfnfv(s0, c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqfnfv2f
blocks.content: Equality of functions is determined by their values. Special case of Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28 (with domain equality omitted). This version of ~ eqfnfv uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnfv2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvral(hs0, s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nffv(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqfnfv2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1)→(c0 = c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1), c0 = c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvral(hs0, s0, c1, (c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0), (c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))
  nfeq(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0))
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nffv(s0, c2, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, (c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))
  eqeq12d((c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0), (c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))
}

blocks.name: fvreseq0
blocks.content: Equality of restricted functions is determined by their values (for functions with different domains). (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)

thm fvreseq0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c4, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c4), cres(c2, c4)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

} = {

  syl2an(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c4, c1)), wa(wfn(c2, c3), wss(c4, c3)), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c4), cres(c2, c4)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wfn(cres(c0, c4), c4), wfn(cres(c2, c4), c4))
  fnssres(c0, c1, c4)
  fnssres(c2, c3, c4)
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(cres(c0, c4), c4), wfn(cres(c2, c4), c4)), wceq(cres(c0, c4), cres(c2, c4)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c4), cv(s0)), cfv(cres(c2, c4), cv(s0)))))
  eqfnfv(s0, cres(c0, c4), c4, cres(c2, c4))
  ralbiia(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c4), cv(s0)), cfv(cres(c2, c4), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cres(c0, c4), cv(s0)), cfv(cres(c2, c4), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  fvres(cv(s0), c4, c0)
  fvres(cv(s0), c4, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c4)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: fvreseq1
blocks.content: Equality of a function restricted to the domain of another function. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvreseq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c3), c2), wral(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c3), c2), wral(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wceq(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)))
  eqeq2d(cres(c0, c3), c2, cres(c2, c3), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wss(c3, c1)))
  eqcomd(c2, cres(c2, c3), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wss(c3, c1)))

  mpanr2(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), wss(c3, c1), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)), wral(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wss(c3, c3))
  ssid(c3)
  fvreseq0(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvreseq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→((c0 |` c3)= c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c3,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c0 |` c3)= c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c3,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0)), (c0 |` c3)=(c2 |` c3))
  eqeq2d((c0 |` c3), c2, (c2 |` c3), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  eqcomd(c2, (c2 |` c3), ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3)∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  ad2antlr(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c3, c3 ⊆ c1, (c2 |` c3)= c2)
  fnresdm(c2, c3)
  mpanr2((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c3), c3 ⊆ c1, ((c0 |` c3)=(c2 |` c3)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c3,(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))), c3 ⊆ c3)
  ssid(c3)
  fvreseq0(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c3)
}

blocks.name: fnmptfvd

  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s1))))), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c5)))

  eqeq2d(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c1, c3), cv(s1)), w0)

blocks.name: fndmdif

thm fndmdif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

  sylib(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, cdm(cdif(c0, c2))), cdm(cdif(c0, c2))), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), c1))
  syl5sseq(cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), c1, cdm(c0), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), cdm(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0))
  difss(c0, c2)
  dmss(cdif(c0, c2), c0)
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  sseqin2(cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), c1)
  rabbi2dva(s0, c1, cdm(cdif(c0, c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  syl5bb(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdif(c0, c2))), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2), cv(hs0))))
  eldm(hs0, cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2))
  vex(s0)
  bitr2d(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wex(hs0, wbr(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2), cv(hs0))), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: fndmdifeq0
blocks.content: The difference set of two functions is empty if and only if the functions are equal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)

thm fneqeql(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1)))

  bitr4d(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1), wceq(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1))

  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  bitri(wceq(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  eqcom(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)
  rabid2(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1d(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))
  fndmin(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

  eqcom({ hs0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)}, c1)
  rabid2(hs0, c1, (c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0))
  eqeq1d(dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), c1, { hs0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)}, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1))
  fndmin(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: fneqeql2
blocks.content: Two functions are equal iff their equalizer contains the whole domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fneqeql2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wss(c1, cdm(cin(c0, c2)))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2), wss(c1, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1))
  fneqeql(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6rbbr(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1), wss(c1, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), wa(wss(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1), wss(c1, cdm(cin(c0, c2)))))
  biantrurd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wss(c1, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), wss(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1))
  syl5sseq(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1, cdm(c0), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), cdm(c0)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
  inss1(c0, c2)
  dmss(cin(c0, c2), c0)
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  eqss(cdm(cin(c0, c2)), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fneqeql2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1)→(c0 = c2 ↔ c1 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2))))
} = {
  bitrd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1), c0 = c2, c1 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), dom((c0 ⋂ c2))= c1)
  fneqeql(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6rbbr((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1), dom((c0 ⋂ c2))= c1, c1 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), (dom((c0 ⋂ c2))⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2))))
  biantrurd((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1), c1 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), dom((c0 ⋂ c2))⊆ c1)
  syl5sseq(dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), c1, dom(c0), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1))
  ax-mp(dom((c0 ⋂ c2))⊆ dom(c0), (c0 ⋂ c2)⊆ c0)
  inss1(c0, c2)
  dmss((c0 ⋂ c2), c0)
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c1, dom(c0)= c1)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  eqss(dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), c1)
}

blocks.name: fnreseql
blocks.content: Two functions are equal on a subset iff their equalizer contains that subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnreseql(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)), wss(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2)))))
} = {
  syl6bb(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)), wss(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), wceq(cdm(cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3))), c3))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wceq(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)), wceq(cdm(cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3))), c3)), wfn(cres(c0, c3), c3), wfn(cres(c2, c3), c3))
  3adant2(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wfn(cres(c0, c3), c3))
  fnssres(c0, c1, c3)
  3adant1(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wfn(cres(c2, c3), c3))
  fnssres(c2, c1, c3)
  fneqeql(cres(c0, c3), c3, cres(c2, c3))
  bitr4i(wceq(cdm(cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3))), c3), wss(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), wceq(cin(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), c3))
  eqeq1i(cdm(cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3))), c3, cin(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2))))
  eqtr3i(cdm(cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3))), cin(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2))), cdm(cres(cin(c0, c2), c3)))
  dmeqi(cres(cin(c0, c2), c3), cin(cres(c0, c3), cres(c2, c3)))
  resindir(c0, c2, c3)
  dmres(cin(c0, c2), c3)
  df-ss(c3, cdm(cin(c0, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnreseql(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→((c0 |` c3)=(c2 |` c3)↔ c3 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2))))
} = {
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c0 |` c3)=(c2 |` c3), c3 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), dom(((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3)))= c3)
  syl2anc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2[Fn]c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), ((c0 |` c3)=(c2 |` c3)↔ dom(((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3)))= c3), (c0 |` c3)[Fn]c3, (c2 |` c3)[Fn]c3)
  3adant2(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c1, c3 ⊆ c1, (c0 |` c3)[Fn]c3)
  fnssres(c0, c1, c3)
  3adant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2[Fn]c1, c3 ⊆ c1, (c2 |` c3)[Fn]c3)
  fnssres(c2, c1, c3)
  fneqeql((c0 |` c3), c3, (c2 |` c3))
  bitr4i(dom(((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3)))= c3, c3 ⊆ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)), (c3 ⋂ dom((c0 ⋂ c2)))= c3)
  eqeq1i(dom(((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3))), c3, (c3 ⋂ dom((c0 ⋂ c2))))
  eqtr3i(dom(((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3))), (c3 ⋂ dom((c0 ⋂ c2))), dom(((c0 ⋂ c2)|` c3)))
  dmeqi(((c0 ⋂ c2)|` c3), ((c0 |` c3)⋂(c2 |` c3)))
  resindir(c0, c2, c3)
  dmres((c0 ⋂ c2), c3)
  df-ss(c3, dom((c0 ⋂ c2)))
}

blocks.name: chfnrn
blocks.content: The range of a choice function (a function that chooses an element from each member of its domain) is included in the union of its domain. (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm chfnrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))), wss(crn(c0), cuni(c1)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, crn(c0), cuni(c1), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))

  sylan9(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  biimpd(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syl(wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0))), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ralimi(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  biimpcd(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), cv(s0))

  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm chfnrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ s0))→ ran(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {

  sylan9(c0[Fn]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ s0), hs0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ s0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  biimpd(c0[Fn]c1, hs0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ s0), (∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → hs0 ∈ s0)))
  ralimi(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)∈ s0, ((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → hs0 ∈ s0))
  biimpcd((c0 ` s0)∈ s0, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ s0)
  eleq1((c0 ` s0), hs0, s0)

blocks.name: fvimacnvi
blocks.content: A member of a preimage is a function value argument. (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2007.)

thm fvimacnvi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  snssi(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  funimass2(c0, csn(c1), c2)
  syl5bb(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sseli(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c2)
  sylanb(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))

thm fvimacnvi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈(`' c0 " c2))→(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
} = {
  mpbird((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈(`' c0 " c2)), (c0 ` c1)∈ c2, (c0 " { c1 })⊆ c2)

blocks.name: fvimacnv
blocks.content: The argument of a function value belongs to the preimage of any class containing the function value. Raph Levien remarks: "This proof is unsatisfying, because it seems to me that ~ funimass2 could probably be strengthened to a biconditional." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  syl5com(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))))
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0))
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe))
  opelcnvg(cfv(c0, c1), universe, c1, cdm(c0), c0)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0))))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c0, c1), c1), ccnv(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), universe))
  elimasng(cfv(c0, c1), universe, c1, cdm(c0), ccnv(c0))
  sseld(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), cima(ccnv(c0), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  sylbi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cfv(c0, c1))), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  imass2(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, ccnv(c0))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  fvimacnvi(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: funimass3
blocks.content: A kind of contraposition law that infers an image subclass from a subclass of a preimage. Raph Levien remarks: "Likely this could be proved directly, and ~ fvimacnv would be the special case of ` A ` being a singleton, but it works this way round too." (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm funimass3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
} = {
  syl6bbr(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  bitrd(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  funimass4(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  imp31(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  syl9r(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  ssel(c1, cdm(c0), cv(hs0))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  fvimacnv(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  dfss3(hs0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funimass3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0))→((c0 " c1)⊆ c2 ↔ c1 ⊆(`' c0 " c2)))
} = {
  syl6bbr((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), (c0 " c1)⊆ c2, c1 ⊆(`' c0 " c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)))
  bitrd((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), (c0 " c1)⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2))
  funimass4(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(hs0, c1, (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), (c0 ` hs0)∈ c2, hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2))
  imp31(Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` hs0)∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)))
  syl9r(Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` hs0)∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)), hs0 ∈ dom(c0))
  ssel(c1, dom(c0), hs0)
  ex(Fun(c0), hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ((c0 ` hs0)∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)))
  fvimacnv(c0, hs0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, c1, (`' c0 " c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)))

}

(Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm fvimacnvALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))

  sylan2(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wss(csn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  snssi(c1, cdm(c0))
  funimass3(c0, csn(c1), c2)
  syl5bb(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wss(cima(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wss(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2))
  snss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  fvex(c0, c1)
  sseq1d(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), c2, cima(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylan(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(csn(cfv(c0, c1)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  mpan2(wfun(c0), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  biimpri(wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  df-fn(c0, cdm(c0))
  fnsnfv(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(csn(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))

thm elpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))))

  fnfun(c0, c1)
  fvimacnvi(c0, c2, c3)
  expimpd(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)))
  biimpd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3)))
  funfni(c0, c1, c2, wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c3))))

thm elpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  a1i(wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), c2)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  biancomi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, cdm(c0))
  pm5.32i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))

thm respreima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(`'(c0 |` c1)" c2)=((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (`'(c0 |` c1)" c2), ((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1), Fun(c0))
  sylbi(Fun(c0), (hs0 ∈(`'(c0 |` c1)" c2)↔ hs0 ∈((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1)), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfn(c0)
  3bitr4d(c0[Fn]dom(c0), hs0 ∈(`'(c0 |` c1)" c2), hs0 ∈((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1), (hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  syl6bb(c0[Fn]dom(c0), (hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2))
  a1i(c0[Fn]dom(c0), ((hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2)↔((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)))
  bitri((hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2))
  anbi1i(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), ((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2, (hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  biancomi(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ c1)
  elin(hs0, c1, dom(c0))
  pm5.32i((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), ((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2, (c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)
  adantl(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ c1, (((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2 ↔(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2))
  eleq1d(((c0 |` c1)` hs0), c2, (c0 ` hs0), hs0 ∈ c1)
  fvres(hs0, c1, c0)
  an32(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)
  syl(c0[Fn]dom(c0), (hs0 ∈(`'(c0 |` c1)" c2)↔(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))∧((c0 |` c1)` hs0)∈ c2)), (c0 |` c1)[Fn](c1 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  sylanblrc(c0[Fn]dom(c0), (c0 |` c1)[Fn](c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), Fun((c0 |` c1)), dom((c0 |` c1))=(c1 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  syl(c0[Fn]dom(c0), Fun((c0 |` c1)), Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, dom(c0))
  funres(c0, c1)
  dmres(c0, c1)
  df-fn((c0 |` c1), (c1 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  elpreima((c0 |` c1), (c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), hs0, c2)
  syl5bb(c0[Fn]dom(c0), hs0 ∈((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1), ((hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elin(hs0, (`' c0 " c2), c1)
  anbi1d(c0[Fn]dom(c0), hs0 ∈(`' c0 " c2), hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs0)∈ c2))
  elpreima(c0, dom(c0), hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c((`'(c0 |` c1)" c2))
  diff.hs0.c(((`' c0 " c2)⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.w(Fun(c0))
}

thm iinpreima(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  impbida(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  simpll(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))))
  adantl(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))
  sylancr(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))
  adantlr(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))
  fvimacnvi(c0, cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))
  biimpa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  biimpa(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  fvimacnv(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  mpbid(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  sylc(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wfun(c0), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  adantl(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  elv(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))))
  biimpd(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  ralimdv(s0, c1, wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  fvimacnvi(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe))
  fvex(c0, cv(hs0))
  eliin(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, c1, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  simpll(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  imp(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  syl5bi(wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  elv(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))))
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  syl6(wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))))
  biimpi(wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))))
  r19.2zb(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  rexlimivw(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c2)
  fvimacnv(c0, cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c0), ciin(s0, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cdm(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: fimacnv
blocks.content: The preimage of the codomain of a mapping is the mapping's domain. (Contributed by FL, 25-Jan-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1))
} = {
  eqssd(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  syl5ss(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), c1, crn(ccnv(c0)), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  imassrn(ccnv(c0), c2)
  syl5eqssr(crn(ccnv(c0)), c1, cdm(c0), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  dfdm4(c0)
  syl6eqss(cdm(c0), c1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  mpbid(wf(c0, c1, c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
  fimass(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ffun(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5sseqr(c1, cdm(c0), c1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  ssid(c1)
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  funimass3(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)→(`' c0 " c2)= c1)
} = {
  eqssd((`' c0 " c2), c1, (c0 : c1 → c2))
  syl5ss((`' c0 " c2), c1, ran(`' c0), (c0 : c1 → c2))
  imassrn(`' c0, c2)
  syl5eqssr(ran(`' c0), c1, dom(c0), (c0 : c1 → c2))
  dfdm4(c0)
  syl6eqss(dom(c0), c1, c1, (c0 : c1 → c2))
  mpbid((c0 : c1 → c2), c1 ⊆(`' c0 " c2), (c0 " c1)⊆ c2)
  fimass(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  syl2anc((c0 : c1 → c2), ((c0 " c1)⊆ c2 ↔ c1 ⊆(`' c0 " c2)), Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  ffun(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5sseqr(c1, dom(c0), c1, (c0 : c1 → c2))
  ssid(c1)
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  funimass3(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: fimacnvinrn
blocks.content: Taking the converse image of a set can be limited to the range of the function used. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimacnvinrn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c1, crn(c0)))))
} = {
  3eqtrrd(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c1, crn(c0))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0)), wfun(c0))
  inpreima(c0, c1, crn(c0))
  ineq2d(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0)), cdm(c0), wfun(c0))
  syl(wfun(c0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0)), cdm(c0)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wfo(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  funforn(c0)
  fof(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  fimacnv(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  syl5eqr(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c0))), c1), wfun(c0))
  cnvresima(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cres(c0, cdm(c0))), c1, ccnv(c0), wfun(c0))
  cnveqd(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), c0, wfun(c0))
  syl5eq(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), wfun(c0))
  resdm2(c0)
  sylib(wfun(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  funrel(c0)
  dfrel2(c0)
}

thm fimacnvinrn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(`' c0 " c1)=(`' c0 "(c1 ⋂ ran(c0))))
} = {
  3eqtrrd((`' c0 " c1), (`' c0 "(c1 ⋂ ran(c0))), ((`' c0 " c1)⋂(`' c0 " ran(c0))), ((`' c0 " c1)⋂ dom(c0)), Fun(c0))
  inpreima(c0, c1, ran(c0))
  ineq2d((`' c0 " c1), (`' c0 " ran(c0)), dom(c0), Fun(c0))
  syl(Fun(c0), (`' c0 " ran(c0))= dom(c0), (c0 : dom(c0)→ ran(c0)))

blocks.name: fimacnvinrn2
blocks.content: Taking the converse image of a set can be limited to the range of the function used. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimacnvinrn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1)), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0))), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, crn(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)), cin(c2, crn(c0)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  syl5eq(cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)), cin(c2, crn(c0)), cin(c2, cin(c1, crn(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  inass(c2, c1, crn(c0))
  ineq2d(c2, cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0), wa(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0)))
  biimpi(wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cin(c1, crn(c0)), crn(c0)))
  sseqin2(crn(c0), c1)
  adantr(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, c1)), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(cin(c2, c1), crn(c0)))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, cin(c2, c1))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cin(c2, crn(c0)))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimacnvinrn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1)→(`' c0 " c2)=(`' c0 "(c2 ⋂ c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((`' c0 " c2), (`' c0 "(c2 ⋂ c1)), (`' c0 "((c2 ⋂ c1)⋂ ran(c0))), (`' c0 "(c2 ⋂ ran(c0))), (Fun(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1))
  imaeq2d(`' c0, ((c2 ⋂ c1)⋂ ran(c0)), (c2 ⋂ ran(c0)), (Fun(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1))
  syl5eq(((c2 ⋂ c1)⋂ ran(c0)), (c2 ⋂ ran(c0)), (c2 ⋂(c1 ⋂ ran(c0))), (Fun(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1))
  inass(c2, c1, ran(c0))
  ineq2d(c2, (c1 ⋂ ran(c0)), ran(c0), (Fun(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1))
  adantl(Fun(c0), ran(c0)⊆ c1, (c1 ⋂ ran(c0))= ran(c0))
  biimpi(ran(c0)⊆ c1, (c1 ⋂ ran(c0))= ran(c0))
  sseqin2(ran(c0), c1)
  adantr(Fun(c0), ran(c0)⊆ c1, (`' c0 "(c2 ⋂ c1))=(`' c0 "((c2 ⋂ c1)⋂ ran(c0))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, (c2 ⋂ c1))
  adantr(Fun(c0), ran(c0)⊆ c1, (`' c0 " c2)=(`' c0 "(c2 ⋂ ran(c0))))
  fimacnvinrn(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: nelrnfvne

blocks.name: fveqdmss
blocks.content: If the empty set is not contained in the range of a function, and the function values of another class (not necessarily a function) are equal to the function values of the function for all elements of the domain of the function, then the domain of the function is contained in the domain of the class. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2020.)

  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  adantr(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` s0)=(c0 ` s0)), ((c2 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0)→(∅ ∉ ran(c0)→(Fun(c0)→ hs0 ∈ dom(c2)))))
  com24(hs0 ∈ c1, (c2 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0), ∅ ∉ ran(c0), Fun(c0), hs0 ∈ dom(c2))
  eleq2s(hs0, c1, dom(c0), (Fun(c0)→(∅ ∉ ran(c0)→((c2 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0)→ hs0 ∈ dom(c2)))))
  com12(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), Fun(c0), (∅ ∉ ran(c0)→((c2 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0)→ hs0 ∈ dom(c2))))

  n0(hs1, (c0 ` hs0))

  com12(hs1 ∈(c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0), hs0 ∈ dom(c2))

blocks.name: fveqressseq
blocks.content: If the empty set is not contained in the range of a function, and the function values of another class (not necessarily a function) are equal to the function values of the function for all elements of the domain of the function, then the class restricted to the domain of the function is the function itself. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2020.)
