  rspcev(hs0, c1, crn(c0), wceq(c1, c1), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1)
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wb(wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  funfn(c0)
  rexrn(hs0, s0, c0, cdm(c0), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  funfn(c0)

blocks.name: eldmrexrnb
blocks.content: For any element in the domain of a function, there is an element in the range of the function which is the value of the function at that element. Because of the definition ~ df-fv of the value of a function, the theorem is only valid in general if the empty set is not contained in the range of the function (the implication "to the right" is always valid). Indeed, with the definition ~ df-fv of the value of a function, ` ( F `` Y ) = (/) ` may mean that the value of ` F ` at ` Y ` is the empty set or that ` F ` is not defined at ` Y ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Dec-2017.)

thm eldmrexrnb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wb(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, crn(c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, crn(c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1))))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0)), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, crn(c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)))))
  eldmrexrn(s0, c0, c1)
  rexlimdv(s0, crn(c0), wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  com13(wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wi(wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0))
  com12(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wa(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0)), wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  expcom(wnel(emptycls, crn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wne(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  elnelne2(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0), emptycls)
  sylbi(wne(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c1))))
  n0(hs0, cfv(c0, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  elfvdm(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfun(c0), wnel(emptycls, crn(c0)))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wnel.s(s0, emptycls, crn(c0))

  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
}

  adantr(Fun(c0), ∅ ∉ ran(c0), (c1 ∈ dom(c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ran(c0), s0 =(c0 ` c1))))

thm ralrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)→(∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), w0)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1)))
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ (s1 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  bitrd(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), w0), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,[(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0))
  3bitr3g(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), w0), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,[(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,[(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0))
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), (∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0)↔ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,[(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0)), c3[Fn]c0)
  fnmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)

  dfsbcq(s1, hs0, (c3 ` hs1), w0)
  bicomi(∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3),[hs0 / s1]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), w0))
  cbvral(s1, hs0, ran(c3), w0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  sbceq1a(s1, hs0, w0)
  cbvral(hs1, s0, c0, [(c3 ` hs1)/ s1]w0, [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0)
  nfsbc(s0, s1, (c3 ` hs1), w0)
  nffv(s0, c3, hs1)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))

  nfcv(s0, hs1)

  fveq2(hs1, s0, c3)

  ralimiaa(s0, c0, c1 ∈ c2, ([(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0 ↔ w1))
  bitrd((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0, w1, [c1 / s1]w0)
  sbceq1d(s1, (c3 ` s0), c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2, ([c1 / s1]w0 ↔ w1))
  sbcieg(s1, c1, c2, w0, w1)
  ralbi(s0, c0, [(c3 ` s0)/ s1]w0, w1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  3bitr4g(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), ∃(s1 ∈ ran(c3), w0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, w1), ¬ ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), ¬ w0), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ w1))
  notbid(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c3), ¬ w0), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ w1))
  ralrnmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ¬ w0, ¬ w1)
  notbid(s1 = c1, w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s1, ran(c3), w0)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w1)
}

blocks.content: Alternate definition of a mapping. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm dff2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
} = {
  impbii(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
  jca(wf(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  fssxp(c0, c1, c2)
  sylibr(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))
  anim2i(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wss(crn(c0), c2))
  syl6ss(crn(c0), c2, crn(cxp(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  rnss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  rnxpss(c1, c2)
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dff2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)↔(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c2)))
} = {
  impbii((c0 : c1 → c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c2)))
  jca((c0 : c1 → c2), c0[Fn]c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c2))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  fssxp(c0, c1, c2)
  sylibr((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c2)), (c0 : c1 → c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c2))
  anim2i(c0[Fn]c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c2), ran(c0)⊆ c2)
  syl6ss(ran(c0), c2, ran((c1 × c2)), c0 ⊆(c1 × c2))
  rnss(c0, (c1 × c2))
  rnxpss(c1, c2)
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
}

thm dff3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c0))

  sylanbrc(wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wfun(c0), wrel(c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))

  syl5bi(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))

  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, c0, (c0 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, (c1 × c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, (c1 × c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃!(s1, s0[c0]s1)))
  diff.weu.s(s0, s1, hs0[c0]s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm dff4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wreu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wreu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  dff3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c1, wreu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wreu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  syl6bbr(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wreu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  eubidv(s1, wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  pm4.71rd(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  syl5bi(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  syl6(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2)))
  ssel(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  opelxp2(cv(s0), cv(s1), c1, c2)
  df-reu(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c2)
}

thm dffo3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  bitrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq1d(crn(c0), c2, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr4g(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wal(s0, wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  albidv(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  syl6rbbr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wb(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  biantrurd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  rexlimdva2(s1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  adantr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2))
  ffvelrn(c0, c1, c2, cv(s1))
  dfbi2(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  abeq1(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  df-ral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dffo4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  impbii(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  sylbi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)))
  dffo2(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  simpl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  adantll(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  biimpar(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl5bbr(wceq(crn(c0), c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  elrn(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  eleq2(crn(c0), c2, cv(s0))
  ad2antrr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl6ibr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eximdv(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  ancrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  imdistani(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, c2), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  reximdva(s1, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  sylan(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6ib(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  biimprd(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  fnbrfvb(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  dffo3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crn(c0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, crn(c0), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.content: Alternate definition of an onto mapping. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2007.)

thm dffo5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  dffo4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  impbii(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  anim2i(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralimi(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  rexex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  imdistani(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl6ibr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eximdv(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  ancrd(wf(c0, c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: exfo
blocks.content: A relation equivalent to the existence of an onto mapping. The right-hand ` f ` is not necessarily a function. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm exfo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  eximi(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1), wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  sylbi(wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1), wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  dffo4(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anim1i(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  simprbi(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wss(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)))
  dff4(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  sylib(wex(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wfo(cv(s0), c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  syl(wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(hs0, wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wral(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wfo(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wa(wf(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), c0, c1), wceq(crn(cin(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))), c1)))

blocks.name: foelrn
blocks.content: Property of a surjective function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 4-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm foelrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  simprbi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  dffo3(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  sylan((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), c3 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))))
  simprbi((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))), (c0 : c1 → c2))
  dffo3(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c3, hs0 =(c0 ` s0), c3 =(c0 ` s0))
  eqeq1(hs0, c3, (c0 ` s0))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: foco2
blocks.content: If a composition of two functions is surjective, then the function on the left is surjective. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 14-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm foco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)), wfo(c0, c1, c2))
} = {
  3imtr4i(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  anim2i(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  impl(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  syl5(wf(c3, c4, c1), wa(wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)))))
  foelrn(hs2, ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2, cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(hs2, c4, wf(c3, c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), c1), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs2)))))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, cv(hs2))
  fvco3(c3, c4, c1, cv(hs2), c0)
  rspceeqv(hs1, cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), c0)
  rexbidv(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  3anass(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2))
  dffo3(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wf(c3, c4, c1), wfo(ccom(c0, c3), c4, c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(ccom(c0, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.w(wf(c3, c4, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm foco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)∧((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2))→(c0 : c1 ↠ c2))
} = {
  3imtr4i(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)∧((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2)), (c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧((c3 : c4 → c1)∧((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2))), ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)))))

  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, ((c3 : c4 → c1)∧((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)))
  impl((c3 : c4 → c1), ((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2), hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)))
  syl5((c3 : c4 → c1), (((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, hs0 =((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2)))
  foelrn(hs2, (c0 ∘ c3), c4, c2, hs0)
  rexlimdva(hs2, c4, (c3 : c4 → c1), hs0 =((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)))
  syl5ibrcom(((c3 : c4 → c1)∧ hs2 ∈ c4), hs0 =((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2)=(c0 ` hs1)))
  syl2anc(((c3 : c4 → c1)∧ hs2 ∈ c4), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2)=(c0 ` hs1)), (c3 ` hs2)∈ c1, ((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2)=(c0 `(c3 ` hs2)))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, hs2)
  fvco3(c3, c4, c1, hs2, c0)
  rspceeqv(hs1, (c3 ` hs2), c1, ((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2), (c0 `(c3 ` hs2)), (c0 ` hs1))

  eqeq1(hs0, ((c0 ∘ c3)` hs2), (c0 ` hs1))
  3anass((c0 : c1 → c2), (c3 : c4 → c1), ((c0 ∘ c3): c4 ↠ c2))
  dffo3(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: fmpt
blocks.content: Functionality of the mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c3, c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbii(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c3, c0, c2))
  sylanbrc(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c3, c0, c2), wfn(c3, c0), wss(crn(c3), c2))
  fnmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5eqss(crn(c3), c2, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c3, c0, c1)
  abssdv(hs0, c2, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  r19.29(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  biimparc(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  df-f(c3, c0, c2)
  sylib(wf(c3, c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))))
  syl5reqr(c0, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), cima(ccnv(c3), c2), wf(c3, c0, c2))
  mptpreima(s0, c3, c2, c0, c1)
  fimacnv(c3, c0, c2)
  rabid2(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)↔(c3 : c0 → c2))

  r19.29(s0, c0, c1 ∈ c2, hs0 = c1)
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1), hs0 ∈ c2)
  biimparc(c1 ∈ c2, hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, c2)
  df-f(c3, c0, c2)

  syl5reqr(c0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ c2 }, (`' c3 " c2), (c3 : c0 → c2))

blocks.content: Express bijection for a mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1ompt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, c2)), wral(s1, c2, wreu(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s1), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))

thm ffnfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)↔(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

} = {

  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  rexlimd(s0, c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ c2), (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfra1(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)∈ c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  syl6(∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ c2), s0 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → hs0 ∈ c2), (c0 ` s0)∈ c2)
  rsp(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)∈ c2)
  biimpcd((c0 ` s0)∈ c2, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)

thm ffnfvf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

thm fmpt2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)))
  mpbird(w0, wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, c4)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c3, c4))

  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c3))

thm fmpt2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 → c2), c0[Fn]c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s1)∈ c2))
  mpbird(w0, c0[Fn]c1, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)[Fn]c1)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)[Fn]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c4))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c3 ∈ c4)
  fnmpt(s0, c1, c3, c4, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))
  fneq1d(c0, c1, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, (c0 ` s1)∈ c2)
  ffnfv(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm ffvresb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s1 ∈ c5 ↦ c6))
  ⊣ (s1 = c4 → c6 = c3)

  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)

  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {

  eleq1d(c4, c5, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  syl6eq(c1, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦[hs0 / s0]c4), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), w0)

  nfcv(hs0, c4)

  csbeq1d(s1, c4, c6, [hs0 / s0]c4, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c4)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦[c4 / s1]c6)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c5))
  sylancr(∀(s0 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c5), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦[c4 / s1]c6)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c2 = c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,[c4 / s1]c6 = c3))
  eqid(c2)
  ralimi(s0, c2, c4 ∈ c5, [c4 / s1]c6 = c3)

  nfcvd(s1, c3, c4 ∈ c5)

thm fmptcos(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, csb(s1, c3, c4))))

} = {

thm cofmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)

}

thm fcompt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)))
  adantll(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))

  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wfn(c3, c4))

  ffn(c3, c4, c1)
  dffn5(s0, c3, c4)
  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  adantr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cv(s0)))

  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1))→(c0 ∘ c3)=(s0 ∈ c4 ↦(c0 `(c3 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, (c0 `(c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), c1, (c0 ` hs0), ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)))

  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, s0)
  sylib(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)), c3 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦(c3 ` s0)), c3[Fn]c4)
  adantl((c0 : c1 → c2), (c3 : c4 → c1), c3[Fn]c4)
  ffn(c3, c4, c1)
  dffn5(s0, c3, c4)
  sylib(((c0 : c1 → c2)∧(c3 : c4 → c1)), c0 =(hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` hs0)), c0[Fn]c1)
  adantr((c0 : c1 → c2), (c3 : c4 → c1), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(hs0, (c3 ` s0), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 `(c3 ` s0)))
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 : c1 → c2), (c3 : c4 → c1))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)))), wb(wf(c4, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wb(wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))

  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))), wf(c4, csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))))

thm fsng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((c4 : { c0 } → { c2 })↔ c4 = { < c0, c2 > }))
} = {

  feq3d(c4, { c0 }, { hs1 }, { c2 }, hs1 = c2)

}

thm fsn2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wf(c2, csn(c0), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))))))

  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, wf(c2, csn(c0), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))))), wf(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), c3), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))))
  feq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), c3, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))))
  eleq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq2d(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  fsn2(c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wf(c2, csn(c0), c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))))))
}

blocks.name: xpsng
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of two singletons is the singleton consisting in the associated ordered pair. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: xpprsng
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of an unordered pair and a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 20-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpprsng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cxp(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cxp(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4)), cxp(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  xpeq1i(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  3eqtr4g(cxp(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c4)), cpr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  uneq12d(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c0, c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c0, c4))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c4, c5)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c4)), csn(cop(c2, c4))))
  xpsng(c2, c3, c4, c5)
  xpundir(csn(c0), csn(c2), csn(c4))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c4), cop(c2, c4))
}

blocks.name: xpsn
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of two singletons is the singleton consisting in the associated ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2006.)

blocks.name: f1o2sn
blocks.content: A singleton consisting in a nested ordered pair is a one-to-one function from the cartesian product of two singletons onto a singleton (case where the two singletons are equal). (Contributed by AV, 15-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1o2sn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(c2)))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  opex(c0, c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  f1osng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c2, c3)
  f1oeq2d(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c2), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(csn(cop(c0, c0)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0))))
  eqcomd(csn(cop(c0, c0)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  anidms(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: residpr
blocks.content: Restriction of the identity to a pair. (Contributed by AV, 11-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm residpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2)), cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqtri(cres(cid, cpr(c0, c2)), cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), cres(cid, cun(csn(c0), csn(c2))))
  reseq2i(cid, cpr(c0, c2), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  resundi(cid, csn(c0), csn(c2))
  3eqtr4g(cun(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2))), cpr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(cop(c2, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  uneq12d(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(cop(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  anidms(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, c2))))
  anidms(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, c2))))
  xpsng(c2, c3, c2, c3)
  uneq12i(cres(cid, csn(c0)), cres(cid, csn(c2)), cxp(csn(c0), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c2), csn(c2)))
  restidsing(c0)
  restidsing(c2)
  df-pr(cop(c0, c0), cop(c2, c2))
}

blocks.name: dfmpt
blocks.content: Alternate definition for the maps-to notation ~ df-mpt (although it requires that ` B ` be a set). (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: fnasrn
blocks.content: A function expressed as the range of another function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnasrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), ciun(s0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  dfmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4i(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), ciun(s0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))))
  eqtr4i(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))))), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1)))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1)), c0, cop(cv(s0), c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  abbii(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  velsn(hs0, cop(cv(s0), c1))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(s0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cv(s0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnasrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)= ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, { < s0, c1 > }))
  dfmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  eqtr4i(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, { < s0, c1 > }), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { < s0, c1 > })})
  eqtr4i(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >)), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { < s0, c1 > })}, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = < s0, c1 >)})
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >), c0, < s0, c1 >)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ < s0, c1 >))
  abbii(hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { < s0, c1 > }), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = < s0, c1 >))
  rexbii(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ { < s0, c1 > }, hs0 = < s0, c1 >)
  velsn(hs0, < s0, c1 >)
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, { < s0, c1 > })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(< s0, c1 >)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, c1 > })
}

blocks.name: idref
blocks.content: Two ways to state that a relation is reflexive on a class. (Contributed by FL, 15-Jan-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.) (Revised by NM, 30-Mar-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm idref(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1))
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1))
  fmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  mpbiran(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0))
  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  df-f(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))
  sseq1i(cres(cid, c0), c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  eqtr3i(cres(cid, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  mptresid(s0, c0)
  fnasrn(s0, c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
}

blocks.name: funiun
blocks.content: A function is a union of singletons of ordered pairs indexed by its domain. (Contributed by AV, 18-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: funopsn

  impancom(wa(wfun(c0), wceq(c0, cop(c1, c2))), wceq(c0, ciun(hs0, cdm(c0), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(s0))), wa(wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))))

  eqeq2d(c0, ciun(hs0, cdm(c0), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), csn(cop(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wfun(c0), wceq(c0, cop(c1, c2))), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wa(wfun(c0), wceq(c0, cop(c1, c2))), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(ciun(hs0, cdm(c0), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), csn(cop(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))

blocks.name: funop
blocks.content: An ordered pair is a function iff it is a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm funop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))))
  mpan2(wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, c1)))
  eqid(cop(c0, c1))
  funopsn(s0, cop(c0, c1), c0, c1)
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)))
  adantl(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wfun(cop(c0, c1)), wfun(csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  funsn(cv(s0), cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  funeq(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, cop(c0, c1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: funopdmsn
blocks.content: The domain of a function which is an ordered pair is a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2021.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm funopdmsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  3impib(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wceq(c1, c2)), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(c3, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cop(c3, c4), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))))

  adantl(wceq(c3, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cop(c3, c4), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wceq(c1, c2)))

  eqeq1i(cop(c3, c4), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), c0)
  eqcomi(cop(c3, c4), c0)
  syl(wceq(c0, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  syl6eq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(hs0)), cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(c0, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cdm(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eleq2(cdm(c0), csn(cv(hs0)), c1)
  eleq2(cdm(c0), csn(cv(hs0)), c2)
  syl2an(wcel(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(c2, cv(hs0)))
  elsni(c1, cv(hs0))
  elsni(c2, cv(hs0))

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

thm funopdmsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2)
  ⊣ c0 = < c3, c4 >
  ⊣ c3 ∈ c5
  ⊣ c4 ∈ c6
} = {
  3impib(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ dom(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), c1 = c2)
  sylbi(Fun(c0), ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2), ∃(hs0,(c3 = { hs0 } ∧ < c3, c4 > = { < hs0, hs0 > })))
  bitri(Fun(c0), ∃(hs0,(c3 = { hs0 } ∧ < c3, c4 > = { < hs0, hs0 > })), Fun(< c3, c4 >))
  funeqi(c0, < c3, c4 >)
  funop(hs0, c3, c4)
  elexi(c3, c5)
  elexi(c4, c6)
  exlimiv(hs0, (c3 = { hs0 } ∧ < c3, c4 > = { < hs0, hs0 > }), ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2))
  adantl(c3 = { hs0 }, < c3, c4 > = { < hs0, hs0 > }, ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2))
  sylbi(< c3, c4 > = { < hs0, hs0 > }, ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2), c0 = { < hs0, hs0 > })
  eqeq1i(< c3, c4 >, { < hs0, hs0 > }, c0)
  eqcomi(< c3, c4 >, c0)
  syl(c0 = { < hs0, hs0 > }, ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2), dom(c0)= { hs0 })
  syl6eq(dom(c0), { hs0 }, dom({ < hs0, hs0 > }), c0 = { < hs0, hs0 > })
  dmeq(c0, { < hs0, hs0 > })
  dmsnop(hs0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  syl6bi(dom(c0)= { hs0 }, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0)), c1 = c2, (c1 ∈ { hs0 } ∧ c2 ∈ { hs0 }))
  anbi12d(dom(c0)= { hs0 }, c1 ∈ dom(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈ { hs0 }, c2 ∈ { hs0 })
  eleq2(dom(c0), { hs0 }, c1)
  eleq2(dom(c0), { hs0 }, c2)
  syl2an(c1 ∈ { hs0 }, c2 ∈ { hs0 }, c1 = c2, c1 = hs0, c2 = hs0)
  elsni(c1, hs0)
  elsni(c2, hs0)
  eqtr3(c1, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))→ c1 = c2))
}

blocks.name: funsndifnop
blocks.content: A singleton of an ordered pair is not an ordered pair if the components are different. (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm funsndifnop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe))))

  necon3ai(c0, c1, wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(c0, c1), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c2)

  funsn(c0, c1)

  sylbid(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wfun(c2), wceq(c0, c1), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))))
  syl6bb(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wfun(c2), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))), wfun(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  funeq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  funop(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  com12(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  exlimiv(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))), wi(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, c1)))
  impcom(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wi(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, c1)))
  com23(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl6bi(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq2(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), c2)
  ax-mp(wi(wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(c0, c1))), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  syl6bi(wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, c1))), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq1(c2, csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))
  syl(wceq(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))
  sneqr(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))

thm funsndifnop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ c1 → ¬ c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 = { < c0, c1 > }
} = {
  necon3ai(c0, c1, c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 = c1, ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, c2 = < hs0, hs1 >)))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c2)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, c2 = < hs0, hs1 >, c0 = c1)
  mpi(c2 = < hs0, hs1 >, c0 = c1, Fun(c2))
  ax-mp(Fun(c2), c2 = { < c0, c1 > })
  mpbiri(c2 = { < c0, c1 > }, Fun(c2), Fun({ < c0, c1 > }))
  funsn(c0, c1)
  funeq(c2, { < c0, c1 > })
  sylbid(c2 = < hs0, hs1 >, Fun(c2), c0 = c1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = { hs2 } ∧ < hs0, hs1 > = { < hs2, hs2 > })))
  syl6bb(c2 = < hs0, hs1 >, Fun(c2), ∃(hs2,(hs0 = { hs2 } ∧ < hs0, hs1 > = { < hs2, hs2 > })), Fun(< hs0, hs1 >))
  funeq(c2, < hs0, hs1 >)
  funop(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  com12(c2 = < hs0, hs1 >, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = { hs2 } ∧ < hs0, hs1 > = { < hs2, hs2 > })), c0 = c1)
  exlimiv(hs2, (hs0 = { hs2 } ∧ < hs0, hs1 > = { < hs2, hs2 > }), (c2 = < hs0, hs1 > → c0 = c1))
  impcom(hs0 = { hs2 }, < hs0, hs1 > = { < hs2, hs2 > }, (c2 = < hs0, hs1 > → c0 = c1))

blocks.name: funsneqopb
blocks.content: A singleton of an ordered pair is an ordered pair iff the components are equal. (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm funsneqopb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6eqel(c2, cxp(universe, universe), cop(csn(c1), csn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(c2, cop(csn(c1), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl6eq(csn(cop(c0, c1)), cop(csn(c1), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c1, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  sneqd(cop(c0, c1), cop(c1, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  opeq1(c0, c1, c1)
  snopeqopsnid(c1)
  opelvv(csn(c1), csn(c1))
  snex(c1)
  necon4ai(c0, c1, wcel(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  funsndifnop(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funsneqopb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 ↔ c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 = { < c0, c1 > }
} = {
  impbii(c0 = c1, c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  syl6eqel(c2, (𝕌 × 𝕌), < { c1 }, { c1 } >, c0 = c1)
  syl5eq(c2, < { c1 }, { c1 } >, { < c0, c1 > }, c0 = c1)
  syl6eq({ < c0, c1 > }, < { c1 }, { c1 } >, { < c1, c1 > }, c0 = c1)
  sneqd(< c0, c1 >, < c1, c1 >, c0 = c1)
  opeq1(c0, c1, c1)
  snopeqopsnid(c1)
  opelvv({ c1 }, { c1 })
  snex(c1)
  necon4ai(c0, c1, c2 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  funsndifnop(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: ressnop0

thm ftp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wf(ctp(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3), cop(c4, c5)), ctp(c0, c2, c4), ctp(c1, c3, c5))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c5, universe)
  -| wne(c0, c2)
  -| wne(c0, c4)
  -| wne(c2, c4)
} = {
  mp3an(wf(ctp(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3), cop(c4, c5)), ctp(c0, c2, c4), ctp(c1, c3, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c5, universe))
  3pm3.2i(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))
  ftpg(c0, universe, c2, universe, c4, universe, c1, universe, c3, universe, c5, universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ftp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ({ < c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 >, < c4, c5 > } : { c0, c2, c4 } → { c1, c3, c5 })
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c4 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c5 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c0 ≠ c2
  ⊣ c0 ≠ c4
  ⊣ c2 ≠ c4
} = {
  mp3an(({ < c0, c1 >, < c2, c3 >, < c4, c5 > } : { c0, c2, c4 } → { c1, c3, c5 }), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c5 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ≠ c2 ∧ c0 ≠ c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c4))
  3pm3.2i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  3pm3.2i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌, c5 ∈ 𝕌)
  3pm3.2i(c0 ≠ c2, c0 ≠ c4, c2 ≠ c4)
  ftpg(c0, universe, c2, universe, c4, universe, c1, universe, c3, universe, c5, universe)
}

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wf(cres(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c2), c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))))
}

blocks.name: fvrnressn
blocks.content: If the value of a function is in the range of the function restricted to the singleton containing the argument, then the value of the function is in the range of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvrnressn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2))))
} = {
  syl5bir(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))))
  eleq2i(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0)), crn(cres(c2, csn(c0))))
  df-ima(c2, csn(c0))
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2)))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, c1, wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2, cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(c2, c0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cima(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), universe))
  elimasng(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c0), universe, c2)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), crn(c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), c2))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), universe))
  fvex(c2, c0)
  elrn2g(hs0, cfv(c2, c0), universe, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm fvrnressn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →((c2 ` c0)∈ ran((c2 |` { c0 }))→(c2 ` c0)∈ ran(c2)))
} = {
  syl5bir(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ` c0)∈ ran((c2 |` { c0 })), (c2 ` c0)∈ ran(c2), (c2 ` c0)∈(c2 " { c0 }))
  eleq2i((c2 ` c0), (c2 " { c0 }), ran((c2 |` { c0 })))
  df-ima(c2, { c0 })
  3imtr4d(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ` c0)∈(c2 " { c0 }), (c2 ` c0)∈ ran(c2), < c0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2, ∃(hs0, < hs0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, c1, < c0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2, < hs0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2)
  eleq1d(< hs0,(c2 ` c0)>, c2, < c0,(c2 ` c0)>, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, (c2 ` c0))
  mpan2(c0 ∈ c1, ((c2 ` c0)∈(c2 " { c0 })↔ < c0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2), (c2 ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  elimasng(c0, c1, (c2 ` c0), universe, c2)
  mp1i(c0 ∈ c1, ((c2 ` c0)∈ ran(c2)↔ ∃(hs0, < hs0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2)), (c2 ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(c2, c0)
  elrn2g(hs0, (c2 ` c0), universe, c2)

  diff.hs0.w(< c0,(c2 ` c0)> ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 ` c0))

}

blocks.name: fvressn
blocks.content: The value of a function restricted to the singleton containing the argument equals the value of the function for this argument. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: fvn0fvelrn
blocks.content: If the value of a function is not null, the value is an element of the range of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)

  imp(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  mpd(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wi(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  eldmressnsn(c1, c0)
  com13(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ex(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))))
  syl(wa(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))))), wi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), crn(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  fvelrn(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1)

blocks.name: fvconst

blocks.name: fnsnr
blocks.content: If a class belongs to a function on a singleton, then that class is the obvious ordered pair. Note that this theorem also holds when ` A ` is a proper class, but its meaning is then different. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: fnsnb
blocks.content: A function whose domain is a singleton can be represented as a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) Revised to add reverse implication. (Revised by NM, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnsnb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  eqrdv(hs0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), wfn(c0, csn(c1)))
  syl6bbr(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  impbid(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  fnsnr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syl5ibrcom(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0))
  syl(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  sylbi(wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-fn(c0, csn(c1))
  anim2i(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cdm(c0), csn(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  eleq2(cdm(c0), csn(c1), c1)
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), c0)
  velsn(hs0, cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, csn(c1)), wfn(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), csn(c1)))
  fnsn(c1, cfv(c0, c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  fneq1(c0, csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))), csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wfn(c0, csn(c1)))
}

thm fnsnb(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]{ c1 } ↔ c0 = { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> })
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  impbii(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, c0 = { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> })
  eqrdv(hs0, c0, { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }, c0[Fn]{ c1 })
  syl6bbr(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }, hs0 = < c1,(c0 ` c1)>)
  impbid(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = < c1,(c0 ` c1)>)
  fnsnr(c0, c1, hs0)
  syl5ibrcom(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, hs0 = < c1,(c0 ` c1)>, hs0 ∈ c0, < c1,(c0 ` c1)> ∈ c0)
  syl(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, < c1,(c0 ` c1)> ∈ c0, (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
  sylbi(c0[Fn]{ c1 }, (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)), (Fun(c0)∧ dom(c0)= { c1 }))
  df-fn(c0, { c1 })
  anim2i(Fun(c0), dom(c0)= { c1 }, c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  mpbiri(dom(c0)= { c1 }, c1 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈ { c1 })
  snid(c1)
  eleq2(dom(c0), { c1 }, c1)
  funfvop(c0, c1)
  eleq1(hs0, < c1,(c0 ` c1)>, c0)
  velsn(hs0, < c1,(c0 ` c1)>)
  mpbiri(c0 = { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }, c0[Fn]{ c1 }, { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }[Fn]{ c1 })
  fnsn(c1, (c0 ` c1))
  fvex(c0, c1)
  fneq1(c0, { < c1,(c0 ` c1)> }, { c1 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < c1,(c0 ` c1)> })
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Fn]{ c1 })
}

thm fmptsng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)))
  velsn(hs1, cop(c0, c2))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqidd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  opelopabga(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2)))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, c0)))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), c0, c0)
  sylan9bbr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c4))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c4)
  eqeq2d(c2, c4, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wex(s0, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))

  exlimivv(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))))
  impcom(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))))
  sylbid(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c4)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c4), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))

  syl6eqel(cop(c0, c4), csn(cop(c0, c2)), cop(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  opeq2d(c0, c4, c2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c4, c2))
  snid(cop(c0, c2))
  opex(c0, c2)
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c4), csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c4), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c4)
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c2, c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c2)

  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cop(c0, c2))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c4)

blocks.pretty:
thm fmptsng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ { < c0, c2 > } =(s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c4 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4a({ < c0, c2 > }, (s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c4), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ { c0 } ∧ hs0 = c4)}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4), (s0 ∈ { c0 } ∧ hs0 = c4))
  anbi1i(s0 = c0, hs0 = c4, s0 ∈ { c0 })
  bicomi(s0 = c0, s0 ∈ { c0 })
  velsn(s0, c0)
  eqrdv(hs1, { < c0, c2 > }, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  impbid((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)})

  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)}, c0 = c0, c2 = c2)
  eqidd(c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))

  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c2 >, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)})
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)}, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > }, ∃(s0, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, hs1, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (∃(s0, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4))))→ hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > }))
  exlimivv(s0, hs0, (hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4)), hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > })
  impcom(hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4), hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > })
  sylbid((s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4), hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 = < c0, c4 >)
  eqeq2d(hs1, < s0, hs0 >, < c0, c4 >, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4))

  syl6eqel(< c0, c4 >, { < c0, c2 > }, < c0, c2 >, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c4))

  df-mpt(s0, hs0, { c0 }, c4)

  3eqtr4a(csn(cop(c0, c1)), cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), w0)

  eqrdv(hs1, csn(cop(c0, c1)), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), w0)

  mpbir2and(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c1))
  eqidd(c0, w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  bitrd(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, w0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  syl5bb(w0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  sbcan(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  anbi12d(w0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wb(wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  sbcg(hs0, c1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wsbc(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c4))
  eqsbc3(hs0, c1, c4, c2)
  sbcied(s0, c0, c3, w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c1)))
  anbi12d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c1))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, c0)))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), c0, c0)
  eqeq2d(c1, c2, c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  opelopabsb(s0, hs0, c0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wex(s0, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))

  impcomd(w0, wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)))))
  sylbid(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c2), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  adantl(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c2)))
  opeq12(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  syl6eqel(cop(c0, c2), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cop(c0, c1), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  opeq2d(c0, c2, c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  adantrr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c2, c1))
  snid(cop(c0, c1))
  opex(c0, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cop(c0, c2), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c2)
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, c1)

  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), csn(cop(c0, c1)))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cop(c0, c1))

thm fmptsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { < c0, c1 > } =(s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→ c2 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4a({ < c0, c1 > }, (s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ { c0 } ∧ hs0 = c2)}, w0)
  opabbii(s0, hs0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 ∈ { c0 } ∧ hs0 = c2))
  anbi1i(s0 = c0, hs0 = c2, s0 ∈ { c0 })
  bicomi(s0 = c0, s0 ∈ { c0 })
  velsn(s0, c0)
  eqrdv(hs1, { < c0, c1 > }, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, w0)
  impbid(w0, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  syl5bi(w0, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, hs1 = < c0, c1 >)
  velsn(hs1, < c0, c1 >)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, hs1 = < c0, c1 >, hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, < c0, c1 > ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  sylibr(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  mpbir2and(w0, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), c0 = c0, c1 = c1)
  eqidd(c0, w0)
  eqidd(c1, w0)
  bitrd(w0, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (c0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c1), [c0 / s0](s0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c2))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, w0, [c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c2))
  syl5bb(w0, [c1 / hs0](s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c2), ([c1 / hs0]s0 = c0 ∧[c1 / hs0]hs0 = c2))
  sbcan(hs0, c1, s0 = c0, hs0 = c2)
  anbi12d(w0, [c1 / hs0]s0 = c0, [c1 / hs0]hs0 = c2, s0 = c0, c1 = c2)
  syl(w0, ([c1 / hs0]s0 = c0 ↔ s0 = c0), c1 ∈ c4)
  sbcg(hs0, c1, c4, s0 = c0)
  syl(w0, ([c1 / hs0]hs0 = c2 ↔ c1 = c2), c1 ∈ c4)
  eqsbc3(hs0, c1, c4, c2)
  sbcied(s0, c0, c3, w0, (s0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c2), (c0 = c0 ∧ c1 = c1))
  anbi12d((w0 ∧ s0 = c0), s0 = c0, c1 = c2, c0 = c0, c1 = c1)
  adantl(w0, s0 = c0, (s0 = c0 ↔ c0 = c0))
  eqeq1(s0, c0, c0)
  eqeq2d(c1, c2, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 = c0))
  opelopabsb(s0, hs0, c0, c1, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c1 >, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  syl5bi(w0, hs1 ∈ { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, ∃(s0, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)))))
  elopab(s0, hs0, hs1, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  exlimdvv(s0, hs0, w0, (hs1 = < s0, hs0 > ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)), hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > })
  impcomd(w0, hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > })
  ex(w0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (hs1 = < s0, hs0 > → hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }))
  sylbid((w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)), hs1 = < s0, hs0 >, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, hs1 = < c0, c2 >)
  eqeq2d(hs1, < s0, hs0 >, < c0, c2 >, (w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)))
  adantl(w0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), < s0, hs0 > = < c0, c2 >)
  opeq12(s0, c0, hs0, c2)
  syl5ibrcom((w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)), hs1 = < c0, c2 >, hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < c0, c1 > })
  syl6eqel(< c0, c2 >, { < c0, c1 > }, < c0, c1 >, (w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)))
  opeq2d(c0, c2, c1, (w0 ∧(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)))
  adantrr(w0, s0 = c0, hs0 = c2, c2 = c1)
  snid(< c0, c1 >)
  opex(c0, c1)
  eleq1(hs1, < c0, c2 >, { < c0, c1 > })
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c2)= { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ { c0 } ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, { c0 }, c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ < c0, c1 > })
  diff.hs1.c({ < s0, hs0 > |(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 = c0, c1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, { < c0, c1 > })
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, < c0, c1 >)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 ∈ { < c0, c1 > })
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
}

blocks.name: fmptap
blocks.content: Append an additional value to a function. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmptap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(cun(c0, csn(c2)), c4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1)), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1))
  uneq2i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1))
  eqtr4i(csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c3))
  mp2an(wceq(csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  fmptsn(s0, c2, universe, c3, universe)
  mpteq2ia(s0, csn(c2), c1, c3)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c2))

thm fmptap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)⋃ { < c2, c3 > })=(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (c0 ⋃ { c2 })= c4
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)⋃ { < c2, c3 > }), (s0 ∈ c4 ↦ c1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)⋃(s0 ∈ { c2 } ↦ c1)), (s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c2 })↦ c1))
  uneq2i((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), { < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ∈ { c2 } ↦ c1))
  eqtr4i({ < c2, c3 > }, (s0 ∈ { c2 } ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ { c2 } ↦ c3))
  mp2an({ < c2, c3 > } =(s0 ∈ { c2 } ↦ c3), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fmptsn(s0, c2, universe, c3, universe)
  mpteq2ia(s0, { c2 }, c1, c3)
  syl(s0 ∈ { c2 }, c1 = c3, s0 = c2)
  elsni(s0, c2)
  mptun(s0, c0, { c2 }, c1)
  mpteq1i(s0, (c0 ⋃ { c2 }), c1, c4)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

thm fmptapd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c4, c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1)), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1), w0)
  uneq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csn(cop(c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1), w0)
  fmptsnd(s0, c2, c3, c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1), cun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, csn(c2), c1))))
  mptun(s0, c0, csn(c2), c1)
  mpteq1d(s0, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c1, c4, w0)

  adantl(c0[Fn]c1, hs0 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` hs0)=((= |` c1)` hs0)↔(c0 ` hs0)= hs0))
  eqeq2d((c0 ` hs0), ((= |` c1)` hs0), hs0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  fvresi(hs0, c1)
  nne((c0 ` hs0), hs0)
  eqeq1d(dom((c0 \ =)), emptycls, { hs0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` hs0)≠ hs0 }, c0[Fn]c1)
  fndifnfp(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpan2(c0[Fn]c1, (c0 =(= |` c1)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)=((= |` c1)` hs0))), (= |` c1)[Fn]c1)
  fnresi(c1)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c1, (= |` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Fn]c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((= |` c1))
}

blocks.name: fvunsn
blocks.content: Remove an ordered pair not participating in a function value. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvunsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1), cfv(c2, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr3g(cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cres(c2, csn(c1)), c1), wne(c0, c1))
  fveq1d(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1, cres(c2, csn(c1)), wne(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), cres(c2, csn(c1)), cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))), wne(c0, c1))
  resundir(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))
  syl6eq(cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1))), cres(c2, csn(c1)), cun(cres(c2, csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  uneq2d(cres(c2, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1)), emptycls, wne(c0, c1))
  syl(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c0, c3)), csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, csn(c1))))
  nelsn(c0, c1)
  ressnop0(c0, csn(c1), c3)
  un0(cres(c2, csn(c1)))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvressn(c1, universe, cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cres(cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))), csn(c1)))
  fvprc(c1, cun(c2, csn(cop(c0, c3))))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cres(c2, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvressn(c1, universe, c2)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cres(c2, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c2, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cres(c2, csn(c1)))
  fvprc(c1, c2)
}

thm fvsngOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq1d(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  sneqd(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fvsn(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
}

thm fvsngOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2)
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2, ({ < hs0, hs1 > } ` hs0)= hs1, ({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0)= hs1)
  eqeq1d(({ < hs0, hs1 > } ` hs0), hs1, ({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq12d({ < hs0, hs1 > }, hs0, { < c0, hs1 > }, c0, hs0 = c0)
  sneqd(< hs0, hs1 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  eqeq12d(({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0), hs1, ({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0), c2, hs1 = c2)
  fveq1d({ < c0, hs1 > }, c0, { < c0, c2 > }, hs1 = c2)
  sneqd(< c0, hs1 >, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  id(hs1 = c2)
  fvsn(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(({ < c0, hs1 > } ` c0)= hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(({ < c0, c2 > } ` c0)= c2)
}

blocks.content: The value of a function with one of its ordered pairs replaced, at the replaced ordered pair. See also ~ fvsnun2 . (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2007.) Put in deduction form. (Revised by BJ, 25-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvsnun1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))))
} = {
  3eqtr3a(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), w0)
  fveq1i(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1, cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  eqtri(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)))
  reseq1i(c0, csn(c1), cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))))
  eqtri(cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  uneq2i(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c5, cdif(c6, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  eqtri(cin(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls, cin(csn(c1), cdif(c6, csn(c1))))
  incom(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c6)
  resdisj(cdif(c6, csn(c1)), csn(c1), c5)
  un0(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  fvresd(c0, csn(c1), c1, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1), w0)
  fvresd(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, csn(c1)), wcel(c1, c3))
  snidg(c1, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1), c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c4))
  fvsng(c1, c3, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: fvsnun2
blocks.content: The value of a function with one of its ordered pairs replaced, at arguments other than the replaced one. See also ~ fvsnun1 . (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2007.) Put in deduction form. (Revised by BJ, 25-Feb-2023.)
