thm fvsnun2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1), cfv(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1), w0)
  fveq1d(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), c1, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), w0)
  3eqtrd(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  reseq1i(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cun(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  3eqtrd(cun(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cun(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), w0)
  uneq12d(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), w0)
  mpbii(w0, wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c3), c7)
  syl(w0, wb(wceq(cin(csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c5)), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls)), wfn(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, wfn(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))
  fnsng(c3, c4, c5, c6)
  fnresdisj(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cdif(c7, csn(c3))), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  residm(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))), cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls)))
  uncom(emptycls, cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))), emptycls), cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)))))
  un0(cres(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3))))
  fvresd(c0, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), c1, w0)
  fvresd(c2, cdif(c7, csn(c3)), c1, w0)
}

thm fvsnun1OLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)

} = {
  3eqtr3i(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1))
  fveq1i(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1, cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  eqtri(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)))
  reseq1i(c0, csn(c1), cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))
  eqtri(cres(cun(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), csn(c1)), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  uneq2i(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  eqtri(cin(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1)), emptycls, cin(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))))
  incom(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c4)
  resdisj(cdif(c4, csn(c1)), csn(c1), c3)
  un0(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(c0, csn(c1)), c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  fvres(c1, csn(c1), c0)
  eqtri(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(csn(cop(c1, c2)), csn(c1)), c1), cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  fvres(c1, csn(c1), csn(cop(c1, c2)))
  fvsn(c1, c2)
}

thm fvsnun2OLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c4, c0)))

  -| wcel(c5, universe)
  -| wceq(c3, cun(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))))
} = {
  3eqtr3a(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c4, c0), cfv(cres(c3, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), c0), cfv(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), c0), wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))))

  3eqtri(cres(c3, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(cun(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cun(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cdif(c1, csn(c2)))))
  reseq1i(c3, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), cun(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))))
  resundir(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cdif(c1, csn(c2)))
  3eqtri(cun(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cdif(c1, csn(c2)))), cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cun(emptycls, cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))), cun(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls))
  uneq12i(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls, cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))))
  mpbi(wceq(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c2), c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cin(csn(c2), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c2, c5)), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), emptycls)), wfn(csn(cop(c2, c5)), csn(c2)))
  fnsn(c2, c5)
  fnresdisj(csn(cop(c2, c5)), csn(c2), cdif(c1, csn(c2)))
  residm(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))
  uncom(emptycls, cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))))
  un0(cres(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c2))))
  fvres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3)
  fvres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c4)
}

blocks.name: fnsnsplit
blocks.content: Split a function into a single point and all the rest. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnsnsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))))))
} = {
  eqtr3d(c0, cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))), cres(c0, c1), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0))
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  3eqtr3a(cres(c0, c1), cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))), cres(c0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2))), cun(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(c0, csn(c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  resundi(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2))
  reseq2d(c0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c1, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c1))
  difsnid(c2, c1)
  uneq2d(cres(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), cres(c0, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fnressn(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: fsnunf
blocks.content: Adjoining a point to a function gives a function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsnunf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), c2))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), c2), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5))))
  syl21anc(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5))), wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wceq(cin(c1, csn(c3)), emptycls))
  simp1(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2))
  syl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wf1o(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2))
  simp2l(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c5, c2))
  simp3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2))
  f1osng(c3, c4, c5, c2)
  f1of(csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5))
  sylibr(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cin(c1, csn(c3)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, c1)))
  simp2r(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c5, c2))
  disjsn(c1, c3)
  fun(c0, c1, c2, csn(cop(c3, c5)), csn(c3), csn(c5))
  feq3d(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c5))), cun(c1, csn(c3)), cun(c2, csn(c5)), c2, w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)))
  sylib(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cun(c2, csn(c5)), c2), wss(csn(c5), c2))
  3ad2ant3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wn(wcel(c3, c1))), wcel(c5, c2), wss(csn(c5), c2))
  snssi(c5, c2)
  ssequn2(csn(c5), c2)
}

blocks.name: fsnunf2
blocks.content: Adjoining a point to a punctured function gives a function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsnunf2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), c1, c3))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), c1, c3), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c3))
  syl121anc(w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)), wf(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c3), wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(c4, c3))
  simp1(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3))
  simp2(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3))
  neldifsnd(c2, c1, w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)))
  simp3(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3))
  fsnunf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3, c2, c1, c4)
  feq2d(cun(c0, csn(cop(c2, c4))), cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c3, c1, w3a(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3)))
  3ad2ant2(wf(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), c1))
  difsnid(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: fsnunfv
blocks.content: Recover the added point from a point-added function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.) (Revised by NM, 18-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsnunfv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))), wceq(cfv(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), c0), c2))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), c0), c2, cfv(cres(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), csn(c0)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  fveq1d(cres(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), csn(c0)), c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  3eqtr4g(cres(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c2)), cun(cres(c4, csn(c0)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0))), cun(emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  uneq12d(cres(c4, csn(c0)), cres(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)), emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))), wceq(cres(c4, csn(c0)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wceq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls, cin(cdm(c4), csn(c0)), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))))
  eqtri(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), cin(cdm(c4), csn(c0)), cin(csn(c0), cdm(c4)))
  dmres(c4, csn(c0))
  incom(csn(c0), cdm(c4))
  biimpri(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wceq(cin(cdm(c4), csn(c0)), emptycls))
  disjsn(cdm(c4), c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cres(c4, csn(c0)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cres(c4, csn(c0))), emptycls)), wrel(cres(c4, csn(c0))))
  relres(c4, csn(c0))
  reldm0(cres(c4, csn(c0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))), wceq(cres(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)), csn(cop(c0, c2))), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0)))
  fnsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fnresdm(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0))
  resundir(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(c0))
  eqtr2i(csn(cop(c0, c2)), cun(emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2))), cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  un0(csn(cop(c0, c2)))
  fvresd(cun(c4, csn(cop(c0, c2))), csn(c0), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(c4))), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
  fvsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: fsnunres
blocks.content: Recover the original function from a point-added function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: funresdfunsn
blocks.content: Restricting a function to a domain without one element of the domain of the function, and adding a pair of this element and the function value of the element results in the function itself. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: fvpr1
blocks.content: The value of a function with a domain of two elements. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvpr1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3)), c0), c2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3)), c0), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), wne(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), cfv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c1, c3))), c0), wne(c0, c1))
  fveq1i(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3)), c0, cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c1, c3))))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c1, c3))
  sylbi(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c1, c3))), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0)), wne(c1, c0))
  necom(c0, c1)
  fvunsn(c1, c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), c3)
  fvsn(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fvpr2
blocks.content: The value of a function with a domain of two elements. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: fvpr1g
blocks.content: The value of a function with a domain of (at most) two elements. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvpr1g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c4)), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), c0), c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), c0), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c4)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c4), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0)))
  syl5eq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), cfv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))), c0), wne(c0, c4))
  fveq1i(cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), c0, cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5))
  sylbi(wne(c0, c4), wceq(cfv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0)), wne(c4, c0))
  necom(c0, c4)
  fvunsn(c4, c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), c5)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c4), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
  fvsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: fvpr2g
blocks.content: The value of a function with a domain of (at most) two elements. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvpr2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c0)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c0), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0)))
  syl5eq(cfv(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), c0), cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), cfv(cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))), c0), wne(c4, c0))
  fveq1i(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), c0, cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))))
  eqtri(cpr(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2)), cun(csn(cop(c0, c2)), csn(cop(c4, c5))), cpr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)))
  prcom(cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2))
  df-pr(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5))
  fvunsn(c4, c0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), c5)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, c0), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c2)), c0), c2))
  fvsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: fprb
blocks.content: A condition for functionhood over a pair. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wb(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cop(c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wne(c0, c1), wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cop(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  expcom(wne(c0, c1), wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cop(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wne(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cop(c1, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), c3), wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c2, c1)))))
  adantr(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wne(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3))
  mpan2(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c1)))
  prid1(c0, c1)
  ffvelrn(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3, c0)
  adantr(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wne(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), c3))
  mpan2(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), c3), wcel(c1, cpr(c0, c1)))
  prid2(c1, c0)
  ffvelrn(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3, c1)
  mpbird(wa(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wne(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c2, c1)))), wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wf(c2, cpr(c0, c1), c3), wne(c0, c1), wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), cv(s0)))))

  fvconst2g(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c3)
  syl2an(wf(c2, c3, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c2, cxp(c3, csn(c0))), wral(hs0, c3, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cxp(c3, csn(c0)), cv(hs0))))), wfn(c2, c3), wfn(cxp(c3, csn(c0)), c3))

  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wi(wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantrd(wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))))
  expd(wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))
  syl5ib(wcel(c2, universe), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))), wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)))
  sylbir(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2))), wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wfo(c0, c1, csn(c2)))
  df-fo(c0, c1, csn(c2))
  fof(c0, c1, csn(c2))

  adantrd(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wfn(c0, c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))))
  syl5(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wfn(c0, c1), wi(wceq(crn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))), wrel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)

  xpeq2(csn(c2), emptycls, c1)
  xp0(c1)
}

thm fconst5(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)→(c0 =(c1 × { c2 })↔ ran(c0)= { c2 }))
} = {
  impbid((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), c0 =(c1 × { c2 }), ran(c0)= { c2 })
  adantl(c0[Fn]c1, c1 ≠ ∅, (c0 =(c1 × { c2 })→ ran(c0)= { c2 }))
  syl5ib(c1 ≠ ∅, c0 =(c1 × { c2 }), ran(c0)= { c2 }, ran(c0)= ran((c1 × { c2 })))
  rneq(c0, (c1 × { c2 }))
  eqeq2d(ran(c0), ran((c1 × { c2 })), { c2 }, c1 ≠ ∅)
  rnxp(c1, { c2 })
  pm2.61i(((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)→(ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 }))), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantrd(c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fn]c1, c1 ≠ ∅, (ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 })))
  expd(c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)= { c2 }, c0 =(c1 × { c2 }))
  syl5ib(c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)= { c2 }), c0 =(c1 × { c2 }), (c0 : c1 → { c2 }))
  sylbir((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ran(c0)= { c2 }), (c0 : c1 → { c2 }), (c0 : c1 ↠ { c2 }))
  df-fo(c0, c1, { c2 })
  fof(c0, c1, { c2 })
  fconst2g(c2, universe, c0, c1)
  adantrd(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fn]c1, c1 ≠ ∅, (ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 })))
  syl5(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fn]c1, (ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 })), Rel(c0))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  sylbi(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, (Rel(c0)→(ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 }))), { c2 } = ∅)
  snprc(c2)
  ex({ c2 } = ∅, Rel(c0), (ran(c0)= { c2 } → c0 =(c1 × { c2 })))
  3imtr4d(({ c2 } = ∅ ∧ Rel(c0)), ran(c0)= { c2 }, c0 =(c1 × { c2 }), ran(c0)= ∅, c0 = ∅)
  adantl({ c2 } = ∅, Rel(c0), (ran(c0)= ∅ → c0 = ∅))
  biimprd(Rel(c0), ran(c0)= ∅, c0 = ∅)
  relrn0(c0)
  adantr({ c2 } = ∅, Rel(c0), (ran(c0)= { c2 } ↔ ran(c0)= ∅))
  eqeq2({ c2 }, emptycls, ran(c0))
  adantr({ c2 } = ∅, Rel(c0), (c0 =(c1 × { c2 })↔ c0 = ∅))
  eqeq2d(c0, (c1 × { c2 }), emptycls, { c2 } = ∅)
  syl6eq((c1 × { c2 }), emptycls, (c1 × ∅), { c2 } = ∅)
  xpeq2({ c2 }, emptycls, c1)
  xp0(c1)
}

blocks.name: rnmptc

thm rnmptc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), csn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbii(w0, wceq(crn(c0), csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cxp(c2, csn(c1))))
  eqtr4i(c0, cxp(c2, csn(c1)), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  fconstmpt(s0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cxp(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(crn(c0), csn(c1))), wfn(c0, c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  ffnd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  fconst5(c0, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)= { c1 })
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbii(w0, ran(c0)= { c1 }, c0 =(c2 × { c1 }))
  eqtr4i(c0, (c2 × { c1 }), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1))
  fconstmpt(s0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 =(c2 × { c1 })↔ ran(c0)= { c1 }), c0[Fn]c2, c2 ≠ ∅)
  ffnd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  fconst5(c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: fntpb
blocks.content: A function whose domain has at most three elements can be represented as a set of at most three ordered pairs. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fntpb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c3, cfv(c0, c3)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  pm2.61iine(c1, c2, c1, c3, wb(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c3, cfv(c0, c3))))))
  pm2.61ine(c2, c3, wi(wa(wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wb(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c3, cfv(c0, c3)))))))
  a1d(wceq(c2, c3), wa(wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wb(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c3, cfv(c0, c3))))))
  3bitr3d(wceq(c2, c3), wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c3, cfv(c0, c3)))), wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c2)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))))
  a1i(wceq(c2, c3), wb(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c2)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))))))
  3bitr3i(wfn(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c2)), wceq(c0, ctp(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))), wfn(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cop(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))))
  fneq2i(c0, cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c1, c2, c2))

blocks.name: fnpr2g
blocks.content: A function whose domain has at most two elements can be represented as a set of at most two ordered pairs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))), wb(wfn(c4, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))), wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))))

  fneq2d(c4, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2d(c4, cpr(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))
  fneq2d(c4, cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  eqeq2d(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  preq2d(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq12d(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), c2, cfv(c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c4)
  fnprb(c4, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))))
}

blocks.name: fpr2g
blocks.content: A function that maps a pair to a class is a pair of ordered pairs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fpr2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))))
  3jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))
  ffvelrnd(c4, c0, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c2)))
  ffvelrnd(c4, c2, c5, cpr(c0, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c2)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)))
  ffn(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), wb(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))), wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wss(c4, cxp(cpr(c0, c2), c5)))
  3ad2antr3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)))
  fnpr2g(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstrd(c4, cxp(cpr(c0, c2), c5), cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))
  prssd(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)), cxp(cpr(c0, c2), c5), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))))
  opelxpd(c0, cfv(c4, c0), cpr(c0, c2), c5, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c2)))
  prid1g(c0, c1, c2)
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))
  opelxpd(c2, cfv(c4, c2), cpr(c0, c2), c5, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2))))), wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c2)))
  prid2g(c2, c3, c0)
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), c5), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wceq(c4, cpr(cop(c0, cfv(c4, c0)), cop(c2, cfv(c4, c2)))))
  dff2(c4, cpr(c0, c2), c5)
}

blocks.name: fconstfv
blocks.content: A constant function expressed in terms of its functionality, domain, and value. See also ~ fconst2 . (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fconstfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))))
  ffnfv(s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  anbi2i(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  elsn(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)
  fvex(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fconstfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → { c2 })↔(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 → { c2 }), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2)), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ { c2 })))
  ffnfv(s0, c0, c1, { c2 })
  anbi2i(c0[Fn]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ { c2 }), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2))
  ralbii(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)∈ { c2 }, (c0 ` s0)= c2)
  elsn((c0 ` s0), c2)
  fvex(c0, s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fconst3
blocks.content: Two ways to express a constant function. (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm fconst3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2)))))
} = {
  bitri(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2)))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  fconstfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wfn(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))
  syl2anc(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2)))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  syl(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  eqimss2(cdm(c0), c1)
  funconstss(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fconst3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → { c2 })↔(c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(`' c0 " { c2 })))
} = {
  bitri((c0 : c1 → { c2 }), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(`' c0 " { c2 })), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)= c2)))
  fconstfv(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(c0[Fn]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)= c2), c1 ⊆(`' c0 " { c2 }))
  syl2anc(c0[Fn]c1, (∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)= c2)↔ c1 ⊆(`' c0 " { c2 })), Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  syl(c0[Fn]c1, c1 ⊆ dom(c0), dom(c0)= c1)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  eqimss2(dom(c0), c1)
  funconstss(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.content: Two ways to express a constant function. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: resfunexg
blocks.content: The restriction of a function to a set exists. Compare Proposition 6.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm resfunexg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cres(c0, c1), universe, cima(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1))), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl6eqr(cres(c0, c1), cima(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl6eq(cres(c0, c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cres(c0, c1), cdm(cres(c0, c1))))
  funfnd(cres(c0, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wfun(cres(c0, c1)))
  funres(c0, c1)
  dffn5(hs0, cres(c0, c1), cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  fnasrn(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  fvex(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))
  eqtr3i(cima(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1))), crn(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), cima(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))))))
  imaeq2i(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  dmmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))
  opex(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))))
  imadmrn(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))))
  sylancr(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cima(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1))), universe), wfun(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe))
  funmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe))
  dmresexg(c1, c2, c0)
  funimaexg(cmpt(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
}

blocks.name: resiexd
blocks.content: The restriction of the identity relation to a set is a set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: fnex
blocks.content: If the domain of a function is a set, the function is a set. Theorem 6.16(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 28. This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ resfunexg . See ~ fnexALT for alternate proof. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
} = {
  syl2an2r(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wrel(c0), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe))
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  sylanb(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wa(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  anassrs(wfun(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe))
  sylan2(wfun(c0), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), c2))
  impcom(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(c0), c2))
  eleq1a(c1, c2, cdm(c0))
  resfunexg(c0, cdm(c0), c2)
  biimpa(wrel(c0), wcel(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  eleq1d(cres(c0, cdm(c0)), universe, c0, wrel(c0))
  resdm(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  syl2an2r(c0[Fn]c1, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c0), (c0 |` dom(c0))∈ 𝕌)
  fnrel(c0, c1)
  sylanb(c0[Fn]c1, c1 ∈ c2, (c0 |` dom(c0))∈ 𝕌, (Fun(c0)∧ dom(c0)= c1))
  df-fn(c0, c1)
  anassrs(Fun(c0), dom(c0)= c1, c1 ∈ c2, (c0 |` dom(c0))∈ 𝕌)
  sylan2(Fun(c0), (dom(c0)= c1 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c0 |` dom(c0))∈ 𝕌, dom(c0)∈ c2)
  impcom(dom(c0)= c1, c1 ∈ c2, dom(c0)∈ c2)
  eleq1a(c1, c2, dom(c0))
  resfunexg(c0, dom(c0), c2)
  biimpa(Rel(c0), (c0 |` dom(c0))∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1d((c0 |` dom(c0)), universe, c0, Rel(c0))
  resdm(c0)
}

blocks.name: funex
blocks.content: If the domain of a function exists, so does the function. Part of Theorem 4.15(v) of [Monk1] p. 46. This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ fnex . (Note: Any resemblance between F.U.N.E.X. and "Have You Any Eggs" is purely a coincidence originated by Swedish chefs.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: opabex
blocks.content: Existence of a function expressed as class of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jul-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mp2an(wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe), wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wcel(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), universe))
  mpgbir(s0, wfun(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  funopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wmo(s1, w0)))
  moanimv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  ssexi(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0)
  dmopabss(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  funex(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)} ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 → ∃*(s1, w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mp2an({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)} ∈ 𝕌, Fun({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}), dom({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)})∈ 𝕌)
  mpgbir(s0, Fun({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}), ∃*(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))
  funopab(s0, s1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  mpbir(∃*(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)), (s0 ∈ c0 → ∃*(s1, w0)))
  moanimv(s1, s0 ∈ c0, w0)
  ssexi(dom({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}), c0)
  dmopabss(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  funex({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm mptexgf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylancr(c0 ∈ c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ 𝕌, Fun((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))∈ 𝕌)
  funmpt(s0, c0, c2)
  mpan(c0 ∈ c1, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))∈ 𝕌, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))⊆ c0)
  eqsstri(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), c0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 })
  dmmpt(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  sseqtri({ s0 ∈ c0 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, c0, { s0 ∈ c0 | T })
  mpbir({ s0 ∈ c0 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c0 | T }, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ 𝕌 → T)))
  rgenw(s0, c0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → T))
  trud(c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ss2rab(s0, c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, wtru)
  rabtru(s0, c0)
  ssexg(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), c0, c1)
  funex((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), universe)
}

thm mptfvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

}

  mptex(s1, c0, c1)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wb(wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wb(wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))

  pm4.71ri(wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wfn(cv(s0), c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wfn(cv(s0), c0), wfn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0))
  fnmpti(s1, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  fneq1(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0)

  syl6bb(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wceq(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)))
  sylbi(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wceq(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c0, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c2)))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(cres(c0, c2), c1), crn(cres(c0, c2))))

  jca(w0, wfun(c0), wss(cin(c3, c2), cdm(c0)))
  syl(w0, wfun(c0), wfn(c0, c3))
  fnfun(c0, c3)

  inss1(c3, c2)

thm fnfvimad(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈(c0 " c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
} = {
  sseldd((c0 ` c1), (c0 " c2), (c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2)), w0)

  ax-mp((c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2))⊆(c0 " c2), (c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ c2)
  inss2(c3, c2)
  imass2((c3 ⋂ c2), c2, c0)
  sylc(w0, (c0 ` c1)∈(c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2)), (Fun(c0)∧(c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ dom(c0)), c1 ∈(c3 ⋂ c2))
  jca(w0, Fun(c0), (c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ dom(c0))

blocks.pretty:
thm resfvresima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 |`(c1 " c2))`((c1 |` c2)` c3))=(c0 `(c1 ` c3)))
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ dom(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c0 |`(c1 " c2))`((c1 |` c2)` c3)), (c0 `(c1 ` c3)), ((c0 |`(c1 " c2))`(c1 ` c3)), w0)
  fveq2d((c0 |`(c1 " c2)), ((c1 |` c2)` c3), (c1 ` c3), w0)
  fvresd(c1, c2, c3, w0)
  fvresd(c0, (c1 " c2), (c1 ` c3), w0)
  sylc(w0, (c1 ` c3)∈(c1 " c2), (Fun(c1)∧ c2 ⊆ dom(c1)), c3 ∈ c2)
  jca(w0, Fun(c1), c2 ⊆ dom(c1))
  funfvima2(c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: funfvima3
blocks.content: A class including a function contains the function's value in the image of the singleton of the argument. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm funfvima3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
} = {
  impcom(wfun(c0), wss(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2)))))
  exp32(wss(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))))
  mpbird(wa(wss(c0, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
  impel(wss(c0, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c0))
  ssel(c0, c1, cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)))
  funfvop(c0, c2)
  ad2antll(wss(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1)))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c2, cdm(c0), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
  eleq2d(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  imaeq2d(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c2)
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c2)), c1, cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0, c2))
  elimasn(cfv(c0, c2), c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cima(c1, csn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funfvima3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→(c2 ∈ dom(c0)→(c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 })))
} = {
  impcom(Fun(c0), c0 ⊆ c1, (c2 ∈ dom(c0)→(c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 })))
  exp32(c0 ⊆ c1, Fun(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), (c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 }))
  mpbird((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧(Fun(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0))), (c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 }), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1)
  impel(c0 ⊆ c1, (Fun(c0)∧ c2 ∈ dom(c0)), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c0)
  ssel(c0, c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)>)
  funfvop(c0, c2)
  ad2antll(c0 ⊆ c1, Fun(c0), c2 ∈ dom(c0), ((c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 })↔ < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c2, dom(c0), (c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 }), < c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1, (c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { hs0 }), < hs0,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1)
  eleq2d((c0 ` c2), (c1 " { hs0 }), (c1 " { c2 }), hs0 = c2)
  imaeq2d(c1, { hs0 }, { c2 }, hs0 = c2)
  sneq(hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(< hs0,(c0 ` c2)>, c1, < c2,(c0 ` c2)>, hs0 = c2)
  opeq1(hs0, c2, (c0 ` c2))
  elimasn((c0 ` c2), c1, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  fvex(c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` c2)∈(c1 " { c2 }))
  diff.hs0.w(< c2,(c0 ` c2)> ∈ c1)
}

blocks.name: fnfvima
blocks.content: The function value of an operand in a set is contained in the image of that set, using the ` Fn ` abbreviation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnfvima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cima(c0, c2)))
} = {
  sylc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cima(c0, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  jca(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  sseqtr4d(c2, cdm(c0), c1, w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simp2(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  simp3(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  funfvima2(c0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnfvima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` c3)∈(c0 " c2))
} = {
  sylc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c0 ` c3)∈(c0 " c2), (Fun(c0)∧ c2 ⊆ dom(c0)), c3 ∈ c2)
  jca((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), Fun(c0), c2 ⊆ dom(c0))
  3ad2ant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ c2, Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  sseqtr4d(c2, dom(c0), c1, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  simp2(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ c2, dom(c0)= c1)
  fndm(c0, c1)
  simp3(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  funfvima2(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: rexima
blocks.content: Existential quantification under an image in terms of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wrex(s0, cima(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexxfr2d(s0, s1, cima(c0, c2), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), universe, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, cv(s1), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(∃(s0 ∈(c0 " c2), w0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, w1)))
  ⊣ (s0 =(c0 ` s1)→(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexxfr2d(s0, s1, (c0 " c2), c2, (c0 ` s1), universe, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, s1, ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), s0 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s1)= s0))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, s0)
  rexbii(s1, c2, (c0 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqcom((c0 ` s1), s0)
  adantl((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1), (w0 ↔ w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ralima
blocks.content: Universal quantification under an image in terms of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wral(s0, cima(c0, c2), w0), wral(s1, c2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralxfr2d(s0, s1, cima(c0, c2), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), universe, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, cv(s1), wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cima.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(∀(s0 ∈(c0 " c2), w0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, w1)))
  ⊣ (s0 =(c0 ` s1)→(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)

  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralxfr2d(s0, s1, (c0 " c2), c2, (c0 ` s1), universe, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), w0, w1)
  fvexd(c0, s1, ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), s0 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s1)= s0))
  fvelimab(s1, c0, c1, c2, s0)
  rexbii(s1, c2, (c0 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqcom((c0 ` s1), s0)
  adantl((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1), (w0 ↔ w1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

}

blocks.name: fvclss
blocks.content: Upper bound for the class of values of a class. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvclss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wss(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sseqtr4i(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cun(crn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cab(s0, wo(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))))
  ss2abi(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wo(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls))))
  orrd(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  syl6ibr(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  necon1bd(cv(s0), emptycls, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  com12(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  syl6ibr(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  eximdv(s1, wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  syl5bi(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  tz6.12i(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  elrn(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  velsn(s0, emptycls)
  df-un(s0, crn(c0), csn(emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s1, cv(s0), emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvclss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ { s0 | ∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))} ⊆(ran(c0)⋃ { ∅ })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sseqtr4i({ s0 | ∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, (ran(c0)⋃ { ∅ }), { s0 |(s0 ∈ ran(c0)∨ s0 ∈ { ∅ })})
  ss2abi(s0, ∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), (s0 ∈ ran(c0)∨ s0 ∈ { ∅ }))
  orrd(∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), s0 ∈ ran(c0), s0 ∈ { ∅ })
  syl6ibr(∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), ¬ s0 ∈ ran(c0), s0 ∈ { ∅ }, s0 = ∅)
  necon1bd(s0, emptycls, ∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  com12(∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), s0 ≠ ∅, s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  syl6ibr(s0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)), s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  eximdv(s1, s0 ≠ ∅, s0 =(c0 ` s1), s1[c0]s0)
  syl5bi(s0 ≠ ∅, s0 =(c0 ` s1), s1[c0]s0, (c0 ` s1)= s0)
  eqcom(s0, (c0 ` s1))
  tz6.12i(s0, c0, s1)
  elrn(s1, s0, c0)
  vex(s0)
  velsn(s0, emptycls)
  df-un(s0, ran(c0), { ∅ })
  diff.wne.s(s1, s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elabrex
blocks.content: Elementhood in an image set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2014.)

thm elabrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wtru)
  tru()
  rspcev(hs0, cv(s0), c0, wtru, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  2thd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wtru)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  trud(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  elab(s1, c1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  abbii(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm elabrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → c1 ∈ { s1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)})
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c1, { s1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)}, { s1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)}, s0 ∈ c0)
  sylibr(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ { s1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)}, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  mpan2(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1), wtru)
  tru()
  rspcev(hs0, s0, c0, wtru, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  2thd(hs0 = s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, wtru)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  trud(hs0 = s0)
  elab(s1, c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, s1 = c1, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqeq1(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  abbii(s1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, c0, s1 = c1, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfv(hs0, s1 = c1)
  nfeq2(s0, s1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqeq2d(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s1 = c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm abrexco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), cab(s0, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  abbii(s0, wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  bitri(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  bitr4i(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s1, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  bitri(wrex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wex(s1, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  df-rex(s1, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  exbii(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wa(wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  elab(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  vex(s1)
  rexbidv(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  eqeq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  r19.41v(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  rexcom4(s3, s1, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  rexbii(s3, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  ceqsexv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wrex.s(s2, s3, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm abrexco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2)} = { s0 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s0 = c3)}
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s1 = c1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  abbii(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s0 = c3))
  bitri(∃(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s0 = c3), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2))))
  bitr4i(∃(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2))), ∃(s1, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2))))
  bitri(∃(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2), ∃(s1, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2))), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)} ∧ s0 = c2)))
  df-rex(s1, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2)
  exbii(s1, (s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)} ∧ s0 = c2), ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2)))
  bitr4i((s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)} ∧ s0 = c2), ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2)), (∃(s3 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)∧ s0 = c2))
  anbi1i(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1)}, s0 = c2, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  elab(s2, s1, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 = c1), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  vex(s1)
  rexbidv(s3, c0, s2 = s1, s2 = c1, s1 = c1)
  eqeq1(s2, s1, c1)
  r19.41v(s3, c0, s1 = c1, s0 = c2)
  rexcom4(s3, s1, c0, (s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2))
  rexbii(s3, c0, ∃(s1,(s1 = c1 ∧ s0 = c2)), s0 = c3)
  ceqsexv(s1, c1, s0 = c2, s0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(s0, c2, c3, s1 = c1)
  diff.wrex.s(s2, s3, c0, s1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: imaiun
blocks.content: The image of an indexed union is the indexed union of the images. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

thm imaiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cima(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), ciun(s0, c1, cima(c0, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cima(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), ciun(s0, c1, cima(c0, c2)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c1, cima(c0, c2))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2))))
  3bitr4ri(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c1, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))), wex(hs1, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))))
  rexcom4(s0, hs1, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  rexbii(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  elima3(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  exbii(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  r19.41v(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  elima3(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2))
  vex(hs0)
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c1, cima(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c1, cima(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(ciun(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm imaiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 " ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2))= ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 " c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, (c0 " ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 " c2)))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈(c0 " ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 " c2)), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)))
  3bitr4ri(∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0))), ∃(hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0))))
  rexcom4(s0, hs1, c1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0))
  rexbii(s0, c1, hs0 ∈(c0 " c2), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)))
  elima3(hs1, hs0, c0, c2)
  exbii(hs1, (hs1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)))
  bitr4i((hs1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)), (∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0))
  anbi1i(hs1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2), < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2))
  eliun(s0, hs1, c1, c2)
  r19.41v(s0, c1, hs1 ∈ c2, < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c0)
  elima3(hs1, hs0, c0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  vex(hs0)
  eliun(s0, hs0, c1, (c0 " c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 " ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 " c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, < hs1, hs0 >, c0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: imauni
blocks.content: The image of a union is the indexed union of the images. Theorem 3K(a) of [Enderton] p. 50. (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: fniunfv
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its range. Compare Definition 5.4 of [Monk1] p. 50. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm fniunfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(crn(c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(crn(c0)), cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  unieqd(crn(c0), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfn(c0, c1))
  fnrnfv(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  dfiun2(s0, hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: funiunfv
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its image under the index class. Note: This theorem depends on the fact that our function value is the empty set outside of its domain. If the antecedent is changed to ` F Fn A ` , the theorem can be proved without this dependency. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm funiunfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(c0, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {

  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s0, cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))), c1))
  eqtri(cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))), c1, cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1))
  undif2(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1)

  dmres(c0, c1)
  inss1(c1, cdm(c0))
  ssequn1(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1)
  iuneq1(s0, cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))), c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  eqtri(ciun(s0, cun(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), cun(ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), ciun(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))))
  iunxun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  eqtri(cun(ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), ciun(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))), ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), cun(ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), emptycls))
  uneq2i(ciun(s0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), ciun(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), emptycls)
  eqtri(ciun(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), emptycls, ciun(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), emptycls))
  iuneq2i(s0, cdif(c1, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), emptycls)

blocks.name: funiunfvf
blocks.content: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its image under the index class. This version of ~ funiunfv uses a bound-variable hypothesis in place of a distinct variable condition. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 15-Apr-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm funiunfvf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wfun(c0), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(c0, c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqr(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(c0, c1)), ciun(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wfun(c0))
  cbviun(hs0, s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  funiunfv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm funiunfvf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0))= ⋃(c0 " c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {

  nfcv(hs0, (c0 ` s0))

  syl6bbr(wfun(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi2d(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  sylbi(wfun(c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))

  syl6(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), crn(c0))))
  ancld(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), crn(c0)))
  a1d(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), crn(c0)))

  fvex(c0, cv(s0))

blocks.pretty:
thm elunirn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Fun(c0)→(c1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  syl5bb(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)), ∃(hs0,(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0))))
  eluni(hs0, c1, ran(c0))
  impbid(Fun(c0), ∃(hs0,(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0))), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)))
  exlimdv(hs0, Fun(c0), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)))
  syl6bi(Fun(c0), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0),(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧(c0 ` s0)= hs0)))
  syl6bbr(Fun(c0), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0),(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧(c0 ` s0)= hs0)), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0),(c0 ` s0)= hs0)))
  anbi2d(Fun(c0), c1 ∈ hs0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0),(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  sylbi(Fun(c0), (hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0),(c0 ` s0)= hs0)), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfn(c0)
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, dom(c0), hs0)
  r19.42v(s0, dom(c0), c1 ∈ hs0, (c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  reximi(s0, dom(c0), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧(c0 ` s0)= hs0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0))
  biimparc(c1 ∈ hs0, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, c1 ∈(c0 ` s0))
  eleq2((c0 ` s0), hs0, c1)
  rexlimdva(s0, dom(c0), Fun(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0), ∃(hs0,(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0))))
  syl6((Fun(c0)∧ s0 ∈ dom(c0)), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0), ∃(hs0,(c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0))), (c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)∧(c0 ` s0)∈ ran(c0)))
  ancld((Fun(c0)∧ s0 ∈ dom(c0)), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)∈ ran(c0))
  a1d((Fun(c0)∧ s0 ∈ dom(c0)), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)∈ ran(c0))
  fvelrn(c0, s0)
  spcev(hs0, (c0 ` s0), (c1 ∈(c0 ` s0)∧(c0 ` s0)∈ ran(c0)), (c1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)))
  fvex(c0, s0)
  anbi12d(hs0 =(c0 ` s0), c1 ∈ hs0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0), c1 ∈(c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)∈ ran(c0))
  eleq2(hs0, (c0 ` s0), c1)
  eleq1(hs0, (c0 ` s0), ran(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: fnunirn
blocks.content: Membership in a union of some function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnunirn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(s0, cdm(c0), wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  elunirn(s0, c0, c2)
  rexeqdv(s0, cdm(c0), c1, wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnunirn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]c1 →(c2 ∈ ⋃ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(c0 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈ ⋃ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(c0 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c2 ∈(c0 ` s0)))
  syl(c0[Fn]c1, (c2 ∈ ⋃ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c0), c2 ∈(c0 ` s0))), Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  elunirn(s0, c0, c2)
  rexeqdv(s0, dom(c0), c1, c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈(c0 ` s0))
  fndm(c0, c1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)

blocks.name: dff13
blocks.content: A one-to-one function in terms of function values. Compare Theorem 4.8(iv) of [Monk1] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm dff13(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

blocks.content: A one-to-one function in terms of function values. Compare Theorem 4.8(iv) of [Monk1] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2003.)

  bitri((c0 : c1 ↣ c2), ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((c0 ` s0)=(c0 ` s1)→ s0 = s1)))), ((c0 : c1 → c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1)))))

  ralbii(hs0, c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` s1)→ hs0 = s1)))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, cv(hs1)))

thm nvof1o(class c0, class c1) {

  mpbid(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0)), wf(c0, c1, c1), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  sylib(wfn(c0, c1), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wfun(c0))
  fdmrn(c0)
  feq23d(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0), c1, c1, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  mpbird(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0)), wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(c0))
  adantr(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(c0)))
  funeq(ccnv(c0), c0)
  df-f1(c0, c1, c1)
  sylanbrc(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0)), wfo(c0, c1, c1), wfn(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
  simpl(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))
  sylan9eqr(crn(c0), c1, cdm(c0), wfn(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))
  syl5eq(crn(c0), cdm(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))

thm nvof1o(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0)→(c0 : c1 ↔ c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0), (c0 : c1 ↔ c1), (c0 : c1 ↣ c1), (c0 : c1 ↠ c1))

  mpbid((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0), (c0 : c1 → c1), (c0 : dom(c0)→ ran(c0)))
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ran(c0)))

  fdmrn(c0)
  feq23d(c0, dom(c0), ran(c0), c1, c1, (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0))
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0, dom(c0)= c1)
  mpbird((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0), Fun(`' c0), Fun(c0))
  adantr(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0, Fun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0, (Fun(`' c0)↔ Fun(c0)))
  funeq(`' c0, c0)
  df-f1(c0, c1, c1)
  sylanbrc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ `' c0 = c0), (c0 : c1 ↠ c1), c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)= c1)
  simpl(c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0)
  sylan9eqr(ran(c0), c1, dom(c0), c0[Fn]c1, `' c0 = c0)
  syl5eq(ran(c0), dom(c0), dom(`' c0), `' c0 = c0)

blocks.name: nvocnv

blocks.origin:
thm nvocnv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(ccnv(c0), c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wf(c0, c1, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))

thm f1prex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), c2)), wb(w2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)

  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
